notes: On 17 September 2024, in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, two armed individuals shot at municipal police officers that approached to arrest them on Corredor 2000 by Colonia Los Arroyos, initiating a clash and a persecution. The persecution ended on a path 200 meters from Corredor 2000 in direction to the municipality of Tijuana, where police officers shot and killed the armed individuals. 2 fatalities.
Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burned in colonia Urbi Villa del Prado II. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, armed individuals shot at people in 'La Postal' Japanese take away restaurant, on Defensores de Baja California avenue, in Colonia Empleado Postal, killing a man and injuring another. The perpetrators had suspectedly followed the dead victim there, and fled in a van after the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, four men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence and torture inside the trunk of a car in Colonia El Soler. 4 fatalities.
Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia 20 de noviembre. 1 fatality.
On 16 September 2024, in Ocozocoautla, Chiapas, three armed men wearing camouflage clothing kidnapped a man after he left his home in Colonia Shanka. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Rio Florido, Chiapas, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, blindfolded and their hands tied up. It is suspected that the victims are migrants as the area is known to be part of the migration route, however, this was not confirmed. 2 fatalities.

On 18 September 2024, in Tonala, armed individuals opened fire at elements of the marine (Semar) who repelled the aggression and led to a chase and the crash of the armed vehicle close to Huizachal. One marine officer was injured and two armed individuals were arrested. 1 injury.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, three armed individuals entered a house in the intersection of Tierra y Libertad street and Reforma, in Colonia Revolucion, and shot and killed two men. 2 fatalities.
On 18 September 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, three armed individuals arrived at a home, opened fire at a man in Colonia Ladrilleras. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Camino Real. The victim was identified as a former municipal police officer. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, unknown armed individuals set a vehicle on fire located on the Jimenez-Parral highway at the junction to Allende and set up a (narco) roadblock. The event occurred amid a security operation following a clash on Sunday (coded separately), and authorities are investigating whether the two events are related. There were no casualties, but bullets were found at the scene.

Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket and a message next to the body in Colonia San Pablo Xalpa. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; Metro Mx
notes: On 15 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, a man physically assaulted his partner, after which three armed men approached and shot and killed him in the intersection of Prolongacion Miguel Hidalgo and Santa Ana streets, in Colonia San Francisco Culhuacan. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, witnesses reported that armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a grandfather and his grandson inside a mechanic shop killing both (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

On 18 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, a couple of armed individuals opened fire and killed a 71 year old woman in Colonia Doctores and then fled the scene. Both individuals were later arrested. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 17 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, two armed individuals on a motorbike arrived at Martin Carrera market, one of them got off the vehicle, entered the market, and shot and injured two people. The perpetrators fled on the motorbike, heading towards Mexico state.

source: El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 15 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, a man and a woman shot and killed an off-duty police officer of the Sub-Secretary of Intelligence and Investigation on Universidad avenue by Cerrada de Jacarandas, in Colonia Ejercito Constitucionalista. The perpetrators were arrested two days later. Another man who participated in the attack was arrested on 16 July 2025 and the authorities seized drugs. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlahuac, municipal police officers clashed with a suspected member of La Familia Michoacana cartel in the intersection of Rio Ameca street and Cuauhtemoc avenue. The officers arrested the man. Casualties unknown.

Around 16 September 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, armed individuals and municipal police officers clashed on 5 de Febrero street, in Colonia San Miguel Xicalco. A police officer died. The clash took place when the officers intervened to stop a fight between residents that had resulted in the death of a man. The officers arrested the individual who shot at the officer and two women that threw stones and sticks to the officers. 2 fatalities.

On 16 September 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, municipal police officers and two armed individuals on a motorbike clashed in Jardin de Salagua. An officer was injured and an armed individual was arrested. Police officers were chasing the armed individuals after they shot and injured a man near the pier. There were no fatalities.
Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed individuals shot and injured two men on Frida Khalo street, in Colonia Valle de los Naranjos.
On 17 September 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Abasolo street (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a prosecution inspector working for the municipality while he was on his way to work. The victim was an inspector of trades. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2024, in La Calera, Guanajuato, a woman and her son were shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in their house. The woman was a municipal police officer in Tarimoro. 2 fatalities.

On 20 September 2024, in Juventino Rosas, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals attacked a municipal policewoman traveling together with an agent of the Investigation Agency of the Attorney General's office on the Juventino Rosas-Salamanca highway near Colonia Ejidal Linda Vista. The woman police officer died as a result and the Investigative police officer was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 20 September 2024, in Ixmiquilpan, Hidalgo, armed individuals shot a man while he was leaving his home in Colonia Benito Juarez from a car (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Guadalajara, Sinaloa, armed individual in two vehicles shot at people that were holding a party on Hacienda Belenes street, in the intersection with Juan de Dios Robledo, in Colonia San Martin, killing a man and injuring five people (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two men and a woman were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets in the coaches of a train coming from Nayarit, on Inglaterra y Mariano Otero avenue, in Colonia Jardines del Bosque. The bodies were found when one of the couches of the train exploded for unknown reasons. 3 fatalities.
Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in San Juan de los Lagos, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found decapitated at the junction to El Carrizo. 1 fatality.
On 15 September 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, an armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured in a drive-by a woman and her daughter in Colonia San Martin de las Flores de Abajo.
Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found covered in a bag in Colonia Terralta. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2024, in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, four people (including two minors) abducted three people on Sierra Cabrera Oeste street, in Fraccionamiento Lomas del Mirador. Two of the perpetrators were arrested and the victims released when army and National Guard officers intercepted a vehicle that was being driven erratically. The other two perpetrators were later arrested at a gas station in Colonia La Nueva Esperanza.

On 18 September 2024, in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, four men opened fire and shot a woman and a man in Colonia San Lorenzo. When police officers attempted to arrest the two men, women intervened and threatened police officers with grenades to prevent the arrest. All four men were arrested as a result. Both victims were injured. 2 injuries.

On 19 September 2024, in Toluca de Lerdo, Mexico, armed individuals on motorcycles opened fire at three men in San Felipe Tlalmimilolpan. The location is possibly a point for the sale of drugs. 3 fatalities.

On 20 September 2024, in El Alcalde, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 20 September 2024, in El Llano Grande, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 20 September 2024, in Los Charcos, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.
On 14 September 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Dieciocho de Mayo. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed (drive-by) a man in Colonia Lomas de Vista Bella. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied up on the Morelia- Patzcuaro highway in Uruaplilla. 1 fatality.
Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a woman was killed and her body was found close to fraccionamiento Arko San Pedro with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2024, in Guarachanillo, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the municipal police and armed men. There were no casualties.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 14 September 2024, in Guarachanillo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed men attacked the Kuarichas of Tzitzio community police after a patrol where a narco camp was found near the Patamban hill. Two community police officers were injured. The armed men also set a (narco) road block with three vehicles that set on fire on the road to Patamban. According to residents, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) had previously entered the community and demanded payment of five thousand pesos per hectare of avocado orchards.
Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Tangancicuaro de Arista, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up and wrapped in a blanket and plastic. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a 15 years-old boy on Juarez avenue, between Rafael J. Rubio and Ignacio Torres de Guzman streets, in Colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateos (drive-by).

source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: On 17 September 2024, in Tetelcingo, Morelos, five armed individuals in vehicles shot at people who were organizing a protest at the intersection of 16 de Septiembre Street and Miguel Hidalgo Avenue (drive-by) to protest against the arrest of six people on 11 September. The perpetrators attempted to flee but were shot by another group of people, initiating a clash that resulted in one dead and one injured. After the clash, residents detained four police officers and seized six police cars (coded separately) to demand the release of six people who were arrested on 11 September. 1 fatality.
On 16 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, two armed individuals shot and killed two men on Orquidea street, in Colonia Los Pilares. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, seven men were killed and their bodies were found in a dumpster in Loma de Mejia with signs of torture and with their hands tied. 7 fatalities.
On 19 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals on a motorcycle chased a man and shot at him (drive-by) causing the man to crash into a pole. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, two men were killed and their bodies were found beaten, with signs of torture and with their hands and feet tied on the Cuernavaca-Acapulco highway at the height of the Cuernavaca bridge.

On 15 September 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, armed individuals shot and killed two women and a man on 10 de Mayo street, by Martires del Rio Blanco street, in Colonia Cuauchiles. The perpetrators fled in a motorbike and a vehicle. 3 fatalities.
Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Temixco, Morelos, two men were killed and their bodies were found close to the Autopista del Sol with signs of torture and their hands tied in fraccionamiento Burgos. 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2024, in Tlaquiltenango, Morelos, at least seven armed individuals engaged in an armed clash with municipal police officers near the entrance to Las Huertas. During the operation, police officers rescued three kidnapped persons and two vehicles belonging to the victims were recovered. One suspect was arrested and two vehicles were seized. Six individuals fled the scene in several vehicles.
Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Xochitepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied up and tape around his face on the Cuernavaca-Acapulco highway. 1 fatality.
On 18 September 2024, in Xochitepec, Morelos, two armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Los Sabinos, Nuevo Leon, two women were killed and their dismembered bodies were found in the intersection of Anillo Periferico and Allende-Cadereyta roads, together with a threatening message written on a cardboard. The bodies were inside ice buckets, one of which had a head on it. The other body was also wrapped in a blanket. The victims had suspectedly been abducted in Cadereyta. 2 fatalities.

On 17 September 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, armed men traveling in several vehicles opened fire and killed a person in Colonia Villas de Carrizalejo and kidnapped two people. The whereabouts of the kidnapped individuals remain unknown. 1 fatality.
On 18 September 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals attacked a man outside his home in Colonia Valle de Vaqueria. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 18 September 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the leader of the Gulf Cartel Metros when he was leaving a soccer field. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, two armed men shot at two teenagers inside a barber shop and then fled the scene in a vehicle driven by a third individual in Colonia Unidad Laboral. 2 fatalities.
On 19 September 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, two men entered a home and shot and injured a man in Colonia Rincon de las Mitras. The victim has a history of the sale of drugs. 1 injury.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
notes: Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found inside a plastic bag on a path in Colonia Margarita Maza de Juarez. 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

notes: On 20 September 2024, in Amozoc de Mota, Puebla, armed men entered the home of a man and shot and killed a man inside a rehabilitation center. A message was found next to the body. The victim was identified as a retired military officer and former Morena candidate for mayor. 1 fatality.
Around 17 September 2024, in Cuautinchan, Puebla, a woman was killed and her body was found with 'tiro de gracia' in a field. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Palmar de Bravo, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a plastic bag with a message next to the body on the Puebla-Orizaba highway at KM 204.6. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Tehuacan, Puebla, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man that was driving a car on Cinco Senores street, in Fraccionamiento Agua Blanca 2 (drive-by). The victim was suspectedly mistaken by the perpetrators, who intended to attack another person. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two armed individuals shot at people in a park between Isla Zanzibar and Isla Guadalupe streets, in Fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar, killing two men and injuring another. The perpetrators fled on a motorbike. The attack is suspectedly linked to a drug deal. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 September 2024 (as reported), in Chetumal, Quintana Roo, three people were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds in a taxi on Chetumal-Calderitas road, close to the Oxtankah archeological site. One of the victims' hand had been mutilated. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 16 September 2024, in Guadalupe Victoria (El Atoron), Sinaloa, unidentified armed groups clashed, resulting in the death of three people, one of them with 'tiro de gracia'. Several vehicles and the premises of three ranches were shot and set on fire. This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

On 19 September 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, armed individuals opened fire at military officers during an operation who repelled the aggression killing three armed individuals and arrested eight in fraccionamiento Palma Dorada. Six of those arrested were reported as minors. Military seized weapons, cartridges, vests and magazines. 3 fatalities.
On 16 September 2024, in Sonoyta, Sonora, army officers and suspected gang members clashed. Army officers arrested an individual. Casualties unknown.

On 16 September 2024, in Hermosillo, Sonora, armed men broke into a home and set fire to a piece of furniture in an attempt to burn the house down in Colonia Fuente de Piedra. The attack is being linked to intimidations against the owner of the home who was inside. There were no injuries.

On 16 September 2024, in Golfo de Santa Clara, Sonora, army and police officers and suspected members of the Sinaloa Cartel clashed. Two to five people died depending on the source, and 20 were arrested. The armed individuals wore bulletproof vests with the text 'Plebada de 7 4' written on them. The officers seized several 4x4 vehicles, fireweapons and eight explosive devices. Fatalities coded as 2 based on the latest report.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with a threatening message written on a cardboard in a house on Zaragoza street, in front of El Eden and Zaragoza hotels. The message was suspectedly addressed to people involved in robberies and extortion. 1 fatality.
Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found inside a house in Colonia Agua Zula with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Tabasco state (coded to Villahermosa), members of the CJNG held and killed two members of La Barredora gang. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and the body was found with a message which referred to disputes between antagonistic criminal groups. The body was found in Gaviotas, in El Milagro ranch. 1 fatality.

Around 16 September 2024 (as reported), in Oriente 1ra seccion, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with a rope tied around his neck, a threatening message written on a cardboard and a 'charro' hat. 1 fatality.
On 18 September 2024, in Amado Gomez, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man outside his home. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 16 September 2024, in Acayucan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed men got off a van and entered a house on Patricio Chirinos street, on a side of Acayucan-Soteapan state road in the community of Comejen, and shot and killed two women and a man. Two other men got to flee the house. The victims were relatives of a local rural leader. 3 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Soconusco, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two armed men on a motorcycle opened fire at a woman at her home. The woman died as a result. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Texistepec, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on a road leading to Francisco I. Madero. The body had a cardboard with a threatening message against traitors ('chapulines') and a member of the Secretariat of Public Safety (SSP). 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2024, in Merida, Yucatan, two armed individuals shot and killed a businessman outside Barra Kulichi bar, on Royal Campocielo square, in Fraccionamiento Las Americas. The victim was the owner of a luxury car sales business called 'Jah Motors' and faced complaints and disputes for suspectedly committing fraud and not delivering the vehicles. 1 fatality.
Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, a person was killed and the body was found after being thrown out of a moving car with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture, gunshot and stab wounds and wrapped in a blanket on Salamanca-Celaya road. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed individuals shot and killed a tattoo artist at his business on Antonio Alzate street, in Colonia Centro, and then fled the scene. The underage son of the victim was injured. 1 fatality.

source: Antena San Luis; Borderland Beat; El Norte; Milenio
notes: On 20 September 2024, in Berriozabal, Chiapas, an armed group broke into a home, kidnapped a man and set fire to the home. A three-year-old girl was killed inside the home from the fire. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. Three men from a criminal group were arrested. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Manuel Ojinaga, Chihuahua, eleven people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic bags near the facilities of the Federal Electricity Commission (CFE). Two of the bodies were decapitated. One of the bodies was identified as a member of La Linea Gang. A message was found next to the bodies. 11 fatalities.

On 14 September 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, according to residents there was an armed clash between armed men. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

On 16 September 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. Authorities arrived to the place and seized six fire weapons and an armored van, and destroyed a camp. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Loreto, Zacatecas, two women were killed and their bodies were found inside a burning vehicle in the downtown area. 2 fatalities.
Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found inside a suitcase in Colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2024, in Calzada Larga, Chiapas, there was an armed clash between criminal members and the National Guard during a patrol in Colonia Calzada Larga. Five armed men were killed and two officers were injured. One armed men was arrested. 5 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed men in a vehicle intercepted and shot at two men in another vehicle in a drive-by shooting. One man was killed and another one was injured. The victim's vehicle crashed after the car chase. 1 fatality.

Around 21 September 2024 (month of), in Xalpatlahuac, Guerrero, two men were killed and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition with their feet tied up on the Tlapa-Marquelia highway. 2 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, a man was killed and another man was injured inside a workshop in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. The perpetrators are suspected to be two men who were seen fleeing the scene. 1 fatality.
On 21 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured another man in a drive-by shooting in Paso Express Cuernavaca.
On 21 September 2024, around San Juan Texcalpan, Morelos, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by on the San Juan Texcalpan-Atlatlahucan road. 1 fatality.

Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Valle de Vazquez, Morelos, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence, with his hands tied up, wrapped in a blanket, and with a message. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man several times and then fled the scene in fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 21 September 2024, in La Union, Zacatecas, there was an armed clash among the state police, National Guard, and military officers against suspected gang members. Casualties unknown.
Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Jojutla, Morelos, two men were killed and one of the bodies was found tied and inside a trunk and the other next to the car beaten and shot to death in Colonia Nicolas Bravo. One of the men was identified and accused of extortion of merchants, kidnapping and murder as well as being the leader of the gang Los Jairos. The second victim was involved in drug dealing activities. 2 fatalities.
Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in China, Nuevo Leon, three people were killed and their bodies were found close to the El Cuchillo dam. One of the bodies was wrapped in a rug. 3 fatalities.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, at least three people were killed and their human remains were found inside a vehicle in Colonia La Loma with a message signed by the CJNG. 3 fatalities.

On 22 September 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, there was an armed clash between armed individuals in Colonia Mision del Sol 2. One person was injured. One person was arrested. Also in Ciudad Obregon, rival groups clashed in other colonias, including Real de Sevilla, Mision del Real, Alameda, Villa Bonita, Matias Mendez, and Urbi Villa. Suspectedly, these clashes are related and came after the arrest of a person in colonia Prados del Tepeyac.

On 22 September 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed men clashed with National Guard officers in colonia Montecarlo. The clash ensued amid several clashes between rival groups recorded in other colonias (coded separately). Military officers patrolled the city using helicopters. Casualties unknown.
On 23 September 2024, in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a couple arrived on a motorcycle and shot and killed two men in the downtown sector of the city. 2 fatalities.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 23 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, two men on a motorcycle shot at a butcher shop in Colonia La Forestal injuring a 15-year old boy and killing a woman. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 23 September 2024, in San Jeronimito, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals ambushed elements of the Marines on surveillance patrol who repelled the aggression. One armed individual was killed and the marine arrested nine armed individuals. Officials seized weapons, magazines, cartridge and tactical equipment. 1 fatality.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture inside a drum in Colonia El Castillo. 1 fatality.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, one man and one woman were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic in Colonia Loma Linda. 2 fatalities.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Santa Maria Tequepexpan. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in San Antonio Ocampo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at elements of the National Guard who repelled the aggression. Two officers were injured as a result and the perpetrators fled the scene. 2 injuries.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Temixco, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated in Colonia Azteca. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in Cocorit, Sonora, one armed individual opened fire at elements of the National Guard after they were alerted about a shooting and repelled the aggression. One officer died as a result and magazines and a weapon were seized. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash resulting in the death of two people and the injury of two in Colonia Arenosa. This clash is likely related to internal disputes between factions and allies of the Sinaloa Cartel. 2 fatalities, 2 injuries.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in Platano y Cacao 1er seccion, Tabasco, a woman was killed and her body was found near a Pemex store. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, armed individuals chased and shot at a woman driving her car together with two other people and two minors (drive-by) at the entrance to Colonia Renacimiento y Jacinto Lopez. The woman crashed and tried to flee the car by foot when she was killed. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, according to witnesses, unknown armed men entered a home and opened fire at four women, including one girl. Three women died as a result and the girl was injured. The armed men then set fire to the home in Colonia Alma Obrera. 3 fatalities, 1 injury.

On 23 September 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, police officers physically assaulted two journalists to prevent them from covering an attack with an explosive device that have occurred moments before in the facilities of the Zacatecas National Fair during a concert (coded separately).

On 23 September 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, unknown armed individuals detonated an explosive device inside facilities of the Zacatecas National Fair during a concert, injuring 14 people, including state police officers. After the attack, police found three other explosive devices set underneath vehicles which were defused. Police suspects that this was a direct attack against the officers guarding the event.

Around 24 September 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets inside a vehicle and arrested one individual driving the vehicle in Colonia Nuevo Triunfo. 2 fatalities.

On 24 September 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, one man opened fire at a group of people at a beer warehouse injuring three people, including a 16-yea- old boy and then fled the scene on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice. The same day in Celaya, one individual opened fire and shot and injured a man outside his home in Colonia Bellavista and then fled the scene with another individual. 4 injuries.

On 24 September 2024, in El Salto, Jalisco, several armed men kidnapped an off-duty municipal police traffic officer from his home in Colonia Parques del Castillo. The man was released the next day together with another man who was also kidnapped.
On 24 September 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a 16-years-old boy and injured him. 1 injury.

source: La Silla Rota; MiMorelia; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 24 September 2024, in Erongaricuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals in two trucks opened fire at elements of the Attorney General's Office (ministerial police) and the National Guard who repelled the aggression at the exit Napizaro. One armed individual was killed and five were arrested. Police seized weapons and vehicles. The armed individuals retained several vehicles and set fire to them as part of a (narco) roadblock, several other roadblocks were set in other villages after the clash (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 24 September 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, three men entered a home and killed a man in Colonia Enrique Rangel. 1 fatality.

Around 24 September 2024 (between 22 - 26 September), in Nuevo San Claudio, Puebla, two people were killed and their bodies were found buried in a wooded area on 26 september. One of the victims is a municipal police officer from Almoloya de Juarez who disappeared on 22 September 2024. The other victim was buried alive. 2 fatalities.

On 24 September 2024, in Cozumel, Quintana Roo, unknown armed individuals shot at the house of a woman journalist from the news platform Codigo Rojo Quintana Roo. The attack happened hours after the journalist filed a complaint for death threats at the State Attorney General's Office (FGE).

Around 25 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, three men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence inside a vehicle in Playas. A message was found next to the bodies. 3 fatalities.
On 25 September 2024, in Guerrero, Coahuila de Zaragoza, state police and army officers clashed with armed individuals. Three officers were injured. The armed individuals fled towards Tamaulipas.

On 25 September 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, according to authorities, armed individuals shot and killed two men and a woman outside their house on Loreto Sur street, between Teatro de las Americas and Prolongacion Gobernador Curiel, in Colonia Cerro del Cuatro. 3 fatalities.
On 25 September 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two men approached a couple in a parking lot and opened fire killing a man in Colonia Hacienda del Valle. The woman was left uninjured. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals entered a vigil and shot against a group of people, injuring a woman in Colonia Patios de la Estacion. Some of those present fired back. The perpetrators fled in a vehicle which was recorded by a surveillance camera. The vigil was for a man that had been killed in a gym in Gualupita neighborhood on 23 September.

On 25 September 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, three armed individuals in a taxi opened fire and killed a man driving a motorcycle and then fled the scene in Colonia Ampliacion Bugambilias (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2024, in Los Ramones, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals traveling in eight pick up trucks were intercepted by military officers, the National Guard and state police officers after an armed attack on the same day in General Teran (coded separately). The armed individuals opened fire and officials with the support of state police helicopters repelled the aggression, killing 11 individuals. Six pick up trucks were seized together with weapons, tactical equipment, magazines, and radios. 11 fatalities.

On 25 September 2024, in Matehuala municipality, San Luis Potosi, National Guard officers clashed with a group or armed men travelling in a van on the road that connects to Ramal. An armed individual was killed, another was arrested, and two people that had been abducted and travelled in the same van were released. 1 fatality.
On 25 September 2024, in Ojo de Agua, San Luis Potosi, National Guard officers and armed individuals clashed, resulting in five injured (four officers and an armed individual).
Around 25 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuxcuxapa, Tabasco, one person was killed and the human remains were found inside plastic bags. A message was found next to the bags. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, an armed man shot and injured a man who was driving a public transport vehicle in the intersection of Martires de Chicago and Pedro Maya streets, in Colonia Obrera. The perpetrators fled and was later arrested together with an underage accomplice.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, two men were killed and their bodies were found together with a threatening message near a road in the area between Libramiento and Gomez Morin. 2 fatalities.

On 26 September 2024, in Ixtlahuacan de los Membrillos, Jalisco, armed individuals on motorbikes clashed near the old road to Chapala and on Quetzal street, in Colonia Las Aguilillas, resulting in the death of a man. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, two armed individuals, suspectedly a man and a woman, shot and killed a man in the intersection of Pemex and Arroyo streets, in Colonia Los Puestos. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Zapopan, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags on the path leading to Copalita and Jose Maria Morelos street, in Colonia Nuevo Mexico. Also in Zapopan, two armed individuals shot and killed a man that was leaving the parking lot of his house in the intersection of Calzada de las Flores and Hacienda de las Hortensias, in Colonia Hacienda del Valle. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Erongaricuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel shot at Ministerial Police, National Guard, and army officers who were conducting an operation against the theft of cargo vehicles, initiating a clash that resulted in the death of an armed individual and five arrested. The officers seized six fireweapons and a grenade. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Mina, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot at a police car in the intersection of Francisco Javier Mina and Alvaro Obregon, around 300 meters from the municipal presidency, in Colonia La Loma, initiating a clash that resulted in the death of an officer. 1 fatality.
On 26 September 2024, in Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca, unidentified rival armed groups clashed, resulting in the death of four individuals. 4 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, a person was killed and his/her body was found wrapped in a hammock and inside a plastic bag in Colonia Irregular El Sheriff, in Region 236, near Arco Vial. Also in Cancun, a person was killed and his/her body was also found wrapped in a hammock and inside a plastic bag in Supermanzana 251, in Fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Cozumel, Quintana Roo, ministerial police officers clashed with two suspected gang members driving a motorbike, who attempted to avoid being arrested on Transversal avenue by 85 street. One of the men was injured and transferred to a hospital. Both men were wanted due to their involvement in an attack against a woman journalist in Cozumel on 24 September 2024 (coded separately).

On 26 September 2024, in the municipality of Elota (coded to La Cruz), Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, at least two women were killed and their dismembered bodies were found in five plastic bags in a building in the intersection of Jose Alberto Healy Noriega boulevard and Carlos B. Maldonado street, in Fraccionamiento Real de Palmas. The victims had disappeared in April 2024 and were suspectedly linked to criminals. At least 2 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), near San Pedro El Saucito, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied inside a vehicle on km. 17+300 of the road that connects the town with San Miguel de Horcasitas. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Centro municipality (coded to Villahermosa), Tabasco, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a man in Barranca y Amate ranch, killing him (drive-by). The victim was armed and tried to answer the attack. 1 fatality.
On 26 September 2024, in Cuauhtemoc municipality (coded to San Pedro Piedra Gorda), Zacatecas, armed groups clashed and shot at houses. Casualties unknown.
Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Tabasco, Zacatecas, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found in five plastic bags on the side of a road by Cuxcuxapa ranch. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), near Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a person was killed and his/her dismembered body was found in two plastic bags on Tijuana-Rosarito road, together with threatening messages against municipal police officers. One of the bags was near Loma Blanca bridge, and the other was near Cuesta Blanca and the altar to the singer Chuy Montana. The message threatened relatives of police officers. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, four armed men abducted an American woman for six days in a house on Lazaro Cardenas street, in Colonia Obrera. The victim managed to escape and went to a military barracks. Military officers conducted an operation and arrested the four perpetrators and seized arms and drugs.

On 27 September 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, armed individuals shot at a car on 17 de Octubre street, near Prolongacion Abasolo street, in Colonia Caminos, killing a man and a woman. The man was a former Coordinator of the Special Forces Unit of the state police. 2 fatalities.
On 27 September 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man who was walking by the canal of Dean park (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, according to a witness, armed men shot and killed a man in a house in the intersection of Monte Reyes and Circuito Monte Vinzon Oeste streets, in Colonia Lomas del Mirador. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a person was killed and his/her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition inside a plastic bag on Sierra Cabrera street, near the intersection with Sierra Cabrera Norte, in Colonia Lomas del Mirador. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, in Tenango de Arista, Mexico, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man and a woman who were driving a motorbike on Toluca-Tenango road, near De la Llama street and the Industrial Park of Tenango del Valle (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

Around 27 September 2024, in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, the hands tied and gagged in a field known as 'Cola de Caballo', 500 meters from a football pitch, in Ejido de Tenayuca. 1 fatality.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon
location: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon
notes: Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his flayed body was found with a nylon bag on the head, signs of torture, gunshot wounds, and the hands tied on a side of the path that leads to Santo Reyes Yucunaa, by a place known as 'La Cienaga', near Santiago Chilixtlahuaca road. The victim was suspectedly linked to the commission of burglary and car theft. 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de León

notes: Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Saric, Sonora, armed individuals ambushed National Guard and army officers who answered the attack. Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 27 September 2024, in Dios Rios, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, three armed men in a vehicle shot and injured a man on 16 de Septiembre avenue by Benito Juarez, 40 meters from 20 de Noviembre primary school (drive-by). The perpetrators fled towards Sumidero, in the municipality of Ixtaczoquitlan.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Pagina 24 Zacatecas
notes: Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in San Tadeo, Zacatecas, three men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds, and military tactic clothing. 3 fatalities.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 27 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, two armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a woman in the intersection of Norte 54 street and Henry Ford avenue, in Colonia Bondojito (drive-by). The victim was the leader of vendors in the city's downtown. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, around the municipality of Elota (coded to La Cruz), Sinaloa, army officers and armed groups clashed in an area between Elota and San Ignacio municipalities. Two men died (an officer and an armed individual), and four were injured (an officer and three armed individuals). Vehicles used by armed men were abandoned across the communities of Barras de Piaxtla, Estacion Dimas, Celestino Gasca, La Cruz de Elota, Higueras de Abuya and Jacola. Two of the armed individuals were later arrested, carrying fireweapons and a grenade. 2 fatalities

On 21 September 2024, in Ciudad Constitucion, Baja California Sur, two state police officers were kidnapped by a group of armed men. According to the investigations, this event is related to a revenge by criminal groups linked to Los Mayitos gang. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 28 September 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, members of Los Rusos and Los Salazar gangs clashed. The first is an armed branch of Los Mayos gang (Sinaloa Cartel) while Los Salazar were an armed branch linked to Los Chapitos gang (Sinaloa Cartel). Five people were killed. After the clash, army and state police officers intervened and arrested three gang leaders. 5 fatalities.

On 1 October 2024, close to Lazaro Cardenas, Chiapas, military officers detected two vehicles that fled after the military attempted to intervene on the Villa Comitatlan-Huixtla highway between Lazaro Cardenas and Los Cocos. Military officers opened fire at the vehicles killing four migrants and injuring 12. Later, two of the injured migrants died at the hospital. The migrants were from Egypt, Nepal, Cuba, India, Pakistan and Arab countries. 6 fatalities, 10 injuries.

Around 25 September 2024 (between 20 September - 2 October), in San Agustin Tlaxiaca, Hidalgo, five men were killed and their burned bodies were found on 2 October at a mass grave in Puerto Mexico. The five men were reported missing between 20 and 21 September in Pachuca. 5 fatalities.

On 29 September 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, an armed man shot and killed a woman and a man. According to the investigations, the attack was directed to the man while the woman's killing was a collateral damage. It is suspected that the perpetrator was a criminal group. The woman who also was killed, was the daughter of the tourism director of the municipality. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Los Lobos, Guanajuato, four people were killed and their bodies were found in a crop. This attack is likely related to a series of attack perpetrated by the Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel. 4 fatalities.

Around 25 September 2024 (between 21 September - 2 October), close to Santo Domingo, Baja California Sur, two state police officers who were reported missing on 21 September were found dead on 2 October on the Ciudad Insurgentes-La Purisima highway at the junction to the entrance to Santo Domingo. 2 fatalities.

On 27 September 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two armed individuals shot and killed a man on a public bus in the intersection of Mariano Otero avenue Tormenta street, in Colonia Jardines del Bosque. According to witnesses, the victim was being chased since the irregular settlement of Pueblo Nuevo. A woman passenger was injured by glass fragments caused by the gunshots. The perpetrators fled on two motorbikes driven by other two people. 1 fatality.
On 27 September 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed men entered 'Don Agustin' bar in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo and shot at people, killing four men and injuring another. 4 fatalities.

On 27 September 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, armed individuals shot at people inside a house in San Martin Mexicapam, Colonia Soledad. Two people were killed and another was injured. 2 fatalities.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), near Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets on the road leading to Los Audelo ranch and Monte Alban archeological site. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, in Ojo de Agua, Mexico, armed individuals shot and killed a man in a square near the toll on Mexico-Pachuca road. According to witnesses, the victim's wife and son were present and fled in a vehicle. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2024, in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, six men hit and stabbed two men on Circuito de Gran Morelos street, in Fraccionamiento La Ciudadela, killing one. The victims were brothers. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man on the parking lot of an Oxxo store on Del Ahuehuete avenue, in Fraccionamiento Urbi Quinta del Cedro. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses, two armed men arrived on a motorcycle and shot at two women and a man who were inside a beer store in Infonavit de San Aparicio Norte. One victim was killed and two were injured. Two of the victims are relatives of a criminal leader who was recently killed. 1 fatality.
Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in La Loma de San Jose, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic. 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in San Pedro Comitancillo, Oaxaca, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets near a ranch in the region of Istmo de Tehuantepec. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men shot and injured four people in Colonia Villas del Real. A young 13 year-old girl who was a passer-by was also injured with a stray bullet. 5 injured.
On 30 September 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, according to relatives, two armed men shot and killed a man in his house in Colonia Portal del Fraile. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, several armed men shot at four people who were in the pantheon in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas del Rio. Two people were killed and another two were injured. 2 fatalities.
On 30 September 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, two armed men shot and killed two men on their way to work in colonia Hacienda Renacimiento. 2 fatalities.

On 30 September 2024, in Nexticapan, Puebla, two armed men shot at people who were in a street food stall on the Zacapoaxtla -Zaragoza road. Three people were killed and two more were injured. Among the victims were the former director of the Teziutlan Water Operating System and his son. The former director had been arrested along with his family members after drugs were found in his house in 2022. 3 fatalities.
On 30 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, three armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Postal. Three men were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed two men in a bus stop in Colonia Hacienda Renacimiento. The perpetrators ran away with their accomplices. 2 fatalities.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
notes: Around 1 October 2024 (as reported), in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, a trans woman and activist was killed and her body was found with signs of torture. The attack is being investigated as a hate crime. 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

notes: On 1 October 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Colonia Independencia. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man in the hotel zone and escaped with jet skis. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Cuautla, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals arrived who arrived on a motorcycle and shot a man seven times in the center of the city. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 2 October 2024, in Silao de la Victoria, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officers who finished his shift on the road to El Pentagono. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals opened fire at a man while he was traveling in a vehicle in Colonia Aviacion. The victim was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 2 October 2024, in Zacatepec de Hidalgo, Morelos, two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Vicente Guerrero. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket and with signs of violence in Colonia Nuevo Triunfo. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, an unknown armed individuals shot a man nine times and killed him in the center of the city. The victim was identified as the secretary of the City Council from the PRI party. 1 fatality.
On 3 October 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man in Jesus del Monte at least 30 times. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, two armed men entered a home and shot two women, one of whom was a 14-year-old girl, and injured another two in Colonia Valle de Santa Maria. 2 fatalities, 2 injuries.
Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, one man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets and with signs of violence in Colonia Camino Verde. 1 fatality.
Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), close to Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets on the Tijuana-Tecate highway. 1 fatality.
On 4 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men entered an establishment and shot at customers and employees. Two women and a man employees died as a result. 3 fatalities.

On 4 October 2024, close to El Salitrillo, Aguascalientes, a motorcyclist threw a firecracker at a trailer driven by a man which caught fire at the junction with the federal highway 22 to set a (narco) roadblock. The man has unharmed. The event took place after an armed clash was reported with officials leading to the arrest of three members of an organized crime group. There were no casualties.

On 4 October 2024, in Santiago de Queretaro, Queretaro, armed men attacked a music group in a parking lot after a performance in Colonia Alhambra shooting them repeatedly. Two men died as a result. One of the victims was a relative of several Villagran's government workers, including the Councilwoman, the Director of Ecology, and the executive secretary of the Comprehensive Protection System. 2 fatalities.

On 1 October 2024, in Puerta de Anzar, Colima, armed individuals opened fire at officer of the Navy and the state police on patrol who repelled the aggression. Six armed individuals were killed as a result. 6 fatalities.
On 4 October 2024, close to Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes, an armed clash was reported between armed individuals and the military and National Guard officers. There were no casualties.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; Noroeste
notes: On 4 October 2024, in Colonia Independencia (known as Chinitos), Sinaloa, an armed clash was reported between the Navy and armed individuals which led to the crash of the truck on the Benito Juarez highway. The clash came after the Navy attacked a vehicle during an operation in La Palma (coded separately), while other versions suggest that the clash was initiated by the Navy officers. There are reports of armed individuals spreading tire punctures in the area. This clash is suspected to be related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

On 4 October 2024, in La Palma, Sinaloa, a helicopter belonging to the Navy fired at a moving car on the international highway and armed men in the vehicle answered the attack. The event led to confrontations in Angostura and Navolato municipalities (coded separately). This clash is suspected to be related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

On 28 September 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals on pick-up vans and municipal police officers clashed on Vistas del Rio avenue towards Potrero and Ebanos streets, in Ejido Calderon, where the armed individuals were arrested. There were no casualties.

On 2 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who were attending to a report in Colonia Villas de Santa Rosa. The officers repelled the aggression. One armed individual died as a result and two policemen were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injuries.

On 3 October 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, armed individuals including a minor opened fire at military officers, municipal, ministerial, and state police officers as well as the National Guard in Colonia La Esperanza who repelled the aggression. One minor armed individual was injured and arrested as a result. 1 injury.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 3 October 2024, in Tuxpan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash in Colonia Jardines. The clash continued in other neighborhoods like Colonia Campo Real. There were no casualties.

On 2 October 2024, in La Colorada, Michoacan de Ocampo, three armed men opened fire at officers of the National Guard on patrol who repelled the aggression injuring three men. All three were arrested and transported to the hospital. 3 injuries.

On 3 October 2024, in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, armed men opened fire at state police officers who repelled the aggression in Colonia Las Garzas. Four armed men were killed and three were arrested. One truck was seized. 4 fatalities.

On 29 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, an armed man shot and injured the security guard of Marbella bar, on Diaz Ordaz boulevard, in Colonia Veracruz. The perpetrator fled in a car and was later arrested.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy
notes: Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in Alta Rosa, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found burned inside a vehicle on the Maxipista Culiacan - Mazatlan. The victim was identified as the brother of two former mayors of Elota, one of which is also a former local and federal congressman and former leader of the National Farmers Confederation. The victim had disappeared from La Papalota ranch on 27 September 2024. His body was found after several clashes recorded on this same road on 28 September (coded separately), it is unclear if the victim was killed during these clashes. 1 fatality.
Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence and with their hands tied up. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in Quiroga, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied in a building under construction on Francisco I. Madero Poniente avenue. 1 fatality.

Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found inside a burnt van by the old hut on km. 26 of Reynosa-San Fernando road, near a place known as 'Los Patos'. The van had bullet impacts. This event is suspectedly linked to the rivalry between criminal groups in the area. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Carrillo Puente (coded to Tamarindo), Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and 'tiro de gracia' in a cane sugar field by the path that leads to Barbecho river. The victim had disappeared on 19 September 2024. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 29 September 2024, in Acayucan, Veracruz, according to witnesses, armed individuals entered a house and killed two people. Among the victims, there was the brother of a farmer leader in the region. According to the investigations, the event is suspected to be related to drug dealing. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, five men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds, and the hands tied in Santa Lidia, near Roble street, in Colonia Bosques del Seminario. Another, three victims were also injured by the same perpetrators. According to the investigations, two of the victims were a contractor and his son. The perpetrators arrived to his house in Colonia Roble and had already six of his workers tied up by the hands. The contractor and his son ran away but were shot and injured. The perpetrators then kidnapped the other six workers and killed them. 5 fatalities. 3 injuries.
Around 29 September 2024 (month of), in Comalcalco, Tabasco, a woman was killed and her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and dismembered in Ranch Norte. 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found set on fire on a bench in Colonia Martires del Rio Blanco. Also in Cuernavaca, a man was killed and his body was found with the feet and hands tied in his house in the intersection of Vicente Guerrero and Emiliano Zapata streets, in Colonia Morelos. 2 fatalities.

On 29 September 2024, in El Cayaco, Guerrero, armed individuals on a van shot at people who were outside a garage on Acapulco-Pinotepa Nacional federal road (drive-by). Five people (four men and a woman) were killed. 5 fatalities.
Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in El Higueral, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his burnt body was found with gunshot wounds on a side of San Lorenzo river. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; La Silla Rota
notes: Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Linares, Nuevo Leon, at least four people were killed and their human remains were found inside bags with a message signed by a criminal group in Ejido Los Hoyos. This event is related to a fight between criminal groups. At least 4 fatalities.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Manzanillo, Colima, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture and the hands and feed tied by Del Mojo river, in the border area between Colima and Jalisco. 1 fatality.
On 29 September 2024, in Santiago, Colima, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Ojo de Agua street, in Colonia El Jabali (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found semi-naked with his hands tied up inside the trunk of a car in Villa Fontana Aqua. The victim was missing since a day before. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two people were killed and their bodies were found with their feet and hands tied up with signs of violence inside the trunk of a car in supermanzana 206. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed by members of a criminal groups and his body was found inside the trunk of a car in Colonia Santa Rosa del Valle. 1 fatality.
On 30 September 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, several armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Colonia Valle de San Blas. 1 fatality.
On 30 September 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by in Oblatos. 1 fatality.
Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in Nueva Colonia, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found burned. 1 fatality.
Around 30 September 2024 (month of), in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, a person was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition, gagged and with signs of violence. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, at least one person was killed and only a head and a torso were found inside two suitcases in Colonia Reforma with a message. At least 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2024 (as reported), in Comala municipality, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found with his feet and hands tied up and with signs of torture on the road between Suchitlan to Carrizalillos communities.

On 1 October 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, two men on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Jardines de la Hacienda and then fled the scene (drive-by). The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 2 October 2024 (as reported), in Anacleto Canabal 3ra seccion, Tabasco, a person was killed and the body was found gagged and with several gunshot wounds. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.
Around 2 October 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found burned inside a home in Colonia 11 de febrero. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Milpillas with a message next to his body accusing the victim of belonging to La Familia Michoacana cartel. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 2 October 2024 (as reported), in Perote, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two men and one woman were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence inside a house near the military base. The attack us suspected to be linked to drug dealing groups that operate in the area, although this is not confirmed officially. 3 fatalities.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in San Francisco Ixhuatan, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied, with signs of torture and with the 'tiro de gracia'. The man was a state police officer who was walking with his daughter when he was kidnapped. 1 fatality.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, one person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets and in a sack in Colonia Cerro Colorado. Messages were found next to the body. 1 fatality.
Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and a message next to his body in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. 1 fatality.
Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, a person was killed and the mutilated body was found inside a cooler in Colonia Villas de Alcala. 1 fatality.
Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found tied and with signs of torture in Cumbres industrial park. 1 fatality.
On 4 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man opened fire from a moving vehicle and shot and injured a woman in Colonia Hacienda del Sol (drive-by). 1 injury.

On 1 October 2024, in Ahuehuetla, Guerrero, criminal members shot at elements of the National Guard, Ministerial police officers and military forces during a patrol. Three armed men were killed. Weapons and drugs were seized. 3 fatalities.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 28 September 2024, in Potrerillo del Norote, Sinaloa, rival armed groups clashed on the highway known as 'Maxipista Culiacan-Mazatla'. Armed men set a (narco) roadblock using an abandoned vehicle. Several other related clashes were recorded on the same day in other communities along this road (coded separately). This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel that started on 9 September (coded separately). There were no casualties.

Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Santa Maria Xonacatepec, Puebla, six people were killed and their bodies were found dismembered inside two vehicles that were set on fire in Colonias Jardines de San Jose. According to the investigations, the burned vehicles are related to fuel theft and robbery of transporters on highways. Local reports stated that this incident is related to Los Lampones Gang since the van set on fire on the highway is believed to be related to a suspected member of this gang. 6 fatalities.

Around 3 October 2024 (between 2 October - 4 October), in Aquiles Serdan, Tabasco, armed individuals traveling in two vehicles followed and ambushed an off-duty state police when he was returning home from work and opened fire at him, causing the man to crash. Afterwards, the armed individuals set fire to the vehicle. A message was found next to the vehicle. The man was kidnapped and a video surfaced showing the victim confessing to his participation in criminal acts. On 4 October, the man's decapitated head was found at KM 20 on the Macuspana-Villahermosa highway and the body was found at the entrance to Aquiles Serdan inside a cooler. 1 fatality.

Around 18 September 2024 (between 30 August - 9 October), in El Sauz, Chihuahua, two men and a woman were killed and their dismembered bodies were found near a cave around the hill known as 'El Indio Victorio' on 9 October. The woman was Chihuahua's municipal police commissioner, and one of the men was her husband. Both were abducted from their house in Nuevo Delicias on 1 September 2024. The other victim had disappeared from Nuevo Delicias on 30 August 2024. 3 fatalities.

On 6 October 2024, in Lazaro Cardenas, Baja California, there was an armed clash between rival gangs in which five people died, and between five and ten were injured. Authorities arrived at the place and arrested between one and five individuals. 5 fatalities.

On 6 October 2024, in Lazaro Cardenas, Baja California, during a security operation, National Guard and army officers clashed with armed individuals. The armed individuals were likely part of one of the gang groups that clashed the same day (coded separately). Three armed individuals were killed. 3 fatalities.

Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Mexicali, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found in fraccionamiento Villas del Colorado with his hands tied, wrapped in plastic and a message next to him indicating his responsibility in a femicide. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in the Mexicali Valley (coded to Mexicali), Baja California, armed individuals shot at a car on km. 43, killing a man and injuring another. The dead victim was a businessman that sold satelite internet and repaired cellphones. The injured man worked at a car wash. 1 fatality, 1injured.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside a suitcase in Colonia Libertad Parte Baja. A message was found next to the suitcase. Unspecified fatalities coded to 3.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with the limbs tied on a side of Libramiento Rosas Magallon, in Colonia Pedregal de Santa Julia. 1 fatality.
Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets in Colonia Libertad Parte Alta. 1 fatality.
On 8 October 2024, in Calkini, Campeche, at least five armed individuals entered a house in San Martin neighborhood, had an argument with a man, and shot and killed him. 1 fatality.
On 30 September 2024, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, two armed men on a motorcycle shot at a taxi driver in a drive-by on Avenida Benito Juarez. There were no casualties.
On 9 October 2024, in Romerillo, Chiapas, six armed individuals entered a house in the indigenous community and shot and injured three men. 3 injured.

Around 5 October 2024 (between 4 - 5 October), in the municipality of La Concordia, Chiapas, two fishermen were killed, and their bodies were found with signs of torture and tied floating in the La Angostura dam on 5 October. The victims were kidnapped a day earlier by unknown individuals together with two other fishermen while fishing in the Rizo de Oro community. The whereabouts of the remaining victims are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), close to Juan Aldama, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back and gunshot wounds on the highway Aldama-Chihuahua at KM 24. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, a man shot and killed a young man in the Tepito area. It is suspected that this was a dispute about the smuggling of tobacco of foreign origin and that both are members of criminal groups that operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 5 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Magdalena Contreras, armed individuals chased a man on his motorcycle and opened fire at him repeatedly (drive-by) in Colonia El Ocotal. 1 fatality.
On 7 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlahuac, two men aboard a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a van in Colonia Del Mar (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Moctezuma Primera Seccion while he was standing with several friends. The perpetrators fled in a truck and on a motorcycle. Police officers arrested one man. 1 fatality.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico, a man was abducted by several individuals, according to him. The victim managed to escape and sought assistance from police officers when he was being moved on a vehicle on the Orizaba-Puebla highway, near the area known as 'El Trebol de Escamela.'

Around 9 October 2024 (month of), in Salagua, Colima, a person was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and with burns on several parts of the body between the remains of a bonfire in Fraccionamiento Marimar. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot at a bar leaving four dead and one wounded. This is the second attack on a bar in the city in two days. 4 fatalities, 1 injury.
On 7 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed individuals shot and killed a 18-year old man walking on the street in Colonia Residencial Tecnologico. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Universal (Mexico); Mural
notes: On 9 October 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, unidentified armed individuals shot at a vehicle on Avenida Gobernadores. A man was killed and a woman was injured. The man was a leader of Los Tlacos gang and a former member of Los Beltran Leyva Cartel. He was also a former ministerial police officer. According to local sources, the victim had agreements with the Mayor who was executed a few days ago. It is suspected that these events were done by Los Ardillos gang, who found out later about their agreement, which caused the killing of both victims. Another version, indicates that he was a member of Los Rojos gang. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Acapulco; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 8 October 2024, in Olinala, Guerrero, armed individuals in a pick up van entered the town and abducted a man. His relatives requested assistance from the Olinala Communal Militia, whose members immediately intervene, clashed with the armed individuals and released the abducted. In the clash, a person was killed and another was injured. The residents later detained and lynched two of the armed individuals (coded separately). 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Acapulco; Milenio
notes: On 8 October 2024, in Olinala, Guerrero, tens of residents and members of Olinala Communal Militia detained, tied, lynched, shot, and set fire to two armed individuals that had entered the town and clashed with the militia earlier the same day (coded separately). Following these events, classes and public transport were suspended in the area, and state police, army and National Guard officers were deployed to maintain security in the municipality. 2 fatalities.

On 9 October 2024, in La Palma, Guerrero, according to residents, armed men dressed with clothes from the Marine kidnapped eight young people from the community. The armed men also beaten up women and destroyed houses (methods unknown). According to local neighbors, the event is related to criminal groups. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. Casualties unknown.

On 6 October 2024, in Teloloapan, Guerrero, several armed men shot and killed two women and a man in the municipal market. A threatening message was found next to the victims stating that 'this is going to happen to everyone who supports the Marrano (pig).' 3 fatalities.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Teloloapan, Guerrero, a 17 year-old man was killed and his beheaded body was found on the Teloloapan-Iguala road. A threatening message was found next to the victim stating that 'this is going to happen to everyone who supports the Marrano (pig).' It is suspected that the victim was a relative of the 3 people killed on 6 October in a market (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2024, in Tula, Hidalgo, four state police officers killed a man in Fraccionamiento Arboledas. The body was found with gunshot wounds by Requena canal. The four suspected perpetrators were arrested around 9 October 2024. 1 fatality.
On 9 October 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, several armed men shot and killed two people and injured another two in Colonia Valentin Gomez Farias. 2 fatalities.

source: Borderland Beat; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova
notes: On 10 October 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, the state prosecutor's office was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the parking lot of a self-service store in Colonia Jardines Alcalde. 1 fatality.
