Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, four men were abducted by an unknown number of perpetrators. On 9 October 2024, police officers located them with the hands tied and blindfolded in a house in Colonia San Miguel and released them.

On 7 October 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, armed individuals in two vehicles caught up with a man driving his car in Colonia Central Nueva and shot him (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic inside a suitcase in fraccionamiento Casa Blanca. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured the driver of a public bus that was cleaning the vehicle in Colonia Mesa Colorada Oriente (drive-by). 1 injured.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Atlautla, Mexico, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a public bus on Mexico-Cuautla federal road, by Santa Rita, in an area known as 'Las Delicias', injuring the driver (drive-by). The event is suspectedly linked to extorsion.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Chimalhuacan, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found on a bench in the intersection of Arca de Noe avenue and Tizoc street, in Colonia Acuitlapilco, together with a blanket with a threatening message against criminal groups that operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in San Lorenzo Nenamicoyan, Mexico, four people were killed and their burnt bodies were found inside a car. A skull was also found inside the vehicle (not included as a fatality). 5 fatalities.

Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and his head decapitated and placed inside a box in the housing unit El Rosario. 1 fatality.
Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' near the Cointzio dam in Colonia La Campana. 1 fatality.
On 8 October 2024, in Paracho de Verduzco, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed individuals shot and killed a hairdresser inside the barbershop that he owned on Aquiles Serdan street. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, near Puerta Chica, Michoacan de Ocampo, army, National Guard and Civil Guard officers clashed with members of a gang. A farmer was injured by a stray bullet. Officers arrested two armed men and seized eight firearms, two grenades, drugs and stolen vehicles. There were no fatalities.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Cuautla, Morelos, a woman was killed and her dismembered body was found in and around plastic bags on Sureno Carranza and Sufragio Efectivo streets, in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. 1 fatality.
On 6 October 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, two men travelling on a motorcycle opened fire at three people in Colonia Lagunilla. All three were injured as a result. 3 injuries.
On 10 October 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals threw an explosive device which damage a tortilla shop (likely empty) in colonia Emiliano Zapata.

On 6 October 2024, in Temixco, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle arrived at a bar, opened fire and then fled the scene (drive-by) in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. Two people were killed and two were injured. 2 fatalities, 2 injuries.
On 5 October 2024, in Xochitepec, Morelos, two men who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Colonia Nuevo Morelos and then fled the scene. 1 fatality.
On 9 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a food delivery man in Colonia Ebanos. The victim was found with drugs. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot at the state police around colonias Paseo del Roble, Valle del Carrizal and Cerrada de Vendanova. The police repelled the attack. One police officer was injured.

On 7 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, one armed individual stopped in front of a house in Colonia Paseo de Capellania and opened fire at a man (drive-by) from the vehicle. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

On 10 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed men in colonia Real San Joaquin. According to local sources, the event took place around a place known to be a drug dealing point. Two armed men were killed. 2 fatalities.

On 7 October 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, several armed individuals entered a home in Colonia Laderas de San Manuel and stabbed two people. One was killed and the other was injured. The home is believed to be linked to the sale of drugs. Two armed individuals were arrested. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 11 October 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed two men in a drive-by in Colonia Infonavit Felipe Carrillo Puerto. Another version, is that according to witnesses, an armed man killed them. 2 fatalities.
On 7 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, at least two armed men opened fire at two teenagers in Colonia Urbivilla del Real. Both teenagers were injured as a result. 2 injuries.
Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Linares, Nuevo Leon, a person was killed and the body was found burned during a police operation. 1 fatality.

On 10 October 2024, in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, eight armed men from a criminal group travelling in two vehicles entered a house and kidnapped a young man in Colonia Santa Engracia. The perpetrators also shot at another house and set it on fire. According to the investigations, the event is a retaliation against a man who had been previously threatened. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. The perpetrators later clashed with municipal police officers (coded separately).

On 10 October 2024, in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between municipal police officers and members of a criminal group after they kidnapped a young man (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
On 7 October 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a moving vehicle (drive-by) in Colonia Villa Luz and killed a man. 1 fatality.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man that was driving a vehicle on the old path to Villa Garcia, near the Industrial Park. 1 fatality.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
notes: Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied and with gunshot wounds to his body in a field. 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

notes: On 7 October 2024, in San Juan Juquila Mixes, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals killed three victims who were called to do a job as bricklayers. One of the victim's hands were cut off and a narco message was found next to the bodies. 3 fatalities.
Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Santo Tomas Jalieza, Oaxaca, two legs and an arm were found on the free highway at the height of a tourist site. At least 1 injury.

Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), close to San Jose Buena Vista, Puebla, the secretary of the ejidal commissioner of Ajalpan was killed and his body was found with signs of torture after he was kidnapped at the cemetery close to La Trinidad. The man had the 'tiro de gracia'. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2024 (month of), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found in fraccionamiento La Hacienda covered in a blanket. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.
On 9 October 2024, in Jesus Maria, Queretaro, two armed individuals shot and killed four women and a man inside a house. 5 fatalities.

On 11 October 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, an armed man shot and killed a woman in Supermanzana 60. According to local sources, the victim was killed due to extortion of the 'fee floor'. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, burned and shot to death. The man's hands were tied to his back and his face was covered in tape. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Alta Rosa, Sinaloa, two men were killed and their bodies were found covered by blankets, with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on a path between Baila and El Espinal. 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals chased, shot and killed a 16 years-old boy on Leonardo Magana street, between Sinaloa and Ruffo E. Vitela streets, in Colonia Municipio Libre. 1 fatality.

Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, two men were killed and their bodies were found inside bags with two messages addressed to criminal groups in Colonia Campestre. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, according to a witness, an armed man shot and killed two men that were drinking on Cuatro street, in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. The perpetrator shot several times and gave the 'tiro de gracia' to both victims. 2 fatalities.
On 10 October 2024, in Villa Parrilla, Tabasco, armed individuals shot at the facilities that state police officers were guarding. Two state police officers were injured.

Around 3 October 2024 (between 1 October - 4 October), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found tied and with a gunshot to his head in the industrial zone on 4 October. The man was reported missing on 1 October. 1 fatality.
Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Reforma with his hands tied to his back. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, according to witnesses, at least two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man that was driving a van on Chicanel street, on a side of Diana Laura Rojas park, in Colonia Infonavit Industrial (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: Imagen del Golfo; Milenio; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 10 October 2024, around Villahermosa, Tabasco, unidentified armed individuals shot at municipal police officers on the Villahermosa-Teapa highway around km 15. One police officer was injured. Also another two people were injured with stray bullets. This event was part of a series of related events that were also reported around the city (coded separately). According to local sources, is related to a dispute between criminal groups. Another version also indicates that these actions were a respond to actions made by the authorities.
On 6 October 2024, in Zapotal, Tabasco, a group of armed men shot and killed two men at a ranch. One of the victims was identified as a former municipal police officer. 2 fatalities.

On 5 October 2024, in C-32, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals shot at individuals outside a beer warehouse in C-32 and kidnapped a man. The kidnapped man was later found in C-40 dead and with a message next to his body. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, in Huimanguillo, Tabasco, according to witnesses, a group of armed individuals shot and killed a man on the road that connects Fraccionamiento Pomoca and Colonia Galaxia, near Resequin and Montana ranches, in the area bordering the municipality of Cardenas. The perpetrators left a cardboard with a message signed by 'The people' and threatening those that steal Oxxo stores, vehicles, motorbikes and houses. According to the message, the perpetrators had identified more suspected criminals and there will be more attacks against them. 1 fatality.

Around 8 October 2024 (month of), in Chiltepec, Tabasco, a man was killed and his beheaded and dismembered body was found in an advance state of decomposition inside a plastic bag in the mangroves. 1 fatality.

Around 11 October 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, a leader of the Gulf Cartel was killed and his body was found with signs of torture behind the Jardines del Recuerdo Pantheon. The event occurred in a context of growing internal tensions within the cartel, with the Ciclones-Escorpiones faction at the center of the dispute. 1 fatality.
Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a person was killed and the human remains were found wrapped in a shower curtain close to Colonia Paseo del Prado. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 10 October 2024, in Minatitlan, Veracruz, armed men shot at a man in Colonia Buenavista Norte. The victim died later at the hospital. A street vendor was also injured with a stray bullet. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 2 October 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, several armed individuals kidnapped two 17 year old boys in Colonia Industrial near the high school Benito Juarez. One boy was freed on 6 October. The whereabouts of the other victim are unknown.

Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and covered in sheets close to fraccionamiento Abel Davila Garcia. 2 fatalities.

On 11 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, according to witnesses, an armed man shot and killed a man in the metro station Tepalcates. The perpetrator ran away with his accomplice. According to the investigations, the victim is suspected to be a member of La Union Tepito and the event is related to a dispute between criminal groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2024, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in colonia Santa Barbara. The event is related to a narco-message that was set by the CJNG, which had promised to 'cleanse Campeche' of people linked to extortion and the collection of protection money. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2024, in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, an employee of the Treasury Department of the Government of Chiapas was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals when he was taking his son to school in Colonia 15 de septiembre. His son was also injured but died a day later at the hospital. The victim worked as an administrative analyst in the Administrative Process Innovation Area of the Treasury Department of Chiapas. 2 fatalities.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); Hoy Tamaulipas; La Jornada; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 11 October 2024, in Xicotencatl, Tamaulipas, a local PAN deputy was almost kidnapped by at least four armed men travelling on motorcycles and a vehicle who entered to his property in Lupita ranch. One version, indicates that two of his bodyguards were killed, however, this was not confirmed by the authorities. The victim is the brother of the former PAN candidate for the government of Tamaulipas and current federal deputy. A day later he was found alive after he hid in his property.
Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Campo Patricia, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found burned in Campo Patricia on the Culiacan-El Dorado highway. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), around Campo Victoria, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied up on the road to Navolato. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, four men abducted an American man. National Guard and army officers arrested the perpetrators including a person of American origin, in a house in Colonia Obrera, where they also seized three fireweapons and drugs. It is not known whether the victim was located and released.
On 11 October 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, members of a criminal group kidnapped two young girls when they entered a house in fraccionamiento Balcones. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 16 October 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, at least three armed men kidnapped a man. In response, police located the vehicle and arrested the three men.

On 16 October 2024, in Villa Juarez, Sonora, a man threatened passersby with a machete and attempted to attack municipal police officers who arrived at the place. The officers shot and killed him. 1 fatality.

The officers seized a fireweapon and six explosive devices. Casualties unknown.

On 17 October 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, state police, army and National Guard officers clashed with three members of the Cartel del Noreste (CDN) in Colonia Las Americas. The three individuals were arrested. One of them suspectedly is the cartel's local leader. The officers seized three fireweapons and four explosive devices. There were no casualties.

Police officers arrived at the place and arrested one of the perpetrators. It is unknown whether the second victim was released.

notes: On 28 September 2024, in Jacola, Sinaloa, rival armed groups clashed on the highway known as 'Maxipista Culiacan-Mazatla'. Several other related clashes were recorded on the same day in other communities along this road (coded separately). This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel that started on 9 September (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 17 October 2024, in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, state and municipal police officers clashed with suspected members of the Cartel del Noreste (CDN) around the boulevard located at the entry of the municipality. A member of the cartel died and two were arrested. Also in Montemorelos, later the same day, police officers and members of the CDN clashed at the General Hospital, where a cartel member was killed and another was injured and arrested. These events are part of three clashes between authorities and the CDN that took place in Nuevo Leon the same day (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

According to the authorities, this event is related to a dispute between criminal groups dedicated to drug dealing and Huachicoleo (fuel theft). 3 fatalities.

This attack is suspectedly linked to a dispute over drug deals and the illegal extraction of fuel, and to the killing of six other people whose bodies were found in Puerto Mexico on 3 October 2024 (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

According to military sources, the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) and Los Caballeros Templarios Gang were involved in this clash. This event is linked to a clash that took place the same day in Puerta Chica, also known as Barrio Seco (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

According to military sources, the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) and Los Caballeros Templarios Gang were involved in this clash. This event is linked to a clash that took place the same day in Los Bancos (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); La Silla Rota; Noroeste; Sintesis
notes: On 20 October 2024, in Acayuca, Hidalgo, armed individuals on a vehicle shot at a van with a man, a woman, and a child on Cipres street in Colonia Los Jorges (drive-by). On 21 October 2024, in Nuevo Salto Grande, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals (likely affiliated with the Sinaloa Cartel) and the military forces, the National Guard and the State police. The armed individuals also set a (narco) roadblock at the entrance of the community. This event is related to similar clashes involving factions of the Sinaloa Cartel recorded in other locations of this state (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 18 October 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals chased, shot, and killed a man in the intersection of Valencia and Granda streets, in Colonia La Espanola. 1 fatality.
On 18 October 2024, in San Jose Vista Hermosa, Morelos, according to witnesses, two armed individuals entered a house, and shot and killed an Indigenous woman. 1 fatality.
On 18 October 2024, in Xoxocotla, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals chased, shot, and killed an Indigenous woman near Alpuyeca-Jojutla federal road. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot at a man while he was getting into an Uber car on Torrecillas avenue, in Colonia Lomas Taurinas, killing him and the driver. 2 fatalities.

On 19 October 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to the victim, three individuals abducted a 17-years old boy in Colonia Herrera and released him in Fraccionamiento Real del Mar. The authorities arrested three men, two of whom were former municipal police officers.
Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Tuzantan, Chiapas, two people were killed and their bodies were found inside plastic bags floating on the Islamapa river. 2 fatalities.
On 20 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a man in the city center. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2024, in Jacona de Plancarte, Michoacan, a municipal commander who was off-duty was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals inside a restaurant in colonia Lomas de San Pablo. A woman who was with him was also killed. 2 fatalities.

Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), near Santa Eulalia, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets and bags on a path near CERESO, in Libramiento Oriente, Colonia Ladrilleras Sur. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot at a house in Dolores Avellanal street. One woman was killed and another two people were injured. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside several bags in colonia Centro. According to witnesses, two men left the bags. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

source: El Blog del Narco; La Jornada
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Yajalon, Chiapas, the mayor of Chilon municipality was attacked during a trip by unidentified armed individuals. The mayor was not injured. The mayor has just took over the position on 1 October.
On 22 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, two men on a motorcycle stopped in front of a home and shot a man in Colonia San Miguelito Segundo Sector. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 22 October 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, two men on a motorcycle approached a man outside his home in Colonia Cajeme and shot him. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses, a groups of armed men shot and killed at the owner business of a car store in Bulevar Valsequillo. Also in Puebla, three armed individuals entered a store and shot the owner and injured a woman in Colonia Xilotzingo. 2 fatalities.
On 22 October 2024, in Monte Adentro, Tabasco, a couple of armed men entered a home and killed a man inside his home. The attack is being investigated for linkages to extortion. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, a couple of armed men shot three municipal police officers (likely off-duty) and former federal police officers inside a bar in Colonia Nuevo Celaya. All three died as a result. 3 fatalities.
On 23 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Alvaro Obregon, two men opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Oliver del Conde segunda seccion. The perpetrators escaped on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, three armed individuals shot and killed a man and injured his partner close to Camino Real. The man died as a result and the woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in San Francisco Cuautlancingo, Puebla, a person was killed and the human remains were found wrapped in a sheet the Volkswagen housing unit 2. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, close to Santa Maria La Nopalera, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the construction councilor of City Hall between Santa Maria La Nopalera and El Malucano. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Tlaltizapan, Morelos, two armed individuals arrived on a motorcycle and shot a man driving in his car in Colonia El Mirador while he was parked. The victim died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 24 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Diaz Ordaz and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Linares, Nuevo Leon, a couple was killed and the bodies were found with signs of torture at the entrance to Ejido Berlanga Garcia. 2 fatalities.
On 24 October 2024, in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals opened fire and shot and killed two men in Colonia Arboledas del Rio Pilon. 2 fatalities.

On 24 October 2024, in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, two men on a motorcycle arrived and shot at a retired military man in Colonia Hacienda de Oro who repelled the aggression by shooting a gun. The man died as a result and the victim was identified as a former military officer. 1 fatality.
Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Zirimbo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in an avocado field. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, in Cardenas, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals attacked the former collaborator of the former president of the PRI party in his home in Colonia Tabasco. The victim died as a result and his wife was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 25 October 2024, in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, at least two armed men chased a man through the streets and shot him dead. The victim was found with a gun in his hand and investigators were yet to confirm whether he had the gun or it was put it on him. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, at least two armed individuals opened fire at the facade of a home in Colonia Nuevo Amanecer and injured a woman who is the owner of the home. 1 injury.

On 25 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, several armed individuals opened fire at two men from a roof in Colonia Morelos. Both men died as a result and a woman and a teenager were injured. Also in Venustiano Carranza district, several men entered a home and shot and killed a man in the housing unit Colonia Candelaria de los Patos. 3 fatalities, 2 injuries.
On 25 October 2024, in Los Bancos, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals launched an explosive device from a drone near a kindergarten. There were no injuries.
On 25 October 2024, in Paraiso, Tabasco, two armed individuals threw a molotov cocktail at a barbershop which caught fire while people was inside. There were no injuries.
On 25 October 2024, in San Carlos Yautepec, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals opened fire at the home of a man who is the son of the mayor. The victim was left uninjured.

On 19 October 2024, in Hermosillo, Sonora, two armed individuals shot at two municipal police officers who approached them on a path around the premises of Union Ganadera, killing one and injuring the other. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Acambaro, Guanajuato, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the municipal police during a police control after several armed men shot at the police in Colonia La Carpa. The police repelled the attack. One officer and three armed men were injured.

On 25 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Benito Juarez, state police officers attempted to stop a man with suspicious behavior who opened fire at the police officers in Colonia Santa Cruz Atoyac. The police officers repelled the aggression and injured the man. 1 injury.

On 24 October 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, state police officers intercepted individuals inside a vehicle who shot the police officers and fled the scene Ejido Islita. One state police officer was injured and a civilian was injured as well. 2 injuries.

On 24 October 2024, in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, armed individuals in two vehicles opened fire at state police officers who repelled the aggression and chased the individuals until Colonia Hidalgo. Two armed individuals were killed and two were arrested. Three state police officers were injures. 2 fatalities.
On 25 October 2024, in Comalcalco, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals opened fire at a security guard who died together with a civilian. 2 fatalities.
On 23 October 2024, in Las Arenitas, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no casualties.
On 24 October 2024, in La Y Griega, Sonora, an armed clash was reported between rival groups. The armed suspects threw tire punctures on the road. There were no casualties.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Puerto Mexico, Hidalgo, six people were killed and their bodies were found piled up. One of the perpetrators was arrested and eight others are wanted. This attack is suspectedly linked to a dispute over drug deals and the illegal extraction of fuel, and to the murder of three other people whose bodies were found in El Nopalillo on 16 October 2024 (coded separately). 6 fatalities.

On 17 October 2024, near Macultepec, Tabasco, two armed individuals on a vehicle shot at a man who was driving a van on km. 16 of Villahermosa-Frontera road (drive-by). The victim, uninjured, fled towards the police station in the village of Ocuitlzapotlan, where he received protection. The victim is the deputy homicide prosecutor of the State Attorney General's Office, and had recently been removed from his position at the High Impact and Anti-Kidnapping Deputy District Attorney's Office.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 17 October 2024 (as reported), in Playa Vicente, Veraruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found in his ranch. The victim was an afro-descendant community leader and Afro-Mexican rights and culture activist who had been threatened by criminal organizations. The criminal organizations suspectedly wanted the victim to mediate and grant them the community's support. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, three armed individuals on a vehicle shot and killed a taxi driver on Del Sendero street, between Elisa Garza and Leona Vicario streets, in Colonia Villa Luz (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, armed individuals on a taxi shot and killed a man in the intersection of 106 and Roberto Fierro streets, in Colonia Pavis Borunda (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at people at 'La Guera' butcher's shop on 7 street, in Colonia Juarez Pantitlan, killing three employees (drive-by). 3 fatalities.
Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and a narco-message in colonia Sostenes Valenzuela Miller. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, several armed men shot and killed a man that was driving a motorbike on Gavilanes street, behind Barona's sport fields, in Colonia Unidad Deportiva. The perpetrators left a cardboard with a message in which they accused the victim of stealing motorbikes. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Minatitlan, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and a cardboard with a threatening message inside a car on Minatitlan-Manzanillo road. The victim was affiliated to the PRI and was a former mayor, former municipal president, former local congressman, and former state police officer. 1 fatality.

Around 20 October 2024 (month of), in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with the feet tied with a chain and in an advance state of decomposition on a side of the road that connects the Second Section of Colonia El Bajio and the First Section of Ejido Habanero. 1 fatality.

Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), near Hidalgo del Parral, Chihuhua, a man was killed and his body was found with the head covered in tape, the hands tied, and a message that said 'This happened to you for stealing cars', on km. 50 of the road leading to Parral. 1 fatality.
Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and the body was found beaten up and hanged from a tree. 1 fatality.

Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), near Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a woman was killed and her burnt body was found on km. 3,5 of Libramiento Norte road, near Colonia El Mirador. 1 fatality.
Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, a man was shot and killed by armed men in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Avenida Las Torres. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Charo, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found beheaded. According to the investigations, the victim was killed around four days before. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) two men in Colonia Girasoles. 2 fatalities.
On 21 October 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, an off-duty municipal police officer was shot and killed by armed individuals in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in Plaza del Comercio. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was walking his dog in colonia Chapultepec Norte (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Silao de la Victoria, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Colonia Barrio Nuevo. The event occurred after a fight in which the victim was involved. 1 fatality.
Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found burned in colonia Guayabitos. 1 fatality.
Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets and tied up in Cerro de las Mitras. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle at a taxi driver and a passenger (drive-by) in Colonia Paseo del Nogal. Both were injured as a result. 2 injuries.

Around 22 October 2024 (month of), in Nueva Rosita, Coahuila, a man was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition with bondages around his feet in Ejido San Jose. 1 fatality.
Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Villa de Pozos, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found tied and on the side of the road close to Colonia Los Silos. 1 fatality.
Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Abelardo L. Rodriguez, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a cemetary in Abelardo Rodriguez. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a man from a moving motorcycle (drive-by) in Colonia Cerro de la Silla. The man was injured and transported to the hospital. 1 injury.

Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found tied to a stretcher in Colonia Cima de las Mitras with signs of torture and wrapped in sheets. 1 fatality.

Around 23 October 2024 (month of), in San Jeronimo Caleras, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found tied and with a plastic bag covering the victim's face. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.
Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a couple was killed and the bodies were found tied and covered with a blanket in Colonia La Joya. 2 fatalities.

Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Coyuca de Benitez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the dismembered body was found on the Acapulco-Zihuatanejo highway. The event is linked to a clash that took place in the vicinity of Tecpan de Galeana (coded separately). 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Minatitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and the decapitated head was found at the entrance to the state traffic police station in Colonia Petrolera inside a suitcase. The remains of the body were found on the Cosoleacaque-Acayucan highway. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Tequesquitengo, Morelos, armed individuals traveling in two vehicles opened fire at a man while he was driving on the Galeana-Tequesquitengo highway and shot him (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with hands and feet tied and covered with a plastic bag in Colonia Centro. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Zamora Pico de Oro, Chiapas, two men arrived at the home of the former mayor of Marques de Comillas and shot and killed him in Colonia La Candelaria. The victim was affiliated with the Labor party. 1 fatality.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found underneath a bridge at the ranch Acachapan y Colmena. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, around Caborca, Sonora, there was an armed clash between armed individuals from a criminal group and the military forces and ministerial police. The clash ensued while the officers were carrying out an investigation to look for a man that had been kidnapped a week before on the Caborca-Altar road. Four armed men were killed. 4 fatalities.

On 18 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at houses and vehicles on Yuca street, in Colonia Los Ebanos (drive-by). Armed residents responded and fired back. Police officers later arrested the three people (a man and two underage boys) involved in the shooting, and seized a fireweapon and drugs. Casualties unknown.

On 20 October 2024, in Los Tanques, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. Officers arrived at the place and found seven burning vehicles, one of them armored. This event is suspectedly linked to an armed clash that took place in Higueras de Abuya the same day (coded separately), and is likely part of the war between 'Los Chapitos' and 'Los Mayitos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Mulege, Baja California, a gang leader in the community of Guerrero Negro was shot and killed by armed individuals in a vehicle who intercepted him (drive-by). The victim was placed on the latest criminal map as the one who controlled the flow of weapons and drugs in the northern part of the state. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; Riodoce
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Carboneras, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between suspected members of the Sinaloa Cartel and the military forces. This event is related to a similar clash reported in Alcoyonqui community in the same municipality. During both clashes a total of 19 people were killed. It is unknown the exact number of people who was killed in this location. 19 fatalities split across two clashes coded in Alcoyonqui and Carboneras, 9 fatalities coded in this event.

On 24 October 2024, in Acambaro, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals set an explosive device in a car outside the Municipal Public Security building which exploded. Three officers were injured as a result. The attack also caused damages to the building and two homes. Local authorities, later arrested two men for this incident and another one in Jerecuaro (coded separately). 3 injuries.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota
notes: On 24 October 2024, in Jerecuaro, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals set a bomb into a car which exploded in the historic center damaging buildings and a municipal police car. Local authorities, later arrested two men for this incident and another one in Acambaro (coded separately). There were no injuries.

On 25 September 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a car on Plan Ayala street, in Colonia Tierra y Libertad (drive-by). The driver tried to flee and crashed the vehicle into a house, resulting injured. The perpetrators fled. Also in Uruapan, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a man who was driving on Miguel Hidalgo street, in Colonia Infonavit Rosa de Castilla (drive-by). The victim tried to flee towards Colonia Antorcha Campesina, where he attempted to run over the attackers who chased him. The victim crashed his vehicle into a house in the intersection of Gonzalo Lopez street and Wenceslao Victoria avenue, where he was finally shot and killed. A resident was collaterally injured by a lost bullet. The perpetrators fled in a motorbike. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2024, in Atoyac de Alvarez, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the former Morena councilor together with a companion at the municipal cemetary. 2 fatalities.

On 9 October 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man clashed with municipal police officers when he resisted to stop at a police control on Urani street, in Colonia Santa Barbara. The man shot at the officers, initiating a persecution until he lost control of his vehicle on Maruata avenue, where he crashed. The man got off the vehicle and entered a store, where he died. 1 fatality.
On 19 October 2024, in Soledad de Graciano Sanchez, San Luis Potosi, several armed men shot and killed a man when he was driving on Fraccionamiento Residencial del Bosque. 1 fatality.

Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a state police officer was killed and his beheaded body was found. An armed group had held him and interrogated him under unspecified circumstances. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Urbi Villas del Prado. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Union de San Antonio, Jalisco, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied close to the ranch San Angel on the Union de San Antonio-Lagos de Moreno highway. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men entered a home in Colonia Residencial Los Olivos and shot a man to death. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal transit officer outside the Las Animas Walmart. 1 fatality.
On 26 October 2024, in Escarcega, Campeche, two men arrived at a business and opened fire at the owner and hairdresser in Colonia Benito Juarez. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 26 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, two armed individuals attacked and killed a man at the Central de Abasto (Ceda). One of the perpetrators was found and arrested. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, armed individuals shot at least 30 times and killed a 19 year old man in Colonia Morelos. The victim was linked to the group La Union Tepito. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in San Pedro Huitzapula Norte, Guerrero, there was an armed clash between armed men and members of the San Juan Communal Militia. Thirty minutes later, the same armed individuals opened fire at the home of the Commissioner (unknown if he was inside) and members of the community police San Juan repelled the aggression. There were no injuries.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), near Tetitlan, Guerrero, four people were killed and their bodies were found in the outskirts of the community with signs of torture. Later, two other victims were found, all wearing military-type clothing and boots. All the victims are suspected to be members of the GNG. 6 fatalities.

On 26 October 2024, in La Cantera, Michoacan de Ocampo, a group of armed individuals in vehicles shot at the base of the municipal police (likely with police officers inside) and a police patrol (drive-by). According to the local Tenencia Chief (assistant to the municipal public administration), after that several armed individuals tried to force their way into his house but failed to do so, fired several shots into the air and left. It is suspected that the perpetrators were the same individuals who shot at the police station moments earlier.There were no casualties
On 26 October 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo, Morelos, a couple of armed individuals shot a man on his motorcycle on the Galeana-Cuautla highway and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Tlaquiltenango, Morelos, two armed individuals shot and killed a man drinking alcoholic beverages in Colonia Centro. The man died as a result in a hospital in Jojutla. 1 fatality.
On 26 October 2024, close to Campo Eureka, Sinaloa, armed groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no injuries.

On 26 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals opened fire and shot at seven off-duty state police officers in Colonia Indeco. Four were killed and three were injured as a result. 4 fatalities, 3 injuries.

On 26 October 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, at least two armed men chased and opened fire from a moving car (drive-by) at least four people in a vehicle, including the queen of the Fresnillo fair close to Colonia Benito Juarez. Two men were arrested as a result and there were no injuries.

On 27 October 2024, in Mexicali, Baja California, two men on a motorcycle opened fire at a man in Colonia Vista del Valle and then fled the scene (drive-by). The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

On 27 October 2024, in Champoton, Campeche, armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire (drive-by) and shot a man driving on a motorcycle with his wife on the Ciudad del Sol-La Joya state highway. The man was killed as a result. The victim is suspected to be linked to the sale of drugs. 1 fatality.
On 27 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Revolucion. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, armed individuals on a van shot and injured a municipal police officer in the intersection of Los Misterios and La Ronda streets, in Colonia Ex Hipodromo Peralvillo (drive-by). The perpetrators were later arrested in Colonia Jardin Azpeitia, Azcapotzalco. 1 injured.

On 27 October 2024, in San Pedro Huitzapula Norte, Guerrero, members of the community police of Zapotitlan Tablas attacked residents during a meeting at the municipal police station where residents demanded the return of two people who were kidnapped by the community police. One person died, four were injured and one person was missing after the attack. The whereabouts of the missing victim are unknown. 1 fatality, 4 injuries.

Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in El Limon, Guerrero, four people were killed and their bodies were found. Three of the bodies were tied and were wrapped in blankets on the Las Parotas-Coatan strip. The attack is being linked to an armed confrontation involving the GNG. The victims are suspected to be members of the GNG. 4 fatalities.

Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in Tecpan de Galeana, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture, both hands and feet tied and a rope tied to the victim's neck. 1 fatality.
Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in Tenexpa, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and dressed in black near a cemetery. 1 fatality.

Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), close to Tenexpa, Guerrero, four people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and dressed in black between Tenexpa and Rodesia at a point known as Barrancones. 4 fatalities.
Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied in fraccionamiento Villa Fontana Aqua. 1 fatality.
Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in Leopoldo Sanchez Celis, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in San Blas, Sinaloa, armed individuals in a vehicle opened fire and shot three people near the toll booth on their way to work in Monterrey (drive-by). All thee were killed as a result. 3 fatalities.

On 28 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, four people (one of them minor) 'attacked' a woman in Colonia Morelos. The specific type of attack has not been specified but the perpetrators were armed. The perpetrators were arrested when they tried to flee on Herreros street and Congreso de la Union avenue.
Around 28 October 2024 (as reported), in Palmita de San Gabriel, Guanajuato, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic bags and with gunshot wounds. 2 fatalities.

On 28 October 2024, in Atoyac de Alvarez, Guerrero, army, National Guard, and federal and state police officers clashed with members of Guerrero New Generation Gang (GNG) in Colonia Miranda Fonseca. At least one police officer died. At least 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Angamacutiro de la Union, Michoacan de Ocampo, the woman local Security Secretariat was shot and killed outside her house on Nicolas Bravo street, in Colonia Centro. 1 fatality.
Around 28 October 2024 (as reported), in Corralitos, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his burnt body was found inside his burnt van. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Cotija de la Paz, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals shot and killed a former mayor and PRD candidate for mayor near a high school where he worked as a teacher on Campestre street, in Colonia Los Corrales. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle (drive-by) at a man driving his car who crashed as a result in Colonia El Realito. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 28 October 2024 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and with a message next to the body in Colonia Centro. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, according to security camera recordings, an armed group got off at least two vehicles and abducted a man and a woman in the intersection of Rio Ramos and Arroyo San Miguel streets, in Colonia El Jaral. The victims suspectedly were delivery drivers that were delivering an order. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

On 28 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed individuals entered a home and opened fire at two men and one woman in Colonia Praderas de San Juan. Two men died and the woman was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injury.

On 28 October 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, an armed individual intercepted a street vendor close to the church San Judas to demand extortion payments. When the man refused to pay, the perpetrator shot and killed the man. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 28 October 2024, in Los Brasiles, Sinaloa, army officers and armed individuals clashed. During the clash, the officers were also attacked from a light aircraft, although the type of attack has not been specified. Two armed individuals were killed and 14 arrested. Authorities seized 19 fireweapons. 2 fatalities.

On 28 October 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed individuals on a vehicle shot at another vehicle on Jalisco and Misiones streets, in Fraccionamiento San Javier, killing a man and injuring another (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, army officers hit an unspecified number of people, members of the same family, at their house. At least one of the victims is a journalist, and the victims are relatives of a journalist that was killed in Sonora in 2023. The officers claimed that they hit the victims due to unspecified suspicions about their vehicle.

On 28 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a State Preventive Police officer around a gas station and a bank office in Colonia Guayabal (drive-by). In the previous days, a video on social media indicated that the victim suspectedly worked for an organized crime organization. 1 injured.

On 29 October 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed individuals on a van shot at two off-duty army officers in the intersection of 20 de Noviembre and Benito Juarez streets, in Colonia Miramar (drive-by). One of the victims died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 29 October 2024, in San Mateo, Mexico, state security officers followed an armed man on a motorbike to a house, where members of La Familia Michoacana Cartel shot at them, initiating a clash. After the clash, the officers arrested 12 people, including two cartel leaders in the Valley of Toluca. One of them was one of the most wanted persons in the country. Officers also seized nine fireweapons, 32 magazines, 900 bullets, tactical equipment similar to that used by federal and state police forces, as well as 15 packages of marijuana. Casualties unknown.

On 29 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man came out of a house and shot and killed another man in Colonia Real de San Joaquin. The victim along with a 13-year-old boy intended to kill a woman who was inside the house. The perpetrator fled by car along with another man, a woman and two minors. The victim's accomplice was arrested by the police. 1 fatality.

Around 29 October 2024 (month of), in Rinconada, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found naked, in an advanced state of decomposition, with a gunshot in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') and dog bite wounds near Zapata street and the airport. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2024, in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, an armed individual got off a taxi, entered the offices of the Federal Commission of Electricity (CFE) on 12 Poniente and 5 streets, in Colonia El Magueyito, and shot at people. A woman municipal police officer doing security work and a CFE employee died, and another CFE employee was injured, but died a day later at the hospital. 3 fatalities.

Around 30 October 2024 (month of), in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, a woman was killed and her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and with 'tiro de gracia' near Ejido Favela. According to the investigations, she was killed around 16 october 2024. 1 fatality.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlahuac, armed individuals shot at municipal police officers that were patrolling in the intersection of Emiliano Zapata street and Zaragoza avenue, in Colonia Pueblo de San Juan Ixtayopan, initiating a clash that resulted in one armed individual injured. Two armed individuals fled on motorbikes, but were arrested between Miguel Negrete and Ejido streets, together with three other men that intervened and tried to prevent the arrest. One of the arrested is an underage boy. 1 injured.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Mexico, two armed men on a motorbike shot at a man and a woman on Las Torres avenue, in Colonia La Calesa (drive-by). The man died and the woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in San Pablo Tecalco, Mexico, two men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands tied and signs of torture near the lagoon. Five other bodies were found in similar circumstances in the nearby town of Tecamac de Felipe Villanueva (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Tecamac de Felipe Villanueva, Mexico, five people (three men and two women) were killed and their bodies were found with 'tiro de gracia' on km. 38+500 of Mexico-Pachuca highway, in a place known as 'Puerta Vieja'. A version indicates that this attack took place due to a dispute over a building. Two other bodies were found in similar circumstances in the nearby town of San Pablo Tecalco (coded separately). 5 fatalities.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Xochitepec, Morelos, at least one person was killed and the dismembered body remains were found inside and around plastic bags at the Third Section of Unidad Morelos. At least 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2024, in Hualahuises, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed individuals against the state and ministerial police, the National Guard and military forces. Three armed men were killed. 3 fatalities.
On 30 October 2024, in Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in front of a car agency. 1 fatality.
Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, two men were killed and their bodies were found tied up to a pole and with a message in colonia Jacinto Lopez. 2 fatalities.
On 30 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and injured a man in Central de Abastos, between Periferico and Antonio Reyes Zurita street. 1 injured.

On 30 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, at least two armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a vehicle on Ruiz Cortines avenue, in Fraccionamiento Bonanza (drive-by), which crashed into a tree. The driver and one of the passengers were injured by bullets, while a third passenger was injured in the collision. A version indicates that two of the victims were a lawyer and his client. 3 injured.
On 31 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a woman was shot and injured by armed men in a vehicle in a drive-by in Juan Escutia street. 1 injured.

On 31 October 2024, in Buenavista de la Libertad, Guanajuato, during the early morning, armed individuals shot at ministerial and municipal police officers who were guarding a crime scene. Two police officers were injured. Another version, is that a police commander was also injured, however, after the authorities declared that he was injured during another event near by in an attempt to robbery.
On 31 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot a state police office and later also against the police. The police repelled the attack. There were no casualties.

source: La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Verdad
notes: On 31 October 2024, in Ciudad del Maiz, San Luis Potosi, a former mayor of Ciudad del Maiz and another two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on boulevard Miguel Barragan in colonia Buenos Aires. The former mayor was part of the PRI party. 3 fatalities.
Around 31 October 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket and black plastic bags near the Las Anacuas Gap. 1 fatality.

On 31 October 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, armed individuals from a criminal group kidnapped three young students from the Universidad Autonoma de Zacatecas (UAZ). A day later, the victims were found alive.
On 1 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, three men were shot and injured by at least two armed men in Colonia Centro. Three people were arrested. 3 injured.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia
notes: Around 1 November 2024 (as reported), in Cuitzeo del Porvenir, Michoacan, two men were killed and their bodies were found with a message. Both bodies were found in different parts of the city, including colonia Barrio Los Cerritos. One of the bodies was dismembered and another beheaded. 2 fatalities.

On 1 November 2024, in Querenguaro, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the State police and criminal members on the Jacona - Los Reyes highway. Two men were arrested. There were no casualties.

On 1 November 2024, in Santiago Tangamandapio municipality, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the state police and the community indigenous police of Tarecuato against armed men on the Jacona-Los Reyes around Paso del Molino and La Trasquila. One police officer was killed and another two were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

source: El Blog del Narco; Entorno Informativo
notes: On 6 October 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, there was an armed clash between military officers and the National Guard against a leader of Los Salazar Gang. The leader and another member were arrested. Weapons were seized. There were no fatalities.

source: Borderland Beat; La Silla Rota; Mural
notes: Around 13 October 2024 (as reported), in Ojuelos de Jalisco, Jalisco, five men were killed and their bodies were found decapitated on the San Luis Potosi-San Juan de Los Lagos highway. One of the victims had disappeared on 7 September 2024 from Colonia Las Huertas, in Tlaquepaque. 5 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; La Prensa de Monclova
notes: Around 31 October 2024 (month of), in La Zuzuca, Guerrero, three men with Guatemalan identifications were killed and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition and with their hands tied up. According to the authorities, Atoyac and San Jeronimo which are neighboring municipalities of Tecpan had experienced a week of tension after the irruption and clashes between an armed commando identified as 'GNG' and the Army. Local investigations suspect that the GNG could be an alliance between the criminal organizations La Familia Michoacana, Los Rodriguez and Los Rusos to fight Los Granados, who have had Tecpan as their center of operations for at least two decades. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: Around 1 November 2024 (as reported), in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, three men were killed and their bodies were found dismembered inside six plastic bags that were left in front of the delegation of the Attorney General's Office (FGR). 3 fatalities.
On 1 November 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man was shot and killed in colonia Hacienda del Sol. According to witnesses, the perpetrators were two men. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket inside a vehicle on Mercurio y Apolo street, in Colonia Anexa del Rio. 1 fatality.

source: Colima Noticias; Diario de Morelos; E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 8 November 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an off-duty military officer that was driving a van on Lazaro Cardenas avenue, in Colonia Las Brisas (drive-by). The victim was a rear admiral who had served as customs director of the port of Veracruz, where he was investigated for corruption. 1 fatality.
Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in San Jose Agua Azul, Guanajuato, at least two men were killed and their burnt bodies were found inside a burning car on a bridge. At least 2 fatalities.
On 8 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, at least three armed men entered a house on Circuito Villas de Guadalupe, in Colonia Villas del Romeral, and shot and killed two men. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Segunda Fraccion de Crespo, Guanajuato, at least a man was killed and his burnt body was found inside a burning car below a bridge, by the junction towards Panamericana road. At least 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Tepeji del Rio de Ocampo, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his semi-naked body was found in state of decomposition, with sings of torture, and wrapped in a bag and tape. His face had been partially devoured by animals. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Alvaro Obregon, Michoacan de Ocampo, a taxi driver was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied with tape inside the trunk of his vehicle under the bridge on Mexico-Guadalajara highway. 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2024, in Chandio, Michoacan de Ocampo, army officers and members of an unidentified gang clashed. A cartel member died. This clash is suspectedly linked to the clashes between Los Caballeros Templarios Gang, the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG), and military and police officers that took place in diverse locations of Michoacan the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 8 November 2024, in El Alcalde, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of Los Caballeros Templarios Gang and the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) clashed. This event is related to other clashes that took place in Las Bateas, Los Tepetates, Los Charcos, and El Capire (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 8 November 2024, in Los Charcos, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of Los Caballeros Templarios Gang and the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) clashed. This event is related to other clashes that took place in El Alcalde, Las Bateas, Los Tepetates, and El Capire (coded separately). Military, National Guard, and State Police officers arrived at the scene and clashed with armed individuals, killing one of them. At least 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2024, in El Capire, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of Los Caballeros Templarios Gang and the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) clashed. This event is related to other clashes that took place in El Alcalde, Las Bateas, Los Tepetates, and Los Charcos (coded separately). Military, National Guard, and Civil Guard officers arrived at the scene and clashed with armed individuals, killing one of them. At least 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2024, in Jacona de Plancarte, Michoacan de Ocampo, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals got off a vehicle, sprayed gasoline, threw Molotov cocktails, and set fire to several commercial establishments in Colonia Lomas de San Pablo (likely open). There were no casualties.
Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in San Juan Zautla, Oaxaca, three people were killed and their burnt bodies were found inside a burnt car on the path to Oaxaca-Mexico highway. 3 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in La Escondida, San Luis Potosi, five men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands tied. Two of the victims had disappeared on 6 November 2024. 5 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Carboneras, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, the hands handcuffed, and the head covered by tape, on a side of the road to Sanalona. 1 fatality.
On 8 November 2024, in Carboneras, Sinaloa, armed individuals on a vehicle shot and killed a man that was driving a van on Culiacan-Eldorado road, near the Piggy Back bridge (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 7 November 2024, in San Antonio Cardenas, Campeche, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Miguel Hidalgo street (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Presa Alvaro Obregon street, in Colonia Residencial Tecnologico (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), near Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a man inside a store on Morelos street, in the community of La Cruz. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2024, in El Cayaco, Guerrero, armed individuals got off a vehicle, entered a carwash on Acapulco-Pinotepa Nacional federal road, and shot and killed a (likely off-duty) ministerial federal police officer. 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found with signs of torture on a suitcase, covered by a blanket, on Jose Maria Gomez street, in Colonia San Juan Bosco. 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, an unspecified number of people were killed and their dismembered bodies were found inside at least four plastic bags in the area known as 'La Piedrera'. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

On 7 November 2024, in the municipality of Tenango del Valle (coded to Tenango de Arista), Mexico, armed individuals shot at three men vendors, killing two and injuring another. This event is suspectedly related to a settling of scores. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Aquila, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals ambushed a military escort on the path that connects Ostula and El Solosuchil, initiating a clash. A military officer died. 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in El Platanal, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his burnt body was found with gunshot wounds on a path that leads to El Salto, in Colonia Las Penitas. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed men shot at state police officers that were patrolling on Ferrocarril and Lazaro Cardenas street, in Colonia Ferrocarril. The officers fired back and injured and arrested one of the perpetrators. The other individual fled. 1 injured.

On 7 November 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed men on a motorbike approached the window of a house on El Cairo street, in Fraccionamiento Altamira Seccion E, and one of them shot at the people inside, killing a woman and injuring a man. 1 fatality.

source: Diario de Morelos; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a person was killed and unidentified individuals threw the body from a van in Colonia Recursos Hidraulicos. The body was found on 7 November 2024 with gunshot wounds, signs of torture, and the hands tied. A security camera recorded the moment when the body was left. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio
notes: Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Linares, Nuevo Leon, at least two people were killed and parts of their dismembered bodies were found along National Road: on km. 177,5, near the entry to Ejido Berlanga Garcia, and on km. 175,2, near the entry to Ejido El Brasil. Additional body parts were found on the section of the same road in Montecarmelo (coded separately). At least 2 fatalities split across two events, 1 fatality coded here.

source: El Norte; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio
notes: Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), near Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, at least two people were killed and parts of their dismembered bodies were found along National Road: on km. 195, near the entry to Monte Sur sport complex (together with an unspecified narco message), on km. 185, north of El Alto del Coyote, and on km. 182 near the community of Cabezones. Additional body parts were found on the section of the same road in Linares (coded separately). At least 2 fatalities split across two events, 1 fatality coded here.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
notes: On 7 November 2024, in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a taxi diver in Colonia 28 de Enero (drive-by). 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFP; El Norte; Entorno Informativo; La Jornada; Quadratin Oaxaca; Reforma; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 7 November 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, armed individuals entered El Che Gaucho restaurant in the intersection of Las Rosas and Alamos streets, in Colonia Reforma, and shot at people, killing six men. According to security sources, the target of the attack was the leader of the International Conference of Workers (CIT), who was uninjured or suffered minor injuries, and the dead men are his bodyguards. 6 fatalities.

On 7 November 2024, in Sanctorum, Puebla, according to a video published on social media, armed individuals driving three vehicles blocked the movements of a truck, forced the driver to get off the vehicle, and abducted him. The perpetrators also took the truck. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Santiago de Queretaro, Queretaro, armed individuals entered a house on Manuel Gomez Morin avenue, in Colonia Centro Sur, and shot and killed three people. State police officers later arrested four suspects and seized a fireweapons and two vehicles. 3 fatalities.

On 7 November 2024, in Las Arenitas, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed in the morning and the afternoon. In the latter clash, the groups launched between two and six explosive devices from drones, damaging several houses. Casualties unknown.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 7 November 2024, in Las Puentes, Sinaloa, military officers and armed individuals clashed. At least a person was killed, three officers were injured, and a civilian man was collaterally wounded. At least 1 fatality and 4 injured.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Ocuiltzapotlan, Tabasco, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot at state police officers in the intersection of Mariano Abasolo and Venustiano Carranza streets. The police officers shot back and the armed individuals fled. There were no casualties.

On 7 November 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at state police officers in Fraccionamiento Las Rosas (drive-by). Also in Villahermosa, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at state police officers at the police station in Colonia Tamulte (drive-by). These attacks are suspectedly linked to other events that took place in the city the same day: the arson of several vehicles and establishments (coded separately), the placement of 'ponchallantas' (objects to puncture tires) on several locations (coded separately), the finding of four dead bodies (coded separately), and the hanging of unspecified narco messages signed by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (uncoded). There were no casualties.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, four people were killed and their bodies were found inside plastic bags. One of them was almost completely dissolved in acid. It is suspected that the event is related to the arrest of several people linked to the CJNG that took place on 6 November in Villahermosa (uncoded). 4 fatalities.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Comalcalco, Tabasco, an unspecified number of people were killed and their dismembered bodies were found inside plastic bags on Jamaica street, in Fraccionamiento Santo Domingo. Also in Comalcalco, a person was killed and the head was found inside a plastic bag with a narco message in ADO bus terminal. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, two men were killed and their bodies were found together with an unspecified threatening message written on a cardboard on Potrero street, in Colonia Granjas del Matamoros. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; La Verdad; Reforma
notes: Around 6 November 2024 (as reported), in Coyuca de Benitez, Guerrero, three men and one woman were killed and their bodies were found on the Cuajilote bridge, on a side of the Acapulco-Xihuatanejo highway with signs of torture. A message signed by the GNG was found next to the bodies. 4 fatalities.
On 6 November 2024, in Iguala de la Independencia, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty member of the navy in Colonia San Jose. 1 fatality.
On 6 November 2024, in San Pedro Cholula, Mexico, three people shot a man driving in his car in Plaza San Diego. The man was transported to the hospital where he died. 1 fatality.
Around 6 November 2024 (as reported), in Ojo de Agua, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in tape and plastic bags and skinned from neck to face. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2024, in Huaniqueo de Morales, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least two armed individuals opened fire at individuals at a property in Colonia Barrio Alto who repelled the aggression and killed both men. 2 fatalities.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon
location: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon
source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Proceso; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: Around 6 November 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de Leon, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found with a bag around the head and the hands and feet tied on Amate street, in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The victim had disappeared on 4 November 2024 and was the director of the IMSS Hospital in Santiago Tamazola, Oaxaca. 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Huajuapan de León

notes: On 6 November 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a vehicle shot at a van on Plateros avenue and Los Fresnos street, in Colonia Emiliano Zapata, killing a person and injuring three (drive-by). 1 fatality, 3 injured.

On 5 November 2024, in Coyuca de Benitez, Guerrero, an armed group broke into the Basic Community Hospital of the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS) and shot a man. The victim was receiving medical assistance at the center. The perpetrators then boarded a car driven by an accomplice. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Silla Rota; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: On 5 November 2024, in Taimeo el Chico, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who arrived at the scene upon the report of a confrontation and were shot. A total of nine vehicles were set on fire as a result of an armed clash in Taimeo (coded separately). There were no casualties.

source: Diario de Morelos; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: Around 5 November 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, two men were killed and their dismembered bodies were found wrapped with plastic bags, tied with tape, and with an unspecified narco message on Central street, in Colonia Lomas de Atzingo. 2 fatalities.
Around 5 November 2024 (as reported), in Chontalpa, Tabasco, a person was killed and the body was found with gunshot wounds and a message next to the body. 1 fatality.
Around 5 November 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found close to a ranch San Miguel with the 'tiro de gracia'. 1 fatality.

On 5 November 2024, in Leopoldo Sanchez Celis, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at military officers, initiating a clash. The armed individuals fled, and the officers seized 13 fireweapons, two explosive devices, and seven vehicles. There were no injuries.
On 4 November 2024, in Ciudad del Carmen, Campeche, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a person in Colonia Santa Rita and then left a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, armed individuals aboard four vehicles attacked military officials who repelled the aggressions in Colonia La Aurora (drive-by). Four people were arrested. There were no casualties.
Around 4 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied inside a sack in Colonia El Tapatio. 1 fatality.
Around 4 November 2024 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture tied. One of the men was wrapped in blankets. 2 fatalities.
On 4 November 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, one man shot another man as he was arriving home in Colonia Los Encinos and then fled the scene in a vehicle with an accomplice. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Estacion San Jose, Zacatecas, an unknown number of suspected gang members opened fire at the facade of a home (with the owner inside) and then fled the scene. There were no casualties.

Around 3 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, two hands were found with a message in El Pipila area. Later, according to witnesses, two people left a torso and the legs from a person in Colonia Mariano Matamoros. It is unknown if the remains are from the same victim. At least 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed two people in a drive-by in Colonia Division del Norte.
