Also, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people inside a house known to be a drug consumption place in Colonia San Jorge. 5 fatalities.
On 3 November 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, unknown armed men entered a home and killed a man in Colonia Ladrilleros Norte. The victim was identified as an off-duty military officer. 1 fatality.
On 3 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man while driving in Colonia La Suiza. 1 fatality.
On 3 November 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot at two men in Colonia Presa de Los Reyes. Both of the victims died. 2 fatalities.
Around 3 November 2024 (as reported), in El Brasil, Nuevo Leon, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture on the Montemorelos-Hualahuises road. 2 fatalities.

On 3 November 2024, in Atlixco, Puebla, three armed individuals (two men and a woman) approached the Gonzalo Rio Arronte Medical Complex and shot and killed two municipal police officers (a man and a woman) that were at the entry. The two men then entered the hospital, where they shot and killed a man. The victim had been shot and injured by armed individuals in a house in Atlixco earlier the same day (coded separately). Additional police officers arrived at the scene and engaged in a clash with the perpetrators. The clash left no casualties and the armed individuals fled in two vehicles, which were later abandoned in Tecuanipan. 3 fatalities.

On 3 November 2024, in Atlixco, Puebla, according to the victim and witnesses, two armed individuals entered a house and shot and injured a man that was celebrating his birthday. The rest of the people in the party were uninjured. The victim was later transferred to Gonzalo Rio Arronte Medical Complex, where armed individuals shot and killed him (coded separately). 1 injured.
Around 3 November 2024 (as reported), in Cunduacan, Tabasco, three people were killed and their bodies were found inside bags. 3 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 November 2024, around Acultzingo, Veracruz, armed individuals chase and kidnapped a priest and four deacons who were travelling on the Ciudad Mendoza - Tehuacan. Hours later, they were found and released.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 November 2024, close to Sayula de Aleman, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals chased a truck driver and shot the truck on the highway 145 Sayula de Aleman-Ciudad Aleman and then threw Molotov cocktails at the truck. The truck driver was not injured but the truck was set on fire. There were no casualties.
Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Ejido Chiapas, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up. 1 fatality.
Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), near Ejido Colima, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands and feet tied up between Ejido Mexico and Ejido Colima. 1 fatality.

Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Mexicali municipality, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up to the back and wrapped in plastic near Ejido Pachuca. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2024, in La Rumorosa, Baja California, there was an armed clash between armed men and the National Guard. Two people were killed and another four were injured. The armed individuals were suspected of migrant trafficking and the two fatalities were two Colombian migrants. 2 fatalities, 4 injured.

Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found tied with tape, inside a car on fire in Colonia Ocampo. Another version, indicates that the victim was inside the trunk in Colonia El Pipila. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 2 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, a group of armed individuals attacked a group of people in Avenida Fernando Amilpa. One person was killed and another six people were injured. 1 fatality, 6 injured.

Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Xochitepec, Morelos, an unknown number of people were killed and their bodies were found inside bags on Avenida Crisantemos, including at least the torso of a person. Later, more remains were found in different parts of the city. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.
On 2 November 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a young man in front of a house in Colonia Cima de las Mitras. 1 fatality.
On 2 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) a man around de Plaza Crystral. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2024, around Tamuin, San Luis Potosi, there was an armed clash between armed men and the state police around Ejido 'La Calera' on the Valles - Tamuin highway. Two armed men were injured and three were arrested. 2 injured.
Around 2 November 2024 (as reported), in Tecolutilla, Tabasco, a woman and a man were killed and their bodies were found in bags with gunshot wounds and a message from a criminal group. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 2 November 2024, in Minatitlan, Veracruz, according to witnesses, three armed men shot and killed two men in a house in Colonia Aurora. 2 fatalities.

On 2 November 2024, in Organos, Zacatecas, gang members intercepted and shot at two state police officers on the road to Jerez in a drive-by. The officers crashed and were killed. The police officers were the bodyguards of a family member of the governor. 2 fatalities.

On 1 November 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed individuals clashed with the National Guard during a police control in colonia Villas de San Cayetano. Two men were arrested. Two people were injured with stray bullets.

Around 1 November 2024 (as reported), around La Alqueria, Zacatecas, two men were killed by members of a criminal group and their bodies were found with signs of torture around La Alqueria and Santa Maria de los Angeles communities. One of the victims was handcuffed. 2 fatalities.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 31 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, two armed men shot at a father and his son. The boy was killed. 1 fatality.

On 31 October 2024, in Paraiso, Tabasco, there was an armed clash between the military forces and the National Guard and members of La Barredora Gang. A leader of the criminal group was arrested. Weapons were seized. Casualties unknown.

source: El Faro de la Costa Chica; El Norte
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Cuajinicuilapa, Guerrero, an unidentified armed group beaten and kidnapped the councilor of the municipality of the PVEM party on his way to Ometepec. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), in Las Labradas, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on km. 48. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2024, in La Placeta, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed men against the National Guard, state police, and military officers during a patrol. Three men were arrested. Drugs were seized. There were no casualties.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 26 September 2024, in Loberas, Sinaloa, suspected members of Los Chapitos Gang and Los Mayitos Gang clashed. Eight men were killed and another was injured. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 8 fatalities.

source: La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Riodoce; Tiempo; Zona Franca
notes: On 16 September 2024, around Coronado, Chihuahua, members of La Linea gang linked to the Juarez Cartel and Los Salgueiro gang linked to the Sinaloa Cartel clashed on km. 46+200 of the road heading from Parral to Jimenez, resulting in nine dead (six of which were burnt). A woman who was travelling in a bus nearby and a man were injured. 9 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2024 (between 27 July - 7 November), in Tijuana, Baja California, a 16-years old boy was killed and his body was found on 7 November. Five armed men had abducted the victim from his house on Rumorosa street, in Colonia Felipa Velazquez, on 27 July 2024. Three suspects were arrested on 30 September 2024. 1 fatality.

Around 14 October 2024 (between 12 October - 16 October), in Santa Clara Ocoyucan, Puebla, a woman was killed and her body was found on 16 October semi-naked and with signs of violence in Colonia La Cantera. The woman was identified as a missing woman since the weekend. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in a plastic bag on Cuarta street, between Negrete and Melchor Ocampo avenues, in Colonia Zona Centro. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFN - Tijuana; Diario de Morelos; El Norte; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 17 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two armed men shot at three people on 5 de Mayo street, near the junction with Motolinia street, killing a man and injuring another man and a woman. The woman is an alternate local congresswoman of the coalition 'Va por Mexico' (formed by PAN, PRI and PRD parties), a trans activist, and leader of local vendors. Her mother, also a vendors' leader, affirmed that they had been threatened by La Union Tepito. Both women were arrested in 2021 on charges of extorsion and organized robbery. Authorities later arrested the two perpetrators and a woman accomplice. The injured man died on 11 November 2024. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Tixtla de Guerrero, Guerrero, the mayor of Chilpancingo and PRD member was killed and his body was found decapitated in Colonia Villa del Roble. The head was found on top of a car and the body was covered with a sheet inside the car. Suspectedly the attack was committed by the Los Ardillos gang and on 12 November 2024, authorities arrested the police officer in charge of the Municipal Public Security Secretary for holding links with Los Ardillos gang and being involved in this attack. This information was given by a man who had been kidnapped by this gang and was later found dead (coded separately). Local sources, indicated that the killing of the mayor was due to his lack for cooperation with the criminal group. The arrested official is a lawyer specializing in Oral Trial and Accusatory Criminal Procedure. 1 fatality.

source: 8 Columnas; Diario de Morelos; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Reforma; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 7 November 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, an armed individual on the street shot at the emergency section of the IMSS Regional General Hospital C/MF No. 1, on Plan de Ayala avenue, injuring four people. Previous versions indicated that armed individuals had entered the hospital to kill a person that was being operated due to gunshot wounds caused in Jiutepec earlier the same day, or a relative or friend of such person. Authorities later denied this version and confirmed that the perpetrator did not enter the premises. Authorities arrested a suspect on 8 November 2024, and three more individuals are wanted due to their possible participation in this event. 4 injured.

On 25 September 2024, in General Teran, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals broke into the Public Security building and opened fire at municipal police. In their escape, armed individuals threw tire punctures on the road to avoid persecution. Later the armed individuals clashes with police officers in Los Ramones (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 9 October 2024, in Los Ramirez, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a car shot at a van on Lazaro Cardenas street, near Dorados de Villa street and Del Senor de la Expiracion church, killing a man and injuring another (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 17 October 2024, in General Teran, Nuevo Leon, state and municipal police officers clashed with suspected members of the Cartel del Noreste in front of a police station on Plutarco Elias Calles avenue. A member of the cartel died, and the rest of them fled towards Montemorelos. This event is part of three clashes between authorities and the CDN that took place in Nuevo Leon the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Almoloya de Juarez, Mexico, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at people in Fraccionamiento Rancho San Juan, killing a woman and injuring four people (drive-by). 1 fatality, 4 injured.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in El Guerreno, Tamaulipas, armed individuals on a van shot at two people that were changing a wheel of a vehicle on Rio Bravo-Reynosa road, killing a woman and injuring a man (drive-by). The perpetrators suspectedly mistook the victims for members of rival organizations. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Rio Bravo, Tamaulipas, armed groups clashed and an unknown number of people were killed. One of the people involved in the clash fled the scene and sought medical assistance in Colonia Las Cumbres, where he was arrested. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

On 10 November 2024, in Los Algodones, Baja California, four people were kidnapped by unidentified armed individuals. Two of them were later found alive. The other two are suspected to be found killed, however, this was not confirmed. The whereabouts of the other two people remain unknown.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her burnt body was found on 5 street, in Colonia Jardines de las Cruces, in the Delegation of San Antonio de los Buenos. 1 fatality.
Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his head was found in Colonia Kino II. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied on Santo Degollado and 5 de Febrero streets, in Colonia Ninos Heroes. 1 fatality.
Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, a group of armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Chihuahua, and then fled in two vehicles. 1 fatality.
On 13 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Rancho las Flores. 1 fatality.
Around 14 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated with a narco message next to his body in Piedrera Canyon. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, two armed individuals shot and killed a man leaving a penitentiary center in Colonia La Mesa. The victim's wife was left uninjured and both perpetrators were later arrested. 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2024, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured two men in a drive-by shooting in the Unidad habitacional Fidel Velazquez.
Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Seybaplaya, Campeche, a man was killed and the body was found with the 'tiro de gracia'. The victim was a drug dealer. 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2024, in Escarcega, Campeche, an armed individual on a motorbike shot at a person who was driving a bicycle in front of Abelardo Carrillo Zavala park (drive-by). The victim was uninjured. Also in Escarcega, armed individuals on a taxi shot at a person who was driving a motorcycle in Colonia Concordia (drive-by). The victim tried to flee, and it is unknown whether he was injured. The perpetrators followed him to his house, and shot at the house facade causing damages.
On 13 November 2024, in Juan Aldama, Chihuahua, two men were shot and killed suspectedly by members of criminal group while driving in colonia El Arbolito. 2 fatalities.
On 10 November 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed individuals shot and killed a man that was driving a van on Mina San Rafael and Mina La Negrita streets, in Colonia Robinson. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, three men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands and feet tied up around Granjas del Valle near Libramiento Oriente. 3 fatalities.

On 15 November 2024, close to La Junta, Chihuahua, members of an organized crime group opened fire and chased members of El Tigre Cartel leading to the death of three members of the El Tigre cartel. 3 fatalities.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Valerio, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated. 1 fatality.

On 15 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztacalco, four armed individuals, including two men who claimed to be investigative police agents entered a building in a suspected anti-drug operation in Colonia Santa Anita upon which one man opened fire at them. One man was killed and another was injured. After the attack the armed man escaped. Authorities are investigating the affiliation of the group of armed men after they found that the credentials of the police officers had expired. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 9 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, a group of armed individuals shot at four people around km. 28 of Mexico-Cuernavaca federal road near San Miguel Topilejo, killing a man and injuring three other people (likely witnesses). 1 fatality, 3 injured.

On 13 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) a man and injured another one in colonia Penitenciaria. The killed victim was identified as a drug dealer. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, an armed man shot and killed a man in a mall. The perpetrator ran away with his accomplice on a motorcycle. Also in Celaya, two armed men entered a house and killed a man in Colonia Ejidal. In a third attack in Celaya, at least two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in colonia Arboledas de San Rafael. A woman was also injured. 3 fatalities.
On 13 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a couple in front of their 5-year-old daughter in Colonia La Alameda. 2 fatalities.

On 10 November 2024, in Capellania de Loera, Guanajuato, four armed men on a vehicle shot at a van on km. 5 of Maxipista Leon-Aguascalientes, killing a woman and injuring six other people, including two minors (drive-by). The victims are members of the same family. 1 fatality, 6 injured.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in El Jaguey, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found semi-buried and with tape around one of the hands, between the communities of Barretos and Nuevo Lindero. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, a merchant was kidnapped by members of Los Ardillos gang from Petaquillas. He later was released and made a declaration to the authorities, where he accused a politician and the gang of being involved in the killing of the recent elected mayor (coded separately). The merchant was later killed and his body was found on 6 November (coded separately).

Around 6 November 2024 (as reported), in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, a merchant was killed by members of Los Ardillos gang and his body was found. The victim had been previously abducted by this gang and during his captivity heard information about the involvement of the gang in the killing of the elected mayor (coded separately). After having shared the information he heard with the police, he was killed. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the head in Colonia Jardines de Zinnia. The victim was a former bodyguard for public servants, a former ministerial federal police officer, and current leader of 'La Basura Jefa', an association of over 200 particular garbage collectors. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in El Cayaco, Guerrero, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on the Acapulco-Pinotepa Nacional. The woman was driving and crashed after being shot at. 1 fatality.

Around 14 November 2024 (as reported), in Iguala de la Independencia, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied in Colonia Insurgentes in the center of the city. 1 fatality.
Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Tulancingo, Hidalgo, two people were killed and their bodies were found burned in an empty lot in colonia Ahuehuetitla. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, a man and a woman were attacked and their bodies were found alive with signs of torture and letters scratched into their bodies forming the word 'chapulin' (people linked to gangs who switch sides). 2 injuries.
Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags on Agua Dulce street, in Colonia Loma Linda. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Mechoacanejo, Jalisco, a commando of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) broke into the community and clashed with armed residents who tried to stop their entrance. This event was part of other events involving the CJNG in the municipality (coded separately). The CJNG also blocked the roads with vehicles and set them on fire to set a (narco) roadblock. Casualties unknown.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with stab wounds and the hands tied on a path near the intersection of Villa Lisboa and Villa Oporto streets, in Fraccionamiento Villa Fontana Aqua. 1 fatality.
Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and the body was found inside a mattress in fraccionamiento Canadas del Bosque. 1 fatality.
On 9 November 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, armed individuals on motorbikes shot and injured two people (a man and a woman) on 2 street, in Lomas del Vergel (drive-by). 2 injured.

On 14 November 2024, near Santa Catarina Ayotzingo, Mexico, several armed individuals in a vehicle chased three men traveling in another vehicle between Santa Catarina Ayotzingo and San Pablo and opened fire at them (drive-by). All three were killed as a result. 3 fatalities.
On 11 November 2024, in Chicoloapan de Juarez, Mexico, a young man was shot and injured by four armed young men in street Real de Aguascalientes Unidad Habitacional Ara 3.

On 14 November 2024, in Cuautitlan Izcalli, Mexico, armed men traveling in a vehicle opened fire at a security guard who was escorting a cargo unit (drive-by). The security guard died as a result and the driver of the cargo truck escaped the scene. 1 fatality.

Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Alvaro Obregon, Michoacan de Ocampo, two people (a man and a woman) were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and wrapped in blankets in a field next to Ramal El Venado path and a bridge on Morelia-Aeropuerto highway. 2 fatalities.

On 10 November 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individual(s) shot and killed an off-duty traffic municipal police officer who was driving a motorcycle on Paseo de Altamira avenue, in Fraccionamiento Altamira. The victim's son was on the vehicle and was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 9 November 2024, in Cuautla, Morelos, according to witnesses, over ten hooded armed men entered a house on Matamoros street, in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo, and shot at people that were celebrating a baptism, injuring at least three. A version indicate that the perpetrators beat and robbed some of the victims. The perpetrators fled in two vehicles. 3 injured.

On 10 November 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to security cameras recordings, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a vehicle on Castillo de Chapultepec avenue, injuring two men (drive-by). 2 injured.
Around 14 November 2024 (as reported), in Tetecalita, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered on a dirt road in the El Salto area. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Xalisco, Nayarit, officers of the investigative police (ministerial police) went to a home in Fraccionamiento Canoas II upon suspicion of the sale of drugs and a man opened fire at them when they were at the drop and a clash ensued. One police officer was injured as a result and the suspected drug dealer escaped. 1 injury.

On 13 November 2024, I Xalisco, Mexico, ministerial police officers supporter by officers from different state departments went to a home upon suspecting the presence of an armed man who shot two police officers the day before (coded separately). The man who was a suspected drug dealer shot at the police officers who repelled the aggression and killed him. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, several armed men shot and injured a man in Colonia Paseos del Roble. The event could be related to drug dealing as drugs were found by the side of the crime scene.

Around 11 November 2024 (between 10 - 13 November), in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, a couple was killed and their bodies were found on 13 November in a house in fraccionamiento Antares wrapped in plastic bags. Both victims were reported missing on 10 November. 2 fatalities.
On 15 November 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle and shot and injured a man in Colonia Infonavit Monterreal (drive-by). 1 injury.

On 9 November 2024, in San Pedro, Nuevo Leon, municipal police officers and armed individuals clashed on the road to the village of Santa Ana Nuevo. Three armed individuals died and an officer was injured. Three women were also collaterally injured. Officers seized several fireweapons and four vehicles. 3 fatalities, 4 injured.

On 15 November 2024, in Linares, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers in Colonia La Petaca and Los Naranjos. One woman died as a result and one woman and two police officers were injured. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.
On 14 November 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a car in Colonia Constituyentes de Queretaro and shot and injured two men (drive-by). 2 injuries.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
notes: Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied. The victim suspectedly is a man who was abducted during an attack on 8 November 2024, in which another person was killed (unclear circumstances). 1 fatality.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

source: El Siglo de Durango; La Jornada; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 11 November 2024, in Putla Villa de Guerrero, Oaxaca, a member of the Movement of Triqui Unification and Struggle (MULT) from the Mixtec Indigenous Group was killed by unidentified armed individuals. Representatives of the MULT condemned the attack and denounced the targeted attacks against members of this community, including the killing of two activist sisters (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec, Oaxaca, a man was killed and the body was found inside a barrel with his hands tied up and signs to be burned with acid. 1 fatality.
Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in San Lorenzo Cacaotepec, Oaxaca, a person was killed and the body was found inside a plastic bag. 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2024, in Ciudad de Chiautla de Tapia, Puebla, several armed individuals on a vehicle shot and killed a man near a bridge in San Miguel neighborhood (drive-by). The victim was the brother of a PAN candidate for the municipal presidency who was abducted, tortured, and killed on 13 July 2023 (coded separately). Their father was also killed on 6 May 2024 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, state and municipal police officers chased and clashed with armed individuals along Periferico Ecologico area. The armed individuals crashed their vehicle and were arrested. There were no casualties.

On 11 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to the witness victim's partner, armed individuals on a vehicle shot and killed a man who was driving a van on Valsequillo boulevard, by the entry to Fraccionamiento Santo Tomas 4 (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, eight armed men shot at a couple who were driving a vehicle. A man was injured and taken to the hospital. He died due to the injuries. 1 fatality.
Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Santa Maria Xonacatepec, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a plastic inside a ravine near La Resurreccion. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2024, in Tehuacan, Puebla, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed an employee of the Tehuacan Drinking Water and Sewage Service Operating Agency (Oosapat) who was inspecting a well between Tonala and 19 Poniente streets and Arenas avenue in Fraccionamiento Xochipilli, in front of a municipal pantheon (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in Tochtepec, Puebla, armed individuals in a van shot at a vehicle on La Colorada-Tepexi de Rodriguez state road, between San Lorenzo Ometepec and Santa Ana Coapan, killing a man and injuring two others (drive-by). 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Leopoldo Sanchez Celis, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture on a side of the road that connects Eldorado and Culiacan. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Leopoldo Sanchez Celis, Sinaloa, several armed individuals shot (likely into the air) and entered a house, where they abducted three members of a family (the father, the mother, and their son). The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

On 13 November 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, a group of armed men beat up with wooden boards (tableados) two workers of a funeral home on their way from Durango to Sinaloa to pick up a body. The victims were left injured. According to local sources, the perpetrators might have also kidnapped two relatives of the death person they were going to pick up. However, this was not confirmed. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: AFN - Tijuana; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Laguna de Canachi, Sinaloa, seven people were killed and their bodies were found dismembered and with two messages signed by Los Chapos threatening anyone who passed on information. The bodies were found on the Mazatlan-Culiacan highway around km 116. At least one of the bodies were beheaded. The victims were relatives and have been reported kidnapped days before by an armed group. 7 fatalities.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Laguna de Canachi, Sinaloa a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture on the side of the Mazatlan-Culiacan highway at KM 116. 1 fatality.
On 14 November 2024, close to San Rafael, Sinaloa, armed individuals attacked military officers close to the military base El Sauz. One armed individual was injured as a result. 1 injury.

On 9 November 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed individuals on a vehicle shot and injured a man that was driving on Pascual Orozco and Benjamin Hill streets, in Colonia Cajeme (drive-by). The victim is a prison guard of the Social Reinsertion Center (Cereso) (likely off-duty). 1 injured.
On 13 November 2024, in Cardenas, Tabasco, according to relatives, armed men entered a house and killed a woman in Colonia El Bajio. The woman was a local healer. 1 fatality

source: La Prensa de Monclova; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 14 November 2024, in Gonzalez 3era. Seccion, Tabasco, several armed individuals got out of a car and attacked elements of the investigative police (ministerial police) at a gas station injuring two officers. 2 injuries.

On 11 November 2024, near Tamulte de las Sabanas, Tabasco, according to videos published on social media, armed individuals on motorbikes shot at a vehicle on Villahermosa-Frontera road (drive-by), killing a person and injuring another. This event is likely linked to the (narco) roadblocks that unidentified individuals set with burning vehicles and 'ponchallantas' (objects to puncture tires) on the same road and other parts of Villahermosa and Centro municipality the same day. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found inside a car parked in front of CRESET prison, on 180 Villahermosa-Frontera federal road, in Ciudad Industrial. There was also a cardboard with an unspecified threatening message signed by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) against 'La Barredora' criminal group, the director of the prison, and an individual named 'Ulises'. The victim was a prison guard who had been abducted on an unspecified date together with two other guards, whose whereabouts are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, two armed individuals shot and killed two workers of a windshield store on Emiliano Zapata street, between Ruiz Cortines and Ninos Heroes avenues, in Colonia Atasta. 2 fatalities.

On 14 November 2024, in Los Alacranes, Tamaulipas, armed individuals aboard several vehicles used drones charged with explosives to attack state police officers on patrol in the border region with the US. Three state police officers were injured. 3 injuries.

On 13 November 2024, in Gonzalez Villarreal, Tamaulipas, armed individuals attacked state police officers with drones charged with explosives. The officers repelled the aggression and killed two men while an officer was injured. Officers arrested two armed individuals and seized weapons and two vehicles. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Las Escobas, Tamaulipas, officers of the Special Group of Immediate Force of Tamaulipas clashed with armed individuals. Four armed individuals died, and officers seized fireweapons and a van with logos of an unspecified criminal group on it. 4 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 10 November 2024, in Entabladero, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed two underage boys in a park in front of Nuestra Senora de Guadalupe church. The perpetrators fled on a motorcycle. The victims were brothers. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 13 November 2024, in Ixtaczoquitlan, Veracruz, armed individuals intercepted a man in a drive-by shooting and killed him while driving on Boulevard Fernando Gutierrez Barrios. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Tuxpan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, municipal, state and National Guard police officers and armed individuals clashed along Mexico-Tuxpan highway. Casualties unknown.
Around 14 November 2024 (as reported), in El Rayo, Zacatecas, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Viboras, Zacatecas, a man was killed and his mutilated body was found. Authorities found an undetonated explosive device nearby, and a version suggests that the victim may have been killed by an explosion. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFP; Colima Noticias; El Norte; El Proceso; El Siglo de Durango; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy; Yucatan a la Mano; Zeta Tijuana; Zona Franca
notes: On 10 November 2024, in Cuautitlan Izcalli, Mexico, according to witnesses, several armed individuals shot at people and employees inside Bling Bling bar, on Jose Maria Morelos avenue, in Colonia San Francisco Tepojaco, killing six men (including a minor) and injuring between five and seven. The attack suspectedly targeted two men linked to the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) that were at the bar who had recently abandoned the group and joined another gang. It is unknown whether these men are among the victims. Other sources claim that the attack is linked to the conflict between La Familia Michoacan and the CJNG. At least ten people were arrested. 6 fatalities, between 5 and 7 injured.

On 2 November 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, groups of armed individuals clashed in a pantheon (cemetery) in San Martin Mexicapan. A person was injured. The individuals used stones, knives and firearms. It is suspected that the clash began when one of the groups tried to enter the cemetery and was prevented from doing so by an opposing group. Later, seven people were arrested for this event. According to the authorities, this event is related to criminal gangs in the area that are related to drug dealing. 1 injured.

On 14 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two armed men shot at an off-duty state police that was refueling on 14 Oriente street, in Colonia La Providencia (an alternative version indicates that the attack took place in Colonia America Norte). The victim is the former director of Special Operations of the Secretariat of Public Safety. He was injured and transported to the hospital. 1 injury.
On 18 September 2024, in Victoria de Durango, Durango, at least two armed men broke into a house and shot and killed a man in Colonia Cerro de la Campana. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Riodoce
notes: On 14 September 2024, around Culiacancito, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed men and military forces around Bella Vista. Three armed men were killed. Six military officers were injured. Three vehicles were seized. 3 fatalities.

On 2 November 2024, in Victoria de Durango, Durango, according to relatives, a group of young men attacked a 17-year-old woman after at least one of the perpetrators shot and injured her in Colonia Morga. 1 injured.

Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), close to Victoria de Durango, Durango, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on the side of the Durango-Gomez Palacio highway with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 1 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, an underage boy was killed and his body was found beheaded and mutilated inside a baby stroller on Nicolas Bravo y Sauce street, in Colonia Mariano Matamoros Norte. The body had a threatening message stabbed in a leg with a knife. It is suspected that the victim is a 14-years old boy who disappeared on 31 October 2024. 1 fatality.

Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with his feet and hands tied up and wrapped with a blanket in Colonia Manuel Paredes III. 1 fatality.
On 17 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, two men aboard a vehicle shot and killed a man in Colonia Paseo Santa Maria. 1 fatality.
Around 17 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found burned in Colonia Pino de Aguero. 1 fatality.
Around 18 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the decapitated head was found inside a plastic bag in Colonia Ejido Chilpancingo. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found inside a suitcase with her hands and feet tied in Colonia Otay Constituyentes. 1 fatality.

At least 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Tenabo, Campeche, two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle opened fire at a man in Colonia Procesador. 1 injury.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 22 November 2024, in the municipality of Mapastepec, Chiapas, according to witnesses, rival gangs on vans clashed on Francisco Sarabia avenue and Mapastepec-Ejido Ibarra road. Ten individuals died. 10 fatalities.
On 17 November 2024, in San Cristobal de las Casas, Chiapas, several armed men in a vehicle shot at the people in the central market (drive-by). Four people were injured.
On 20 November 2024, in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, armed individuals clashed on Belisario Dominguez boulevard. Two people died, including an underage girl who was a collateral victim. 2 fatalities.
Around 18 November 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a couple was killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture in fraccionamiento Cerrada Santa Ana. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man and a woman were killed by asphyxiation and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied on Romanzza avenue. 2 fatalities.

On 20 November 2024, in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, unidentified armed individuals shot at individuals and at the premises of an equestrian center. Several vehicles were set one fire and one person was reported missing.
Around 20 November 2024 (as reported), in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' with his hands and feet tied inside a field. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2024, in Melchor de Ocampo, Chihuahua, an unknown armed individual shot and injured a state police officer while the officers preparate an action to carry out an arrest warrant against the individual. The perpetrator was killed as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 20 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Alvaro Obregon, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle arrived at Tarango street, in Colonia Las Aguilas, and one of them got off the vehicle and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, at least two individuals on motorcycles intercepted a man driving a motorcycle with his wife and son, shot him and fled the scene (drive-by) in Colonia Tlatilco. The man was recently released from prison. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a vehicle shot and killed a man in front of Universidad Autonoma Metropolitana (UAM) on Eje 5 Norte, in Colonia San Martin Xochinahuac (drive-by). The victim worked as a ticket collector on metrobuses. State police officers arrested three suspects. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, suspected drug-dealers attacked state police officers and set a patrol on fire to prevent the arrest of two men. Three people were arrested as a result and police officers seized drug. There were no injuries.
On 16 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztacalco, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured a woman in a drive-by attack in colonia Gabriel Ramos Millan. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, two armed individuals shot and killed a man driving his car near Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. The victim was identified as the leader of the criminal group Los Changos dedicated to the sale of drugs. 1 fatality.
On 17 November 2024, in Comala, Colima, armed individuals arrived in a vehicle shot and killed a man and injured another one in colonia Los Aguajes. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2024, in Jose Maria Morelos y Pavon, Durango, according to witnesses, two individuals shot and killed a man inside a food delivery business on Constitucion y Morelos street. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed individuals approached a man and shot him. The man died as a result. The same day, two men on a motorcycle approached a man in Colonia San Miguel and shot him. The man died as a result. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, unidentified individual(s) shot and injured a man at a gas station in Colonia Ciudadela. An alternative version indicates that the victim was not injured. The man is the former Municipal Director of Social Development. 1 injured.

On 22 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, three men on a motorcycle shot at the municipal Director of the Police Training Institute (INFOPOL) as he was leaving his house (off-duty) on Parque Florido street, in Colonia Del Parque (drive-by). The victim remained uninjured and there were no casualties.
On 17 November 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, at least two armed men shot and killed at a municipal police officer in colonia Colon. The police later arrested two of the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in San Francisco del Rincon, Guanajuato, armed men opened fire from a motorcycle at a couple at an intersection (drive-by). One woman was killed and one woman was injured and fled the scene. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 19 November 2024, in San Francisco del Rincon, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man on his bicycle near Colonia San Miguel Plus (drive-by). The man victim died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 16 November 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, a young man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the area of Zapata. The area is known for drug dealing (likely gang-related). 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, several armed men shot at a group of people outside a department store in the south of the city, killing two men and injuring four people. The people were arriving to the area to participate in a demonstration led by the FDG to demand authorities to provide solutions to problems related to flooding, lack of drinking water, environmental contingency, infrastructure, transportation and other issues (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 15 November 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a man was attacked and burned. After surviving the attack, he walked to the Agustin Yanez street where he died and his body was found. He was identified as a homeless man. It is unknown who was the perpetrator. 1 fatality.
On 18 November 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two armed individuals shot and killed man on his motorcycle in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. 1 fatality.
Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, an armed man shot and killed a suspected drug dealer in Colonia Jose Clemente Orozco. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, two men met with another man in Colonia Las Huertas for the sale of a vehicle, and then abducted the man. The victim was taken to a house in Lomas del Tapatio, where the perpetrators hit him and stabbed him with a machete for unknown reasons. The victim later escaped in an unspecified manner. 1 injured.

Around 18 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and the body was found with his feet tied and burned inside an apartment in Colonia Hacienda de Santa Fe. 1 fatality.
Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found blindfolded and with gunshot wounds inside a canal. 1 fatality.

Around 17 November 2024 (between 16 - 18 November), in Villa Guerrero, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found on 18 November in Colonia San Martin la Fina decapitated. The man was reported missing on 16 November. 1 fatality.
On 18 November 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, three armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Cabanitas. 1 fatality.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Zapopan, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on 20 de Enero and 5 de Mayo streets, in Colonia San Juan de Ocotan (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, an individual on a motorcycle shot and injured a man who was driving a truck in the intersection of Buho and Quetzal streets, in the neighborhood of Parques de las Aves (drive-by). The victim is an off-duty military officer. 1 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); La Silla Rota; MiMorelia; Mural; Reforma; Riodoce
notes: On 20 November 2024, in San Pedro Cholula, Mexico, members of Los Palacios gang detained two state police officers who were conducting patrolling in the premises of Rescate de Cautiverio y Circo Foundation, on De los Pinos avenue. Other officers requested support, and military, National Guard, ministerial federal, state, and municipal police officers arrived at the scene and clashed with members of Los Palacios Gang. The officers arrested between 40 and 42 gang members (at least 38 men and two women), including its local leader. The officers also seized two fireweapons, anti-riot equipment, tactical vests with police identificatory, and 27 exotic animals. There were no casualties.

Around 18 November 2024 (as reported), in Valle de Chalco Solidaridad, Mexico, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture and wrapped in blankets and bags close to Lagunas de Xico. 1 fatality.
Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Xico, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found on El Rosario path, near the pantheon, together with a threatening message. 1 fatality.
Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), on Chalco-Tlahuac road (coded to Xico), Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets and bags. 1 fatality.
Around 17 November 2024 (month of), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and without head in colonia Valle Verde. 1 fatality.
On 22 November 2024, in Morelia, Michocan de Ocampo, at least two individuals shot and killed a man inside a food store on Luis de Leon Romano street, in Colonia Nueva Valladolid. 1 fatality.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 16 November 2024, in Los Bancos, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between members of the CJNG and Los Caballeros Templarios gang. The clash also occurred in the center of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 16 November 2024, in Paracuaro, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between members of the CJNG and Los Caballeros Templarios. The clash started in another location in the municipality (coded separately). A man was shot and injured with a stray bullet.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); 8 Columnas; El Proceso; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia; Tabasco Hoy; Zona Franca
notes: On 18 November 2024, in Tzurumutaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, according to witnesses, at least 20 members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) abducted the owner of El Gran Tariacuri restaurant. Minutes after this, state police officers intercepted the perpetrators and clashed with them, although they got to flee with the victim. One officer and a woman were injured. The abducted man was found alive with blow wounds on 21 November 2024 in Tenencia Lazaro Cardenas, municipality of Erongaricuaro. The abduction is suspectedly linked to extorsion.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in La Cantera, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals and state police officers clashed on Jacona-Los Reyes road. The officers seized a fireweapon, an improvised explosive device, and a motorcycle. Casualties unknown.

Around 16 November 2024 (as reported), in Tejaro de Los Izquierdo, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds, semi-naked and with the 'tiro de gracia'. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia
notes: Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Tejaro de Los Izquierdo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found. The bodies of the man and the woman were located on the main square: the man was dismembered and the woman had several gunshot wounds (including 'tiro de gracia') and their hands were tied. 2 fatalities.

source: El Proceso; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia
notes: Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Tejaro de Los Izquierdo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and their body was found on a side of the path to Uruetaro, in a place known as La Florena, and was naked and dismembered. 1 fatality.

Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), in Cuautla, Morelos, four people were killed and their bodies were found on Pesebres and Miguel Hidalgo streets, in Colonia Biznaga (an alternative version indicates that the bodies were located in Colonia Gabriel Tepepa). Three of the victims were burnt, and the other was dismembered. 4 fatalities.
On 15 November 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, several armed men shot against the bar 'La Cruderia' in Colonia Teopanzolco. One private security guard was injured.
On 20 November 2024, in Acatlipa, Morelos, armed individuals on a motorcycle intercepted a man driving his car, shot him and then fled the scene (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2024, in Temixco, Morelos, unidentified individual(s) shot and killed a man who was driving on Aldama street, in Colonia Los Presidentes. The victim was the former mayor of Temixco and former major candidate of Force for Mexico party in the 2021 elections. 1 fatality.
Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, two young people were killed and their bodies were found inside plastic bags. 2 fatalities.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and their hands tie up to the chest in Libramiento Noreste. 1 fatality.

On 16 November 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, an armed man shot and killed a man in Colonia Balcones. According to the investigations, it is suspected that the event is related to drug dealing. 1 fatality.

Around 20 November 2024 (as reported), in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, wrapped in plastic bags, tape around the head, and the hands and feet tied, in the intersection of 33 and 8 streets, in Colonia Las Brisas Residencial. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, three armed individuals approached three people at a barbecue in Colonia Jardines and shot them. Three men were injured as a result. 3 injuries.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic and the legs mutilated on Milan street and Luca avenue, in Colonia Lomas de San Martin. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 16 November 2024 (as reported), in San Pedro Ixtlahuaca, Oaxaca, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a car that was set on fire on the road to Arrazola in Santa Cruz Xoxocotlan. 1 fatality.

Around 17 November 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, four people, including two women and one man, were killed and their bodies were found inside a clandestine grave in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. The bodies were wrapped in plastic bags and they showed signs of being tied. Also in Puebla, a man was killed and the body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' in colonia Naciones Unidas. 5 fatalities.

On 19 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at one woman and one man inside a car traveling with two girls at the height of El Llanito (drive-by). The woman died as a result of the shooting and the man was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 22 November 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two individuals shot and injured the off-duty Deputy Director for Territorial Deployment of the Secretariat of Public Safety (police forces) in Fraccionamiento Hacienda de Santa Clara. 1 injured.
Around 20 November 2024 (as reported), in La Resurreccion, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a mototaxi. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, armed individuals shot and killed three men and a woman in fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar and Region 251. A little girl was also injured with a stray bullet. According to the investigations, the event is related to drug dealing. 4 fatalities.
Around 17 November 2024 (as reported), in Casa Blanca, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Imala, Sinaloa, an armed clash took place between rival groups. Following the clash, the armed men burned a vehicle close to Alcoyonqui and threw tire punctures (coded separately). The cables of the Federal Electricity Commission were damaged leaving the municipality without electricity as a result. There were no injuries.
Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in El Chilillo, Sinaloa, a couple was killed and their bodies were found on the Mazatlan-Culiacan highway with signs of torture. 2 fatalities.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Esperanza, Sonora, a man was killed and the body was found with the hands tied up. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, on Sasabe-Saric road (coded to Saric), Sonora, armed individuals crashed their van into military, federal ministerial and state police vehicles, and then opened fire at the officers and a clash ensued. An officer and three armed individuals died, and six officers were injured. This clash is suspectedly linked to a security operation that the same officers carried out in El Chile earlier the same day where officers seized five vehicles (three of them, armored) and destroyed a camp and an antenna used for criminal activities.

source: La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio; Reforma
notes: On 19 November 2024, around Tres Palos, Tamaulipas, armed individuals shot at state police officers on 101 federal road, between Tres Palos and Las Norias. The officers repelled the aggression and the armed individuals robbed a patrol car. Two state police officers and three armed individuals died, and five people were injured. 5 fatalities, 5 injuries.

On 19 November 2024, in Mendez municipality, Tamaulipas, armed individuals attacked state police officers at the height to Mendez who repelled the aggression. The armed individuals robbed the patrol car. Three state police officers died as a result and five people were injured. 3 fatalities, 5 injuries.

source: Hoy Tamaulipas; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 22 November 2024, in Doroteo Arango, Tamaulipas, state police officers and armed individuals clashed. The latter used armored vehicles and drones charged with explosives. An unspecified number of officers was injured.

Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence in colonia Las Torres. According to authorities, it is suspected that this event is related to a settling of accounts between criminal groups. 1 fatality.
Around 18 November 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a plastic bag near Colonia Arboleda de Juarez. 1 fatality.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, three men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands and feet tied in a house on Alamo and Manzanos streets, in Colonia Balcones de Alcala. The victims had been abducted. A suspect was arrested. 3 fatalities.

source: El Norte; Hoy Tamaulipas; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: Around 22 November 2024 (as reported), on San Fernando-Reynosa road (coded to Plan de Alazan), Tamaulipas, suspected members of Los Escorpiones Gang killed six suspected members of Los Zetas Vieja Escuela Gang and their bodies were found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds, and the hands tied by Brecha 113, which leads to Ejido Martin Rocha, near Ejido Plan de Alazan. Some of the bodies were piled up and covered in blankets. 6 fatalities.

source: Hoy Tamaulipas; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; Reforma
notes: On 19 November 2024, in San Fernando, Tamaulipas, armed individuals shot at a state police escort, killing a woman officer and injuring five other officers. The escort was transporting the dead body of a police officer who died during a clash in Tres Palos earlier the same day (coded separately). The officers arrested one individual. 1 fatality, 5 injured.
On 20 November 2024, in San Fernando, Tamaulipas, state police officers and armed individuals clashed. Three officers died. 3 fatalities.
On 21 November 2024, in San Fernando, Tamaulipas, state security officers and armed individuals clashed. Three armed individuals that belonged to a cell that operated in Matamoros died. 3 fatalities.

A man was arrested. 1 fatality.

notes: On 12 October 2024, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz, there was an armed clash between three armed people and the municipal police after the armed men killed a person (coded separately). One armed man was injured. Three people were arrested.
