notes: On 12 October 2024, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz, at least three armed men shot and killed a person around colonia Jacarandas. The perpetrators later clashed with the municipal police (coded separately). 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 22 November 2024, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, a man on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in Colonia El Tanque (drive-by). The perpetrator fled towards Colonia El Sumidero. 1 injured.

Around 1 October 2024 (month of), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was kidnapped by several armed people after he arrived to his house. He was later found alive and rescued on 28 November by the authorities in Colonia Hidalgo. Drugs and weapons were seized also.

On 12 October 2024, in Toluca de Lerdo, Mexico, two people (a man and a woman) abducted a vendor. The perpetrators were arrested around 27 November 2024 in Tijuana, Baja California. It is unknown whether the victims were found and released.

Around 15 October 2024 (end of month), near Oxchuc, Chiapas, the former Tzeltal (Mayan indigenous group) woman mayor of Oxchuc and former local deputy for the We Can Move Chiapas party was shot at by two armed individuals when she was in her vehicle on her way to a meeting in an unspecified community. According to the victim, who was unharmed, before the attack, she was told (it is not known by whom) that a vehicle verification was being carried out and that they were looking for her (it is not specified who) and that three armed individuals upon seeing her said that she was coming and began to shoot at the vehicle. There were no casualties.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, at least two unidentified individuals abducted four Jordanian migrants. Around 26 November 2024, municipal police officers released the victims and arrested two armed underage men in a house in the intersection of Licenciado Benito Juarez and Jose Isabel Sanchez streets, in Colonia Campesina.

Around 17 November 2024 (as reported), in Jacona de Plancarte, Michoacan de Ocampo, a person was killed and only the body was found in Colonia Valle Verde. On 23 November, a head in a state of decomposition was found next to the strawberry monument close to the free highway. The head is suspected to belong to the same person of the body found on 17 November in Colonia Valle Verde. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2024, between San Luis Rio Colorado and Ciudad Morelos, Baja California, there was an armed clash and pursuit between municipal police forces and an unknown number of people who were caught while lowering a decapitated body in Ciudad Morelos (coded separately). The armed individuals managed to escape, and the clash ended in San Luis Rio Colorado. Casualties unknown.

Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Morelos, Baja California, members of Los Chapitos Gang held a member of Los Rusos gang and interrogated him. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. The victim was beheaded and his body was left naked in a square of Ciudad Morelos with a hat. Police officers noticed when individuals were leaving the body and attempted to intervene and there was an armed clash (coded separately). 1 fatality.
On 23 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, two men opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Valle del Rubi Seccion Lomas. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Proceso; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 23 November 2024, in 20 de Noviembre, Chiapas, according to witnesses, armed men aboard several vans intercepted and abducted seven people (four men, two women, and a child, four of them members of the same family) who travelled in a public van on La Angostura road towards San Cristobal de las Casas. Alternative versions indicate that the victims were six or nine people. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.
Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in La Concordia, Chiapas, five people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture at the detour in Colonia Valle Morelos. 5 fatalities.

On 23 November 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, unknown armed individuals shot at an off-duty element of the National Guard in Colonia Los Arquitos who died as a result. The victim was accompanied by a woman who was not injured. 1 fatality.
On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, armed individuals shot at a police officer who was responding to a report of gunshots in Colonia fraccionamiento Popular. 1 injury.

On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two armed individuals approached a group of people and opened fire at them in Colonia Centro Historico. Two people died and three were injured as a result. The place of the attack was identified as a point for the sale of drugs. 2 fatalities, 3 injuries.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle in Colonia Juventino Rosas and shot and injured two men (drive-by). 2 injuries.
On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, four armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle and shot a man 15 times in Colonia Santa Martha Acatitla (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Milpa Alta, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture on a grass field in Nuevo Camino a Mina, in San Pedro Atocpan. 1 fatality.
Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Puerta de Anzar, Colima, two men and two women were killed and their bodies were found tied inside a taxi. 4 fatalities.
Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in El Colomo, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found hanging from the Panteones bridge on the Mandanillo-Armeria highway. 1 fatality.

Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), near San Andres Cholula, Puebla, four people were killed and their bodies were found burned between San Andres Cholula and San Jeronimo Tecuanipan. 4 fatalities.

Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Laguna de Canachi, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the human remains were found burned inside a cooler on the side of the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway. 1 fatality.
On 23 November 2024, in Jalapa, Tabasco, at least five armed individuals entered a wedding and opened fire at the guests inside a casino. One man died and two were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injuries.
Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Valle Bonito. 1 fatality.
On 24 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, two people attacked and shot a man in Colonia El Florido Segunda Seccion. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.
Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), close to Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered with his head and legs missing on the highway to Juarez. 1 fatality.
On 24 November 2024, in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, armed individuals shot and killed a man in his car. The man was identified as an off-duty ministerial federal police officer. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, three armed individuals who arrived on motorcycles attacked a group of people drinking alcohol in Colonia Morelos. Three men died as a result. The attack is being linked to disputes between La Union Tepito and Anti-Union, although this was not confirmed by authorities. 3 fatalities.

On 24 November 2024, in Santiago Papasquiaro, Durango, five armed men intercepted a man in a vehicle and got out of the vehicle and chased the man and beat him with a bat and a machete and then shot him. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.
Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found tied and gagged in Colonia Barrio Alto. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at the facade of a home (likely with people inside, since the attack took place in the early hours of the morning) in Colonia 28 de Octubre. There were no injuries.
Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), in Las Puentes, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; La Jornada; Milenio; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 24 November 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, seven armed individuals entered a bar and opened fire at individuals inside leading to the death of six people and the injury of 10. The attack is being linked to disputes between the CJNG and La Barredora Gang. Among the victims there is the member of a rancho music group. 6 fatalities, 10 injuries.

On 24 November 2024, close to Reynosa, Tamaulipas, armed individuals opened fire at state police officers on surveillance on the Reynosa-San Fernando highway who repelled the aggression. One armed individual was killed and officers seized a weapon. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 24 November 2024, in Villa Aldama, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer who had just finished his shift in Cerro de Leon. 1 fatality.
On 25 November 2024, in Hermosillo, Guanajuato, armed individual(s) in a vehicle shot and killed a man on Mazatlan street, in Colonia Lopez Portillo (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 25 November 2024, in Teloloapan, Guerrero, unidentified individuals shot and killed a member of La Tecampanera self-defense group in Colonia Vicente Guerrero. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, armed individuals aboard two vehicles shot at a digital platform cab on Independencia avenue, in Colonia La Esperanza, killing the woman passenger and injuring the driver (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 25 November 2024, in La Cantera, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed men aboard two trucks opened fire at the police station. One minor was injured and two patrol cars were damaged. 1 injury.

On 25 November 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed individuals entered Aqua Motel, on Industrial boulevard, in Colonia Eduardo Ruiz, threatened the employees, and shot and killed two male clients. The perpetrators locked the wife of one of the victims inside their room. 2 fatalities.
On 25 November 2024, in China, Nuevo Leon, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no injuries.

On 25 November 2024, around General Bravo, Nuevo Leon, rival organized crime organizations clashed near the toll on km. 119 of the highway to Reynosa. A man died. State police officers later arrived at the scene and seized two vehicles with a fireweapon, drugs, and tactical equipment inside. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, unknown armed individuals shot at the home of the Undersecretary of Public Security of the Municipality of Solidaridad (likely not empty). There were no injuries.
On 25 November 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no injuries.
On 25 November 2024, in Los Arrieros, Sonora, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man and left his body wrapped in blankets in El Sahuaral. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 25 November 2024, in Ixtaczoquitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals abducted a man who was driving a motorcycle in Escamela. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 25 November 2024, in Minatitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver who was inside his vehicle on Buenos Aires street, in Colonia Nueva Mina. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2024, in Sombrerete, Zacatecas, suspected gang members aboard three trucks shot at National Guard officers who were patrolling on the road to El Mineral and Fresnillo, initiating a clash. One officer was injured. 1 injured.

On 25 November 2024, in Sombrerete, Zacatecas, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man at his home in Colonia El Penasco. The man was identified was a peasant leader and had recently made complaints about intimidations. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, several individuals abducted a man at Plaza Mundo Divertido. The man was shot and killed and his body was found minutes later inside a car in Colonia Villa Floresta. 1 fatality.

Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, a wire around the neck, and wrapped in a blanket on Via Rapida Oriente, by Colonia Los Alamos. 1 fatality.

Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, unidentified individuals abducted four migrants from El Salvador, Ecuador, and Honduras. The victims got to escape from a house in Colonia Portal del Roble and were assisted by state, military, and National Guard officers.
On 26 November 2024, in Guanajuato, Guanajuato, unidentified individuals shot at people on Maravillas alley, killing a woman and injuring two men. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel and National Guard officers clashed. The officers arrested four members of the cartel. Casualties unknown.
On 26 November 2024, in Tezoyuca, Mexico, several individuals shot and killed three men who were inside vehicles on Bosque de Hawai street, in Colonia Ejidos de Tequisistlan. 3 fatalities.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 26 November 2024, in Las Ordenitas, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected gang members shot at state, federal ministerial, military, and National Guard officers, initiating a clash. Two armed individuals died and a military officer was injured. Officers seized six fireweapons, tactical equipment, and a stolen van. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 26 November 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed groups clashed on Libramiento Norte, between Colonia Primero de Mayo and Fraccionamiento Monte Olivo. Two men were injured and went to the hospital by their own means. National Guard officers arrived at the scene and seized a motorcycle and a car. 2 injured.

Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found with wounds in the head and burnt in an uninhabited area by the bridge on Nacataz river, in Colonia Alfonso Martinez Dominguez. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2024, in San Juan Cuautlancingo, Puebla, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a ministerial federal police officer (assumed on-duty) on Periferico Ecologico. The victim suspectedly carried documents of investigations related to persons engaged in the theft of cargo. 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in El Ranchito, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets, tape around the head, and the hands tied with ropes on a side of a metal recycling plant on Prolongacion Alvaro Obregon avenue. 1 fatality.
On 26 November 2024, in the municipality of Elota, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed on Culiacan-Mazatlan road. Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in Ixhuatlan del Sureste, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found inside plastic bags in the intersection of Principal and Pino Suarez streets, in Colonia Santa Maria. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in Mexicali, Baja California, according to witnesses, four armed men shot and killed a man in the parking lot of a bar in fraccionamiento Los Pinos. The victim was a lawyer for a man known as 'El Plaga', a leader of Los Rusos Gang considered as the operational arm of the Ismael El Mayo Zambada. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, armed individuals aboard a car shot at municipal police officers on Mariano Escobedo e International street, in Colonia Castillo (drive-by). The officers were escorting a vehicle suspectedly linked with a homicide. There were no casualties.

On 27 November 2024, in La Paz, Baja California Sur, according to a woman, she and her partner were kidnapped by a group of armed men in colonia Marquez de Leon. They were beaten up. She was left injured. The man's whereabouts are unknown.

On 27 November 2024, in the municipality of Villaflores, Chiapas, organized crime organizations clashed with military and state police officers. At least two state police officers were injured and several armed individuals were arrested, including one of the gangs' leader of 'halconeo' (surveillance) operations. Officers also seized fireweapons, motorcycles, cars, and vans. At least 2 injured.

Around 27 November 2024 (as reported), in the south of Jardines del Pedregal (coded to Ciudad de Mexico - Alvaro Obregon), three men abducted a woman and abandoned her inside a car in Averanda square, Cuernavaca, Morelos state. State police officers of Morelos located and released her uninjured.

On 27 November 2024, in Frontera, Coahuila de Zaragoza, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals hit and injured a man on Encino and Cerezo streets, in Colonia Jardines del Aeropuerto. 1 injured.

Around 27 November 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to several witnesses, men on a motorcycle stopped next to a vehicle on Adolfo Lopez Mateos boulevard and shot and killed its driver. 1 fatality.

Around 27 November 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle approached a woman on 10 de Marzo street, in Colonia Ampliacion Emiliano Zapata Sur, and one of them got off the vehicle and shot and killed the woman. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, at least four armed men entered the barracks of Group 38 of the Auxiliary Police, in Colonia Alcalde Barranquitas, and subdued and tied three police officers. The perpetrators then seized 24 short weapons and two long weapons. There were no casualties.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 27 November 2024, in Las Pilas, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed individuals shot at municipal police officers along the road to Maravatio. The clash continued in Las Pilas, where officers killed an individual and the rest of them fled. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by inside a business in la Colonia Jardines de San Martin. The victim had drug dealing records. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in El Ranchito, Sinaloa, armed individuals entered a house used as a clandestine casino in the intersection of Verano street and Huizache avenue, and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

Around 27 November 2024 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket with signs of violence in between Colonia Sierra Bonita and Fraccionamiento Romanza Residencial. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a group of unidentified armed men broke into the rehabilitation center 'Amigos por siempre' and shot and injured an inmate. The event occurred in Colonia Ciudad Jardin. Later the inmates rioted and set fire to the mattresses (coded separately).

Around 28 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence inside the trunk of a car in Colonia Mariano Matamoros. One of the bodies was wrapped with a blanket. According to witnesses, several armed men left the bodies in the car and then ran away. One of the victims was also found naked. 2 fatalities.
On 28 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was shot and injured between Avenidas Negrete and Madero. It is suspected the perpetrator was an armed woman. Later, two people were arrested.
On 28 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was shot and killed on Avenida Constitucion. The perpetrators ran away on foot and others in a vehicle. Two men were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 28 November 2024, in Canasayab, Campeche, two armed men in a vehicle shot and killed two men. It is suspected to be related to a settling of accounts. 2 fatalities.

On 28 November 2024, around Saltillo, Coahuila, there was an armed clash between armed men and the state police on the Monterrey-Saltillo highway. One man was arrested. According to the investigations, this event could be related to a previous clash in Santa Catarina municipality, in Nuevo Leon (coded separately), however, this was not confirmed. No casualties.
Around 28 November 2024 (as reported), in Lomas de Chapultepec, Guerrero, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in a blanket with her hands tied up and stabbed. 1 fatality.
On 28 November 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, a young man was shot and injured by two armed men inside a beauty salon in Colonia Ramirez.
On 28 November 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. A man was killed and his body was found. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2024, in Ciudad Valles, San Luis Potosi, According to witnesses, gunmen in a vehicle fired at a passing vehicle and the vehicle crashed, killing the driver and injuring two others. The gunmen also kidnapped a man who was in the vehicle. The kidnapping victim had just been released from prison. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2024, in Cibuta, Sonora, there was an armed clash between the military and armed men while officers were patrolling the area. One man was killed and another one was injured. Weapons were seized. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, there was an armed clash between criminal gropus on Avenida 5 de mayo. Two people were killed. An unknown number of people were arrested. Later, a second armed clash was reported on Avenida Quintana Roo. One person was injured. Lastly, another armed clash was reported on Avenida Hortencias, where two people were killed and another one was injured. Suspectedly, all these clashes are gang-related. 2 injured, 4 fatalities.
On 29 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was shot and killed in colonia Los Laureles. A man and a woman were arrested as they are suspected to be the perpetrators. 1 fatality.
On 29 November 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed men shot and killed a man in fraccionamiento Valle Paraiso. The victim was a municipal police officer (off duty). 1 fatality.
Around 29 November 2024 (as reported), around Ucareo, Michoacan, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in bags on the Ucareo-Jerahuaro. 1 fatality.
On 29 November 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in colonia Calera Chica. 1 fatality.
Around 29 November 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets in Colonia Naciones Unidas. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2024, in Heroica Nogales, Sonora, there was an armed clash between the state police and members of a criminal group during an operation in a base camp. One person was killed. Four people were arrested. Weapons were seized. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, an armed individual shot and killed two officers of the Attorney General's office (FGR) in fraccionamiento Estrellas de Buenavista on patrol. Several people were arrested. The perpetrator is a business man who was owed money by the victims. 2 fatalities.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); La Jornada; La Verdad; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 5 November 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, two armed individuals opened fire from a motorcycle (drive-by) and shot two women indigenous Triqui (coded to Mixtec Indigenous Group) and members of MULT while they were in a vehicle in Colonia Union. Both women died, and the driver was injured. One of the perpetrators was an active state police officer (likely off-duty) who was hired to carry out the attack; he was arrested. 2 fatalities, 1 injury.

On 3 December 2024, in San Francisco de Asis, Chiapas, members of Los Herrera gang entered the community and clashed with local armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). There were no casualties.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Rafael Delgado, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals opened fire at two state police officers who were injured and transported to the hospital. 2 injuries.
On 30 October 2024, in Corral de Piedras, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed men. Two people were arrested. Casualties unknown.
Around 5 November 2024 (as reported), in Otatitan, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a burning car. 1 fatality.
Around 16 November 2024 (as reported), in Zinapecuaro de Figueroa, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found dismembered inside a cooler. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Taxco de Alarcon, Guerrero, a journalist was assaulted by the security personnel of the municipal president during a religious cultural-musical event after the escort tried to snatch the work equipment, and carried out physical and verbal aggressions. There were no fatalities.

Around 25 November 2024 (as reported), in Valle de Chalco Solidaridad, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found together with a threatening message signed by the CJNG. State police officers arrested 11 suspects (nine men and two women) in Ixtapaluca around 1 December 2024. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, according to the victim, unidentified individuals abducted a man on Periferico Sur, near Lopez Mateos avenue, and took him to a property where they hit and injured him. The perpetrators released the victim the day after on Antonio Larranaga street, in Colonia Huentitan El Alto. 1 injured.
Around 29 November 2024 (week of), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied in a canal next to Fresnos street, in Fraccionamiento La Azucena. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2024, in Paracuaro municipality, Michoacan, armed individuals intercepted and attacked a well known lemon business farmer on the Cuatro Caminos-Apatzingan highway. The business owner died at the hospital due to the injuries. Another man that was with him was also injured. The killed victim, had been threaten by criminal groups and was part of a extortions. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle arrived at Articulo 43 avenue and Privada Santiago street, in the neighborhood of Nuevo Leon, in Colonia Alianza Real, one of them got off the vehicle, and shot and killed two men. 2 fatalities.
On 29 November 2024, in Campo Eureka, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. Casualties unknown.
On 30 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a transport driver in Fraccionamiento El Laurel 2. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, four individuals shot at a handicrafts store on Via Rapida Oriente street, injuring a 17-years old boy who was inside. Also in Tijuana, four individuals shot and injured a 17-years old boy in a clandestine casino near the toll of San Ysidro. 2 injured.

Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man killed two women and their bodies were found in a house on Uxmal street, in Colonia Mariano Matamoros. One of the victims was tied up and had a bag around the head, and the other was wrapped in blankets. The perpetrator was injured and arrested during a police operation in the same colonia. 2 fatalities.

On 30 November 2024, in Ocozocoautla, Chiapas, according to witnesses, armed individuals on two motorcycles shot at people at 'El Hornito' tacos stand, on Primera Avenida Norte avenue, killing two men (drive-by). 2 fatalities.
On 30 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, several armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Ajusco. 1 fatality.
On 30 November 2024, in El Colomo, Colima, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man on Lopez Mateos avenue (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, suspected cartel members shot at members of a family who managed a stand for the sell of churros on Tierra y Libertad street, in Colonia Emiliano Zapata, killing two women and injuring three people (a man, a woman, and a minor). 2 fatalities, 3 injured.

Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets and inside bags in a canal on Prolongacion Hidalgo avenue, in Colonia Industrial Barrientos. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), on the Zinapecuaro-Ciudad Hidalgo road (coded to La Estancia), Michoacan de Ocampo, a person was killed and the dismembered body was found on the bypass road to La Estancia. According to the authorities, this and other attack perpetrated the day after in the municipality of Zinapecuaro (coded separately) are linked to the conflict between the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) and Grupo X Gang. 1 fatality.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Norte; El Proceso; La Jornada; La Verdad; Milenio; Noroeste; Reforma; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana; Zona Franca
notes: On 30 November 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, armed men entered a house on Cerro de las Turquesas street, in Colonia Vista Hermosa, and shot and killed nine men (including a boy). The house is a drug selling point known as 'El Picadero'. State police officers arrived at the scene and seized two fireweapons and drugs. Also in Jiutepec, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle in Colonia Vicente Guerrero (drive-by). A girl who was with the victim was injured. 10 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 30 November 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, two armed men entered a house and shot at people in Colonia Vicente Guerrero. Three people were injured, including two girls. A day later, a man who was a victim died at the hospital. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2024, in San Miguel Canoa, Puebla, two armed individuals entered a drug selling point on El Jardin and Emiliano Zapata streets and shot and killed at the people who were inside, killing a man and injuring two. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 30 November 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, according to witnesses, at least four individuals on motorcycles shot and killed four men (including two boys) in Colonia Santa Cecilia (drive-by). Also, a man was shot and killed by unknown armed individuals inside a barbershop. Also in Cancun, two men were shot and injured by an armed individual inside a house in Colonia Villas Otoch Paraiso. The three attacks are linked to disputes between drug trafficking groups. 5 fatalities.
On 30 November 2024, in the area between La Rastra and Palmarito (coded to La Rastra), Sinaloa, unidentified armed groups clashed. Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), in Juan Diaz Covarrubias, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, eight people (seven men and a woman) were killed and their bodies were found dismembered, partially burnt, and inside plastic bags in Aparicio ranch. The victims had been abducted in the towns of De Hueyapan and Catemaco on unspecified dates. 8 fatalities.

On 1 December 2024, in Tecate, Baja California, armed individuals shot and killed a man at 'La Guarida de Diversion' children's playground. A 3-years old boy was injured. The killed victim was identified as the former boyfriend of a woman who was an activist in the search of missing people and who was killed in February. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and wrapped in a blanket in colonia Herrera. 1 fatality.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found burned in Colonia Guaycura. 1 fatality.
On 1 December 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses and security cameras footage, two individuals shot and injured a man in Colonia Dimenstein. 1 injured.
On 1 December 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man on Ortiz de Campo street, in Colonia San Felipe. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets on Venceremos avenue, by Colonia Granjas del Valle. The victim had been reported missing since 28 November. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia; Riodoce
notes: On 1 December 2024, near Los Charcos, Michoacan de Ocampo, military, National Guard, and state police officers clashed with armed individuals from a criminal group. Three men were killed. The officers also seized three fireweapons and tactical equipment. 3 fatalities.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in El Salitre, Nuevo Leon, a woman was killed and the body was found with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2024, in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a woman journalist who was driving a van on Capitan Alonso de Leon avenue (drive-by). The victim is also wife of Ricardo a reporter for the Marmat Noticias media outlet.1 injured.

On 1 December 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, a man was shot and killed by unknown armed individuals. The victim was a bricklayer but it is unknown if the attack is related to his profession. The attack is linked to disputes between drug trafficking groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, a man was killed and his body was found inside a motorcycle taxi belonging to a union of people with disabilities. The attack is linked to disputes between drug trafficking groups. 1 fatality.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, National Guard officers and armed individuals clashed. Casualties unknown.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Comalcalco, Tabasco, men in a van shot and killed a man on Gil y Saenz street, in Colonia Centro (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Macuspana, Tabasco, according to the victim's sister, at least three men entered a house in Nabor Cornelio ranch and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.
Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in La Pimienta, Zacatecas, two young men were killed and their bodies were found with the 'tiro de gracia'. 2 fatalities.

Around 2 December 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and wrapped in a blanket in fraccionamiento Real del Bosque. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two brothers who were standing in front of a house in Colonia Libertad Parte Alta. One of them was a minister at the Antioquia Missionary Center (Christian Group). 2 fatalities.

On 2 December 2024, in La Paz, Baja California Sur, a group of armed men intercepted a group of six fishermen and tried to kidnap them around Playa El Coyote. The victims were in a vehicle when they were intercepted by the perpetrators, who forced them to get out of the car (shots were likely fired as shots were heard, and the vehicle was left with bullet holes). The perpetrators burned the victims' vehicle. Three of the men managed to escape. The rest of the victim's whereabouts is unknown. Casualties unknown.

On 2 December 2024, in Manuel Ojinaga, Chihuahua, armed individuals attacked state police officers in two vehicles and then threw tire punctures on the road to avoid further persecution. There were no casualties.
On 2 December 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, armed individuals carried out a drive-by shooting targeting a transit police officer. There were no casualties.

Around 2 December 2024 (as reported), in El Treinta, Guerrero, three men were killed and their bodies were found beheaded with a message inside a vehicle. Only three heads and two bodies were found. The third's victim body was later found in El Metlapil (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

On 2 December 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, according to witnesses, an armed woman and her accomplice shot and injured a man who was working in the logistics of public buses in Colonia Martin Castrejon. 1 injured.

On 2 December 2024, around Caltzontzin, Michoacan, armed individuals from criminal groups clashed on the road to San Andres Coru. One man was injured. The injured man and another one were later arrested.

On 2 December 2024, in Yautepec de Zaragoza, Morelos, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. One minor was injured with a stray bullet. He died later at the hospital. Another version, is that there was an attack against the owner of a business who also died during the attack. At least 1 fatality.
On 2 December 2024, in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men entered a house and shot and killed a woman and injured a man in Colonia Colinas del Aeropuerto. 1 fatality.
On 2 December 2024, in San Pedro Garza Garcia, Nuevo Leon, a man was shot and killed by armed individuals at the city center. The perpetrators left a message. 1 fatality.
On 2 December 2024, in El Ranchito, Sinaloa, criminal members shot at a drug addict rehab center (likely not empty) and set it on fire. There were no casualties, only material damages.
On 2 December 2024, in Hermosillo, Sonora, three armed men in two vehicles stabbed at two men in colonia El Jito. They took them for some blocks and later released them injured. 2 injured.

On 2 December 2024, in San Carlos, Tamulipas, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the state police during a patrol. One police officer was injured but died later at the hospital. 1 fatality.

Around 2 December 2024 (as reported), in Tepetongo, Zacatecas, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and a message signed by a criminal group in the trunk of a taxi. The victim was a taxi driver who had been reported missing. 1 fatality.
On 2 December 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, members of a criminal group entered a house and shot and killed a man in colonia Toma de Zacatecas. 1 fatality.

Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence, hands tied up and covered with a blanket in colonia Reforma. 1 fatality.
On 3 December 2024, in La Paz, Baja California Sur, several individuals entered a house and beaten up a man in colonia Colina de La Cruz. The victim was left injured.
On 3 December 2024, in Palenque, Chiapas, an armed man on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a business in a drive-by in Colonia Unitaria de los Trabajadores. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2024, in San Jose Buenavista Tercero, Chiapas, members of Los Herrera gang entered the community and clashed with local armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 3 December 2024, in Pantelho municipality, Chiapas, members of Los Herrera gang entered the communities of Polonia and La Esperanza and clashed with local armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately).There were no casualties.

On 3 December 2024, in El Roblar Chishtontic, Chiapas, members of Los Herrera gang entered the community and clashed with local armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 3 December 2024, in Abasolo municipality, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot at a vehicle on the Penjamo-Huanimaro highway around Cabrera community. The victims were a woman and her underage daughter who were killed. The woman was state police officer (likely off-duty). 2 fatalities.
On 3 December 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to residents, armed individuals shot and killed a man and a woman who were at their street restaurant in Colonia La Mision. 2 fatalities.

On 3 December 2024, in Purisima del Rincon, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, four armed men shot at four people making a bonfire in fraccionamiento San Juan del Bosque. Three people were killed and one person was injured. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 3 December 2024, in San Francisco del Rincon, Guanajuato, six armed individuals travelling in three motorcycles shot at a vehicle in a drive-by in Barrio de Guadalupe. Two men were injured and another was killed. Two victims were municipal police officers off duty. The injured victim died also a day after at the hospital. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 3 December 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Lomas del Paraiso tercera seccion. 1 fatality.

Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in a blanket and tied up with a rope in colonia Villa Fontana Aqua. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); La Verdad; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Zinapecuaro de Figueroa municipality, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered, inside a bag with a message on the Mexico-Guadalajara highway. The victim was later identified as the , treasurer of the Zinapecuaro City Council. The perpetrators were members of the CJNG. 1 fatality.
On 3 December 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, two hooded men entered a store and shot a man to death in Colonia Cumbres. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2024, in San Jose Ixtapa, Puebla, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the state police. One armed man was killed. Three people were arrested and one police officer was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 3 December 2024, in Baila, Sinaloa, armed individuals who arrived by boat kidnapped the municipal commissioner of Cospita. He was later released.

On 3 December 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle and shot a man and his son on their motorcycle in Colonia Mision del Sol (drive-by). The father was killed and his son was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 3 December 2024, in Ciudad Rio Bravo, Tamaulipas, there was an armed clash between state police and armed individuals in colonia Octavio Silva. Three people who had been kidnapped were rescued. Weapons and vehicles were seized. Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 December 2024, in Ixtaczoquitlan, Veracruz, armed men kidnap a woman around Potrerillo I. It is suspected that the victim is a unionized worker of the city council. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 3 December 2024, in Granadas, Zacatecas, there was an armed clash between armed individuals from a criminal group and the state police during a police patrol. Four armed men were killed. 4 fatalities.

On 4 December 2024, in Pantelho, Chiapas, members of El Machete attacked community members of the municipality with bombs, firearms and explosives to take over the municipality as they accused members of local congress to be members of the rival group Los Herreras. Casualties unknown.

Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Mariano Balleza, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture on a road between El Vergel and San Julian. The victim was a miner who was kidnapped at the San Julian community mining site. 1 fatality.

source: La Prensa de Monclova; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 4 December 2024, in La Nortena, Chihuahua, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash leading to the burning of between 10 and 14 homes and between two and three vehicles. There were no injuries.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, a person was killed and the body was found burned near a migrant camp after two individuals left the remains at an intersection in Colonia Ampliacion Panamericana. Both men were arrested. 1 fatality.

source: E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 4 December 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Miguel Hidalgo, two members of Los Cuinis Gang shot and killed a man at El Bajio restaurant, in Plaza Miyana, colonia Polanco. The victim was a relative of a member of the gang and the former regional manager of a music band. It is suspected that the victim had ties (unspecified) to the CJNG. Six individuals were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2024, in Ometepec, Guerrero, armed men broke into a home and shot four men, three of whom were identified as brothers. The attack is suspected to be linked to organized crime as specific guns were used. 4 fatalities.

On 4 December 2024, in Rancho Nuevo, Guerrero, armed individuals traveling in several vehicles kidnapped 5 people from a home, including a municipal police commissioner (likely off-duty) and one minor. The whereabouts remain unknown.

On 4 December 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, members of the CJNG attacked and detained a journalist in a bar mistaking him for a rival to the CJNG in the Chapultepec area. The individuals attempted to extort the journalist's family for 35,000 pesos to release him. The journalist reports that the individuals staged as the CJNG but belong to another organized crime group. Eventually, the journalist was released. 1 injury.
Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in sheets in Colonia Valle de Tejeda. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), close to Las Trojes, Michoacan de Ocampo,a person was killed and the body was found between Las Trojes and Palo Blanco with a gunshot to the head (likely tiro de gracia) and tied up. 1 fatality.
Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Alvaro Obregon, Michoacan de Ocampo, one man was killed and his body was found inside a trunk covered in plastic bags. 1 fatality.
On 4 December 2024, in Paracuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash linked to the dispute of territory. There were no injuries.
On 4 December 2024, in Las Ordenitas, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash linked to the dispute of territory. There were no injuries.

On 4 December 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals on a motorcycle intercepted a couple traveling on a motorcycle close to the municipal cemetery and opened fire at them (drive-by). One man died and one woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 4 December 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed men aboard a truck shot a man at least ten times outside his home in Colonia Diaz Ordaz (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2024, in Ciudad de Cuetzalan, Puebla, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man and a woman on the Cuetzalan-Zacapoaxtla highway. The attack is suspected to be linked to the settling of scores between rival gangs. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 December 2024, close to Las Mulas, Sinaloa, seven men were killed and their bodies were found on the side of the road. vehicle was also seized. Unofficially, it was said that the men were killed during an armed clash between armed individuals. 7 fatalities.
Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found burned inside the trunk of a car in Colonia Libertad. 1 fatality.
On 4 December 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, at least two armed individuals opened fire at a nightclub killing a security guard outside the club. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2024 (between 2 - 6 December), in Pinos, Zacatecas, four men were killed, and their bodies were found on 6 December with signs of torture and with three posters next to their bodies. The men, including the son of the former local deputy, were kidnapped on 2 December by unknown armed individuals who set fire to the brewery where they were at. 4 fatalities.

On 5 December 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a couple of men shot and injured a man in the downtown area. Both men were arrested. Also, two armed men shot and killed the owner of a restaurant in Colonia Libertad Parte Alta. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 5 December 2024, in Isla Aguada, Campeche, two men opened fire and killed the former candidate for local deputy for the PES party inside a store. 1 fatality.
On 5 December 2024, in Coyame, Chihuahua, an armed clash took place between Coyame and Cuchillo Parado. Armed individuals set fire to cars. There were no injuries.

Around 5 December 2024 (as reported), in Madera, Chihuahua, two men were killed and their bodies were found in a gap that connects Largo Maderal and Las Margaritas. Both of the men were brothers and one was tied. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 December 2024 (as reported), in Torreon, Coahuila de Zaragoza, a woman was attacked and injured. She was found covered in a blanket and with signs of violence on the Torreon-Matamoros highway. 1 injury.

On 5 December 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, one man got off a motorcycle and shot at a man at a repair shop. The man fled the scene with an accomplice. The victim is suspected to be the owner of the shop. 1 fatality.
On 5 December 2024, in San Francisco del Rincon, Guanajuato, two armed men entered a home in Colonia El Llano and opened fire at a family. One 16 year old girl died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 5 December 2024 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, unknown armed individuals shot a man at the door to his home in Miravalle. The home was a point for the sale of drugs. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, at least two armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who repelled the aggression in Colonia Dolores. One armed man died as a result, one police officer was injured and one individual was arrested. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

Around 6 December 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her head was decapitated and found inside a cooler in a Chinese restaurant in Colonia Rinconada de Otay with a cardboard sign next to it. 1 fatality.
On 6 December 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men shot two men with the 'tiro de gracia' in Colonia San Jose Extension. 2 fatalities.
On 6 December 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Benito Juarez, a couple of armed individuals shot and killed a Colombian citizen in Colonia Atenor Salas and fled the scene on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.

Around 6 December 2024 (month of), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a plastic bag in Colonia San Juan de Dios. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, unknown armed individuals opened fire at state and ministerial police officers in Colonia Tres Reyes who repelled the aggression. One armed individual died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed individuals chased a man and shot him who sought shelter inside a home and repelled the aggression in Colonia Cajeme. The victim escaped the scene and there were no injuries.
Around 6 December 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic close to Colonia Pioneros. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, armed men opened fire at state police officers who repelled the aggression in Colonia Riveras del Carmen leading to a chase and ending on the Reynosa-Rio Bravo highway. One armed man died as a result and one was arrested. 1 fatality.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Proceso; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Sintesis
notes: On 23 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, members of Los Roques Gang abducted a man and a woman for an express robbery on km. 46 of Mexico-Cuernavaca highway, in the town of Parres. Officers arrested one of the suspects and released the victims in the north of Cuernavaca the same day of the abduction. The victims were uninjured. According to security cameras footage, a vehicle of the Huitzilac road police escorted the perpetrators during the abduction. This information led to the arrest of a second suspect around 12 December 2024, and two other men around 11 September 2025. The latter worked as municipal employees and had links to criminal groups and local police officers. It also led to an investigation on the participation of at least four municipal police officers in the event.

On 3 December 2024, in Pantelho, Chiapas, members of El Machete engaged in an armed clash with Los Herrera for control of the municipality. After several hours, El Machete took over the municipal presidency issuing a video posted on social media. On 7 December, they left the presidency. Casualties unknown.

Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back close to the Technological University of Morelia (UTM) in Colonia Canteras. 1 fatality.

On 22 November 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a Norwegian national in a taxi in Colonia Jardin Balbuena (drive-by). The taxi driver was uninjured. Four suspects were arrested in two operations conducted in Colonia Jacarandas, in Iztapalapa, around 12 December 2024. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2024, in Los Tepetates, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 22 September 2024 (between 20 - 24 September), in San Juan Evangelista, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied and with a message next to the bodies on 24 September. One of the victims was identified as an official from Playa Vicente and director of the Economic Development of the Municipality together with his son. Both men were reported missing on 20 September. 2 fatalities.

On 25 September 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, several armed individuals shot at a van and a house in the intersection of Camino Real a Saltillo and Aztecas streets, in Colonia Imperio Azteca, injuring a person.

On 28 September 2024, in Chamilpa, Morelos, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a woman who worked at a food stand near Cuernavaca-Tepoztlan road. The perpetrators fled on a motorbike. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, around Chamilpa, Morelos, armed men in a vehicle shot in a drive-by at the check-point of the National Guard on the Mexico-Cuernavaca. One police officer died after he was ran over. One armed man was arrested and two vehicles were seized. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a group on individuals abducted three people (a man and two women). The Civil State Guard (GCE) and the State Commission for the Search for Persons (CEBP) released them near the community of Pozas de Santa Ana and 57 Matehuala-San Luis road.

On 19 October 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a group of armed masked and hooded individuals entered restaurant 'La Revolucion' on Ignacio Comonfort street, in Colonia Alamitos, and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: On 25 October 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, four men abducted and killed a taxi driver, whose body was found with signs of torture and with his ears mutilated and wrapped in sacks in a field next to the Apatzingan-Tepalcatepec highway near Ejido Benito Juarez. The perpetrators were the former leader and current members of Andres Quintana Roo Taxi Union, and suspectedly killed the victim for refusing a collaboration between the union and criminal organizations for the distribution of drugs. 1 fatality.

Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found covered in a plastic bag and with gunshot wounds in Colonia Arbolitos on the Mexico-Laredo highway. 1 fatality.
On 30 October 2024, in Palomares, Oaxaca, armed individuals in a vehicle shot in a drive-by at a woman and a man. The man was killed and the woman was injured. 1 fatality.

Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds, including 'tiro de gracia', behind the premises of Tabicel company, in Colonia Puerta Real. The man's body had the hands and feet tied, and the woman's was gagged. 2 fatalities.

On 31 October 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan, an unknown number of armed individuals shot and killed a woman driving a motorcycle. According to local sources, the women is suspected to be a 'vigilante' from a criminal group, however, this was not confirmed. 1 fatality.
On 1 November 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, several armed men shot at a house in colonia San Francisco. A woman was injured but died later at the hospital. 1 fatality.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 8 November 2024, in Los Tepetates, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of Los Caballeros Templarios Gang and the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) clashed. This event is related to other clashes that took place in El Alcalde, Las Bateas, Los Charcos, and El Capire (coded separately). Military, National Guard, and Civil Guard officers arrived at the scene and arrested one of the armed individuals, who affirmed to belong to the CJNG. Casualties unknown.
On 12 November 2024, in Huitzilac, Morelos, according to witnesses, a taxi driver was shot and killed by armed men who escaped in a vehicle on the Mexico-Cuernavaca highway. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2024, in Chamilpa, Morelos, according to the victim, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man who was driving a motorcycle on Hermenegildo Galeana street, near the bridge over Mexico-Cuernavaca highway (drive-by). The perpetrators fled towards Universidad avenue. 1 injured.

On 24 November 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed men shot at the facilities of a rehabilitation center in Colonia Emiliano Zapata and then kidnapped a patient. Casualties unknown.

Around 28 November 2024 (as reported), in Mexquitic de Carmona, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and wrapped in a blanket on the road between Camino to Maravillas. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, municipal police officers and members of a cell linked to the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) clashed along Apatzingan - Buenavista road, near the police station, and in the downtown. Initial versions on social media indicated that the clash resulted in dead people, although authorities have denied it. Casualties unknown.

On 2 December 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan, armed men shot and injured a man on the Buenavista-Los Reyes highway. According to the police, the man is a watchman for a criminal cell. A woman was also injured with a stray bullet.

Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Coajomulco, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered inside several bags covered with a blanket. The victim was a municipal police officer who last time was seen was after he went out of work and did not came back. 1 fatality.
On 10 December 2024, in Paracuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown individuals launched and explosive device from a drone in the main square. There were no casualties.
Around 13 December 2024 (as reported), in Los Bancos, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the CJNG and Los Caballeros Templarios Gang clashed. Casualties unknown.

On 7 December 2024, in Alta Rosa, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. Suspectedly, the armed men were members of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs. One man was killed. Weapons and vehicles were seized. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2024, in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, military and National Guard officers clashed with armed individuals in Colonia Alvarez del Castillo. The officers arrested four individuals and seized fireweapons and drugs. Casualties unknown.

On 11 December 2024, in Tecate, Baja California, municipal police officers clashed with armed individuals on Septima street. The armed individuals abandoned their vehicle and fled. Inside the vehicle, police officers located and released three men who had just been abducted from a house nearby. The men were uninjured. Casualties unknown.

On 8 December 2024, in Quiroga, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the National Guard and three armed men on the Patzcuaro-Quiroga road and the city center. One man was arrested and declared to be part of a criminal cell in Jalisco. There were no casualties.

On 8 December 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Fuentes de San Bartolo. The victim was a member of Los Rojos Gang working in Iguala municipality of Guerrero. 1 fatality.
On 5 December 2024, in Tequesquitengo, Morelos, unidentified armed individuals entered a house in Colonia Loma Bonita and killed a man. The victim was a member of Los Tlacos Gang. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2024, in El Batallon, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between military officers and armed individuals on the Angostura-Batury road. One armed man was arrested. There were no casualties.
On 11 December 2024, in Palo Colorado, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at military officers. One officer was injured as a result. 1 injury.
Around 11 December 2024 (as reported), close to Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, a soldier was killed and the body was found on the Tuxtla Gutierrez-Chicoasen highway inside a car. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2024, close to Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at the municipal police booth located on the Buenavista-Tepalcatepec highway. The officers who were at the booth were unharmed.

notes: On 5 December 2024, in Amanalco de Becerra, Mexico, at least ten people linked to La Familia Michoacana Cartel hit, injured, and abducted the woman mayor in an express robbery that aimed at forcing her to resign and suspend her request to deploy state and federal security forces in the area. The victim had received threatening calls the day before, and was released two hours after the abduction. Two government officials were arrested on 17 December 2024 for this abduction and their suspected links with La Familia Michoacana. These arrests are part of 'Operacion Enjambre' (Operation Swarm) that included the arrest of authorities linked to organized crime across Mexico state (coded separately). 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 29 November 2024, in Charco Hondo, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals threw explosive devices from a light aircraft. There were no casualties.
