This attack is likely related to a wave of violence triggered by clashes between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel which started on 9 September (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his half-naked body was found with signs of torture and the hands tied on a side of La Loma-El Conchal road, a few meters from the bridge that crosses Culiacan-Mazatlan road and connects the communities of La Loma and El Melon. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was shot and killed when he resisted being abducted by armed men in a car wash on 21 de Marzo avenue, in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. This attack is likely related to a wave of violence triggered by clashes between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel which started on 9 September (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and injured a man on Monte Carmelo street, near Juan Jose Torres Landa boulevard, in Colonia Arroyo Hondo. Also in Leon, two armed men on a motorbike carried an unconscious man to Brisa de Orihuela street, between Circuito Brisa de Caceres and Brisa de Espana boulevard, in Colonia Brisas del Campestre, where they got him off and shot and killed him. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, six men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds inside a van with the message 'Welcome to Culiacan' written on it on Mexico 15 road, between the pantheon of Jardines de Humaya and a motel in the south exit of the city. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Also in Culiacan, a man was killed and his body was found on 29 September with gunshot wounds, the head covered in tape, and the hands tied in an area between Libramiento Benito Juarez 'La Costera' and Piggy Back, around 500 meters south of the gas station known as 'Las Cuartas'. The victim had been abducted in Agricultores boulevard on 26 September 2024. 7 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: On 27 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, army officers and armed individuals clashed on Miguel Hidalgo and Popocatepetl streets, in Colonia El Barrio, in Sector Villa Satelite. A man was killed, and at least four were arrested. The clash initiated when a military convoy identified a group of armed individuals in a van who were shooting and trying to abduct a man on Popocatepetl and Volcan Santa Elena streets. The man was injured but his kidnapping was prevented. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men in several vans abducted two men. The victims, with signs of having been hit, were released later on the same day and requested assistance from security officers at an interinstitutional base of operations set neat Splash Club.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 28 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals chased, shot and injured a man that was driving a vehicle along Diego Veladez avenue, known as 'Malecon Nuevo', in Desarrollo Urbano de Tres Rios. The victim, a Colombian national, was abducted when the attackers got to stop his car in the junction to Obregon avenue, and was released later that day. The victim is a digital platforms' driver.

On 28 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least two people shot and killed a 17 years-old boy outside his house in front of a park on Monte Corno street, between Malinche and Apalache streets, in Fraccionamiento Villa Bonita. 1 fatality.

Around 28 September 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, at least 12 people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets into a well in Colonia Industrial San Jorge. The bodies were in different states of decomposition. At least 12 fatalities.

On 28 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man inside a house on Valle Dupart 206 street by Valle de Arizpe, in Colonia Valle de San Jose. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, four armed men shot at people inside a house on San Ricardo Pampuri street, near San Nicolas de Bari avenue and Eje Metropolitano, killing four people (two men, a woman, and a 16 years-old boy). The perpetrators locked six other minors into a room during the attack. The perpetrators were later arrested on Soriana Maravillas, in the intersection of Juan Alonso de Torres boulevard and Libramiento Jose Maria Morelos. 4 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; La Verdad; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: On 30 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the leader of the Regional Livestock Union of Sinaloa inside his house in Desarrollo Urbano Tres Rios. Another man was who worked with him was also killed. The victim was a politician and member of the PRI party. He was a former local deputy and a candidate to the presidency in 2021. 2 fatalities.

On 30 September 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to the authorities, 10 people were kidnapped by unidentified individuals in different parts of the city. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. These kidnappings are likely related to the wave of attacks and abductions triggered by the internal fights between the Sinaloa Cartel.

On 30 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, at least four armed men entered a house in Colonia La Fragua and shot at people. The perpetrators ran away in two motorcycles. Two men and a woman were killed and another two people were also injured. 3 fatalities.

On 1 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, several armed men arrived to a house in Colonia Soledad de la Joya. At least two of them entered the house and shot at a woman and a man. The perpetrators ran away with a third accomplice. The woman was killed and the man was injured. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorcycle attacked a man leaving his home and chased him to a store where they shot him several times injuring one employee in a grocery store and then another employee at a beauty salon. The victim died as a result and the two injured victims received medical treatment. Also in Leon, several armed individuals shot a man several times in Colonia Cerrito de Juarez. The victim later died as a result. In a third attack in Leon, two women walking on the street opened fire at a man outside his home in Colonia Valle de San Pedro de la Joya II. The victim was identified as the father of an active municipal police officer. 2 fatalities, 3 injuries.

On 3 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, several armed individuals opened fire and shot a man at the entrance to a junk yard in Colonia San Jose de Cementos who died as a result. The armed individuals fled the scene in a vehicle. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals kidnapped nine people who were at a rehabilitation center after they threatened employees of the center, located in the south of the city. The whereabouts of the nine inmates remains unknown.

On 4 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men arrived at a shopping mall in fraccionamiento Loma Linda and opened fire. One man was killed and two people were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injuries.

On 2 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at military officers and the National Guard who repelled the aggression in Maquio Clouthier leading to a chase near an elementary school. There were no casualties.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa
notes: On 4 October 2024, in the municipality of Navolato, Sinaloa, armed clashes were reported between the military and armed individuals. The clash was caused by an attack by the Navy at a vehicle in La Palma (coded separately). An unknown number of individuals were arrested. This clash is suspected to be related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

On 28 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, an armed individual shot and injured a bodyguard and former police officer inside Merca Piel shopping mall, on Espanita street, in Zona Piel. The perpetrator fled on a motorbike. The victim works for a businessman. It is unknown whether the businessman was present.
On 3 October 2024, in Escuinapa de Hidalgo, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash close to the police station El Camaron. One person was killed as a result. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man that was walking on Popular street, near La Luz boulevard, in Colonia Eyupol (drive-by).

Around 30 September 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied up to his back in Bulevar Pedro Infante. The victim had been reported missing since 13 September. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot at two men in a drive-by shooting in Colonia La Americas. One victim was killed and the other also died later at the hospital. 2 fatalities.

On 1 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured a young man in a drive-by shooting in Colonia Flores Magon. Also in Leon, two armed on a motorcycle men shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting in Colonia La Selva. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed individuals on a motorcycle caught up with a man on a motorcycle and opened fire at him (drive-by) on Kumate Boulevard and Las Torres Boulevard. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, five men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds, with their hands tied and with hats on them in Colonia Miguel de la Madrid. 5 fatalities.

On 3 October 2024, in Escuinapa de Hidalgo, Sinaloa, a group of armed individuals intercepted a woman, handcuffed her, beat her, and tortured her for hours. The woman was later released and drove to the toll booth in Acaponeta where she was assisted by police officers. Earlier the same night, the woman was intercepted by armed men near Villa Union where she was interrogated and later released. 1 injury.

On 2 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash in Colonia Siete Gotas and Colonia Villas del Real. A house that was used as a drug laboratory and a vehicle were damaged. Casualties unknown.

On 5 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed individuals shot and killed a woman in Colonia Las Mandarinas and then fled the scene on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia Paraiso Real. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a man on Antonio Martinez Aguayo and Rosa Maria Hernandez Vargas streets, a few meters from Torre 7, in Colonia Canada del Real (drive-by). Another three kids were injured by stray bullets. Also, armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man driving a motorbike near Fray Alonso de la Veracruz and Origenes streets (drive-by) in Plan de Ayala Santa Rosa. The body of the victim was found in a river. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture wrapped in a plastic bag in Colonia Noria de Septien. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, Ministerial, National Guard and army officers clashed with at least two armed individuals during an arrest operation in a house on Torre Tarragona street, near Torre Sevilla street, in Colonia Torres Doradas. One of the armed individuals was injured, and two arrested.
On 10 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was shot and killed in Colonia Los Pinos. The perpetrators were two armed men who ran away on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.
On 10 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, three armed men shot at a man and a woman in colonia Maria Dolores. The victims are suspected to be drug dealers. The victims were injured.

Around 11 October 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the human remains were found inside a bag with a message signed by a criminal group in Colonia Leon I. 1 fatality.
Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found burning in fraccionamiento Santa Fe. 1 fatality.
On 6 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals opened fire and shot at elements of the National Guard in Colonia Guadalupe Victoria. There were no injuries.
Around 6 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic close to Nuevo Bachigualato. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a woman that was driving a vehicle in Fraccionamiento Punta Azul (drive-by). The victim was not injured. There were no casualties.

On 7 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least three individuals wearing tactical clothing abducted the worker of the funeral parlor 'Moreh' in front of the establishment on Emiliano Zapata boulevard and Domingo Rubi avenue, between Colonias Guadalupe and Jorge Almada. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 7 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Renato Vega Alvarado and then fled the scene. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2024 (between 6 - 7 October), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in Colonia Gustavo Diaz Ordaz. The man was kidnapped on 6 October. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals in two vans shot at a car in front of a Costco store on Pedro Infante boulevard, near the tunnel that connects it to Rolando Arjona boulevard, killing two men (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals in two vehicles abducted a man that was with his girlfriend in Colonia 21 de Marzo. The woman was not injured. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 9 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals abducted the employee of a telephone and internet company that was working in a house in the intersection of Rio Batacudea and Rio Grijalba streets, in Colonia Industrial Bravo. The victim was shot and went to a hospital two hours after the abduction, where he died. 1 fatality.
Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in front of the pantheon in Colonia 21 de Marzo. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: On 10 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, two armed men entered the facilities of a hospital and killed a patient. The victim had been previously injured after he had been kidnapped on 23 September and rescued by the police on the same day. 1 fatality.
Around 11 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in fraccionamiento Hacienda del Valle. 1 fatality.
On 11 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men travelling in two vehicles kidnapped two men in Colonia Industrial El Palmito. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 14 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least four men kidnapped a man while he was in the car with his mother in Colonia Villa Andalucia. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.
On 17 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloal according to witnesses, armed individuals abducted a man from his house in Fraccionamiento Valle del Sol. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 14 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals opened fire at elements of the National Guard in Colonia Juntas de Hamaya. Two armed individuals were killed as a result. 2 fatalities.

On 12 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed men and the state police after the armed men tried to steal a police patrol in Santa Fe in sector Humaya. Three armed men were killed and one police officer was injured. 3 fatalities.

On 11 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, there was an armed clash between armed men that led to a car chase from Las Quintas to Colonia Aurora. There were no casualties.

On 17 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed across several areas of the city, including El Barrio, Ayune, Emiliano Zapata, El Diez, Portezuelos, Las Quintas, Campo 10, Agua Blanca, La Pitayita, 'the sector of the landfill', El Carrizalejo, Camino Real, Bachigualato, and around the airport and the south entries to the city. These events are likely part of the war between 'Los Chapitos' and 'Los Mayitos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

Around 14 October 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a woman was killed by unknown assailants and her body was found wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia Brisas del Campestre. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men entered a house on Costa del Mar Rojo street, in Colonia Santa Maria de Cementos, and shot at two women (mother and daughter). One of the women died and the other was injured. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a group of armed men entered a house and kidnapped a man in fraccionamiento Jardin del Parque. The perpetrators shot and injured him during the kidnapping. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 14 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a van attacked two young men on a motorcycle on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway. Both were injured.

On 16 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on motorcycles shot a teenager and a man who were inside a mechanic's shop in Colonia La Ermita i. Both were injured as a result. The same day, several men shot at a couple outside a home in Colonia Haciendas de Ibarrilla I. One woman and one man were injured as a result. 4 injuries.

On 16 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, a group of armed individuals entered Moreh's funeral parlor on Emiliano Zapata boulevard, in Colonia Jorge Almada, and attempted to abduct a man that was attending a funeral. The victim resisted, and the perpetrators hit his head with their weapons and shot into the air. The victim was injured and the perpetrators fled without him. Armed individuals had abducted an employee of the same funeral parlor on 7 October 2024 (coded separately).
Around 13 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket around colonia Ampliacion El Barrio. 1 fatality.
On 12 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men shot and killed a man on a motorcycle in front of a taco restaurant in colonia Infonavit Barrancos. 1 fatality.

Around 15 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, one man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in fracconamiento Portalegre. Another man with signs of torture was found at the site, but he was still alive. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 15 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, one armed individual shot a man at least ten times as he left his home in Colonia in fraccionamiento Torres de San Nicolas and fled the scene with a second individual. The man was injured as a result. The same day, two armed men on a motorcycle opened fire at two men in Colonia Valle de San Jose. One man died as a result and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 2 injuries.
On 14 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men shot and killed a man outside his home in Colonia Valle de Jerez. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, an armed group entered a store where a man was playing with slot machines on Mina de Tayoltita street, between Miguel de la Madrid Hurtado and Luis Echevarria avenues, in Colonia Huizaches (another version indicates that this is located in Colonia Miguel de la Madrid), took him out of the establishment, and shot and killed him. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Riodoce
notes: Around 17 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two individuals shot and killed a man on Antonio Castro street, near a fire station and Number 22 secondary school, in Colonia Ignacio Allende. Also in Culiacan Rosales, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, signs of torture and wrapped in canvas on a side of the road to Sanalona, in Colonia El Barrio. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 October 2024 (month of), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, four people were killed and their bodies were found buried inside plastic bags and in an advanced state of decomposition in the area around Colonia Los Castillos and the community of Los Ramirez. 4 fatalities.
On 11 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed men in a vehicle shot and injured a man in a drive-by in Colonia La Florida.
On 13 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man (drive-by) in fraccionamiento Lomas de San Isidro. 1 fatality.
Around 12 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found burned in fraccionamiento Lomas de San Isidro. 1 fatality.

Around 15 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back and more than 100 gunshot wounds to his body close to the fairgrounds. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man in the intersection of Doctor Barajas and Faisan streets, in Colonia San Sebastian (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 14 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals intercepted two men on a motorcycle and opened fire at them in Villas del Real (drive-by). Both died as a result. 2 fatalities.

On 18 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals abducted three people in Colonia Amistad. Two of the victims were later released. The third victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova
notes: On 19 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals abducted an employee of El Debate newspaper, whose offices were shot and damaged on 17 October 2024 (coded separately). Unidentified individuals initially chased the victim and threw him off his motorcycle on Venustiano Carranza and Hidalgo streets. Injured, the victim hid in a store and then, together with a co-worker, sought medical assistance at the IMSS 1 Hospital. The perpetrators located him at the hospital, where he was abducted. The victim's co-worker was left at the hospital. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found inside plastic bags in the intersection of Hierro and Malaga streets, in Colonia Piletas IV. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to a witness, armed individuals abducted a man in the baseball fields of La Liga Recursos and fled in a van on Rolando Arjona boulevard. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture in fraccionamiento Colinas del Bosque. 1 fatality.
On 22 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two young men were kidnapped by individuals travelling in two vehicles in colonia Laureles Pinos. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

On 23 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at the facade of a home in Colonia El Barrio. The house and a vehicle outside were damaged. Also in Culiacan, two unknown armed individuals opened fire and shot a man repeatedly in Colonia Francisco I. Madero in Los Huizaches sector. The man injured as a result.
On 23 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals traveling in two vehicles kidnapped two men in Colonia Nuevo Culiacan. The men were later released.

On 23 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle approached a woman and the co-pilot shot her when she attempted to escape in Colonia San Miguel. The woman was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 24 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed individuals shot and injured a man playing soccer in fraccionamiento Valle Alto. 1 injury.

On 24 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men who arrived on a motorcycle shot at a girl and a woman walking on the street in Colonia Balcones de la Joya and then fled the scene. Both were injured as a result. 2 injuries.

On 25 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals got out of a car and opened fire several times at two men in a parking lot between Colonia Santo Domingo and Cementos. The armed men fled the scene with several other individuals in a car. 2 fatalities.

On 19 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals clashed on Presidente Mariano Paredes street, between Adolfo Ruiz Cortines and Miguel Aleman streets, in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. A person was injured and at least one (an American citizen) died. It is unclear if the victims were involved in the clash. Following the clash, an armed group entered the Red Cross medical facilities on Leyva Solano boulevard where the injured victims had been taken, and threatened medical personnel to locate a man whom they intended to kill. The armed group fled in several vans. At least 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Tachichilte street, in Fraccionamiento Isla Musala (drive-by). The victim sold candy and USB flash drives with preloaded music, and made videos on TikTok alluding to 'El Chapo'. The victim had also appeared in videos with a youtuber who is suspectedly linked to Los Chapitos Gang. 1 fatality.

Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the burnt body was found on km. 140 of Maxipista Culiacan-Mazatlan, between Estacion Obispo and El Coronel, in Emiliano Zapata. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied up and wrapped in bags and inside the trunk of a car near Laguna Colorada. 2 fatalities.

On 22 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed two street vendors in Colonia Industrial in a drive-by shooting. One of the victims had drug dealing records. 2 fatalities.

On 22 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, at least two armed individuals traveling in a vehicle with several armed men opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Santa Anita A.C (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found at the southern exit of the city on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway. A message was found next to the body. The same day, in Culiacan, another man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and with his hands tied in Libramiento Benito Juarez. 2 fatalities.

On 23 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle overtook a food delivery man on his motorcycle and opened fire at him near Colonia San Nicolas (drive-by). The man was killed as a result. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals on motorcycles chased a car and shot repeatedly causing the car to crash in Colonia Emiliano Zapata (drive-by). The car caught fire and both passenger and driver died. Two people were hit by a stray bullet, one of whom died. 3 fatalities, 1 injury.

On 25 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals on a motorcycle overtook two men traveling in a vehicle and shot them in Colonia Colinas del Carmen (drive-by). One man died as a result and the other was injured. Both perpetrators were later arrested. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 25 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed who were traveling on a motorcycle opened fire at shot two men inside a vehicle in Colonia Colinas del Carmen II. Both died as a result and the two men were arrested. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a home in Colonia Guadalupe Victoria after armed individuals shot at the home and set it on fire. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, an armed individual shot and killed a man walking on the street in Los Olivos and then fled the scene with an accomplice. The same day, two armed individuals approached a man and shot him while he attempted to flee the scene in Colonia Valle de Jerez III. The perpetrators fled the scene. 2 fatalities.

On 26 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clashes which led to the looting of businesses. An unknown number of people were killed during the clash. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the decapitated head was found inside a cooler at the entrance to Parque Culiacan 7. A messages was found addressed to Los Chapos and with a hat drawn on it (perpetrators coded as likely member of Los Mayitos Gang since the hat is symbol used by them). The victim is suspected to be a relative of a gang member of Los Chapos, although this was not officially confirmed. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, an armed group kidnapped two men at the municipal landfill, both of whom was identified as security guards. The whereabouts of the men remain unknown.

Around 27 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Las Costera with his hands tied and bullet wounds. Also in Culiacan, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied in the sector Barrancas in fraccionamiento Punta Azul. 2 fatalities.

On 27 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals in a vehicle opened fire at a driver close to Infonavit Canadas (drive-by) and injured him. The victim fled the scene and received support from elements of the National Guard. 1 injury.
On 27 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed individuals shot and killed a pizza deliverer in fraccionamiento Prados del Sur. 1 fatality.

On 28 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed groups clashed in the intersection of Iztaccihuatl street and Juan Alonso de Torres boulevard, in Colonia Piletas. Municipal police and National Guard officers arrived at the scene and arrested a person. A National Guard officer was injured by a stray bullet. 1 injured.

On 28 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, one armed man entered a home and shot a man several times in front of his family in Colonia Villanueva. The armed man then fled the scene with an accomplice. 1 fatality.
On 28 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire and attacked elements of the military and the National Guard in the Barrio de San Juan. There were no casualties.

On 29 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man that was buying street food on Honda de San Miguel street, in the neighborhood of San Miguel. The woman vendor that was attending him resulted injured. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra boulevard, in Colonia La Piscina (drive-by). According to witnesses, the perpetrators were chasing the victim since Juan Jose Torres Landa boulevard. Also in Leon de los Aldama, two armed men on a motorbike shot and injured a man on Jose Maria Robles Hurtado, in Colonia Cristo Rey (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 29 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a woman on Malecon del Rio bridge, near Francisco Marquez street, between Colonias Heroes de Chapultepec and Penitas (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, at least four armed men who arrived on two motorbikes shot at a group of young people in the intersection of Marcel and Darwin streets, in Colonia Soledad de la Joya, injuring two men and a woman. 3 injured.

On 29 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to the victim's relatives, an armed group abducted a 16-years old boy from his house on Ecuador avenue, in Fraccionamiento Santa Fe. The victim suffers from dengue fever and had just returned home from a doctor's visit. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
Around 29 October 2024 (as reported), near Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied and blindfolded on km. 162 of Culiacan-Eldorado road. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals on a motorbike chased a man along Yaquis Oriente and Arroyo de Alfaro streets, near the bridge that separates Colonias Rinconada and Bugambilias and Fraccionamiento Porton de Bugambilias, got off the vehicle, and hit, shot, and killed him. The perpetrators fled and left the motorbike on Yaquis street. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 30 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found semi-naked, with gunshot wounds, the hands tied, and a plastic bag around the head in the middle of the lanes of Libramiento Benito Juarez La Costerita. 1 fatality.
On 31 October 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) a man in Alfaro. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, several armed men who arrived on a motorcycle and a vehicle entered a place in Colonia Flores Magon and shot against a group of people who were participating in a ritual to the cult of 'La Santa Muerte'. Three people were killed and six people were injured. Among the killed victims, there was a woman dedicated to make the rituals. 3 fatalities, 6 injured.

Around 1 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a woman was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and covered with a tarp around the San Sebastian pantheon. 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed men on a motorcycle shot at a vehicle in colonia San Juan Bosco. Four people were injured, including two minors. According to local sources, it is suspected that the victims tried to repel the attack as percussion casings were found inside the attacked vehicle, however, this was not confirmed. 4 injured.

Around 3 November 2024 (month of), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men were killed and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition inside bags in colonia Balcones de la Joya. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Hidalgo; La Silla Rota; Milenio; News Hidalgo
notes: On 3 November 2024, near Pachuca de Soto, Hidalgo, armed men in a vehicle shot and injured a man and two women in a drive-by around Pachuca on the way to Emiliano Zapata. 3 injured.

Around 5 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two people were killed and their bodies were found tied and with signs of violence in Colonia Balcones de la Joya. A message was found next to both bodies. 2 fatalities

On 6 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike stopped on Eros street, in Colonia La Ermita, one of them got off the vehicle, entered a house, and shot at four men, killing one and injuring the other three. 1 fatality, 3 injured.

Around 6 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, four people (two men and two women) were killed and their bodies were found in decomposition, with gunshot wounds, and the hands and feet tied, in a house on Cultura Maya street, in Colonia Valle de los Castillos. 4 fatalities.

On 7 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike approached a man on 2 de Junio street, in Colonia San Martin de Porres, one of them got off the vehicle, and shot and killed the man. Also in Leon de los Aldama, two armed men on a motorbike stopped on De la Resurreccion street, in Colonia Lomas de Guadalupe, one of them got off the vehicle, entered a house, and shot and injured a man. Also, armed men on a motorbike chased and shot a man that was driving a van on Carlos Valenzuela street and Enrique Aranda Guedea avenue, in Colonia Leon I. The man was injured and crashed into other vehicles, after which one of the perpetrators got off the motorbike, approached him, and shot and injured him again. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 7 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man that was cleaning a van on Obrero Mundial street, in Colonia La Piscina CTM (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 7 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wearing tactical clothing, with gunshot wounds, and with a hood covering his head, on a path in Sector Tres Rios. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found inside plastic bags on the path heading to Mesa de Ibarrilla, a few meters from the old path to San Felipe. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individual(s) attacked a man, and he was found injured and with the hands and feet tied on Culiacan-Eldorado road, near Puente 12. 1 injured.

On 9 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a vendor of churros in the intersection of Mariano Escobedo boulevard and Jose Prado street, in Colonia Leon II. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a man that had just left his house on Doctor Salomon Torres Nery street, between Eucalipto and Pirul Chino, in Colonia Los Pinos. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorbike arrived to the intersection of Sierra del Fraile and Caferino Ortiz streets, in Colonia Las Hilamas, and one of them got off the vehicle and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, there was an armed clash between armed men in colonia San Juan Bosco. One man was killed. A merchant and a little girl were also injured. The killed victim was also a merchant. 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, an armed man on a motorcycle shot and injured in a drive-by shooting a member of Los Pinguinos Gang in Barrio de San Miguel.
Around 13 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and inside plastic bags in Brisas del Campestre. 1 fatality.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia Piletas I and II. 1 fatality.

source: Borderland Beat; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste
notes: Property destruction: On 9 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individual(s) threw two explosive devices at a house on Gardenia street, in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. Only one of the devices exploded, causing damages to the building. There were no casualties.

Around 9 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found covered wrapped in a blanket on Cruz Galvez street, in Colonia Felipe Angeles. 1 fatality.
On 9 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a woman on Agricultores boulevard, in Colonia Renato Vega Amador (drive-by). 1 injured.

Around 10 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket and on a mattress, on Constituyente Rafael Martinez Escobar street, between Cruz Galvez and Rosendo Rodriguez. 1 fatality.

Around 11 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two people were beaten and were found with the hands tied near a kindergarten on San Ricardo avenue, in Colonia Providencia. One of them died. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed men in a vehicle chased and shot a man (drive-by) near the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway. The victim was killed. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 12 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and wrapped in plastics with tape around colonia El Barrio on the road to Sanalona. 1 fatality.
On 13 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men were shot and killed by armed men in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. The bodies were left with their hands tied up. 2 fatalities.
On 13 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed men and the military forces in sector Villa del Real and Colonia El Barrio. Two men were injured.

On 13 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at officers of the National Guard in the eastern sector of the city and a clash ensued close to Colonia Ampliacion El Barrio. Two minors involved in the clash were injured. 2 injuries.

On 14 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed civilians arrived at a home and opened fire at it in Colonia Villa La Esperanza. The same day, armed individuals opened fire at a home in Colonia Las Coloradas. There were no injuries.
Around 15 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with a message next to it in Colonia Huizaches. 1 fatality.

On 18 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a bicycle approached a man and shot him close to Colonia Plaza de Toros I. The man was injured as a result. Also in Leon, two men arrived at the front door of a home and shot a man in Colonia Joyas de Castilla and killed a man in front of his family. 1 fatality and 1 injury.
Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Piletas IV. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men opened fire and shot two men outside a house in Colonia Paseo de las Torres. Both men were injured as a result and the two perpetrators were arrested. 2 injuries.

On 21 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed individuals who arrived on a motorbike shot and injured an off-duty private security guard who was leaving his workplace at Mayorca Residencial. The perpetrators fled towards Colonia Heroes de Leon. 1 injured.

Around 21 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets on Malecon del Rio de los Gomez by Costa Azul street, in Colonia La Escondida. 2 fatalities.

On 21 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Wolframita street, in Colonia Rizos del Saucillo (drive-by). The perpetrators fled towards Canada del Real. 1 fatality.

On 22 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle arrived at a food stand on Jaracarandas street, in Colonia Maravillas, one of them got off the vehicle, and shot and killed the woman vendor. 1 fatality.
On 17 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed individuals shot and injured a woman and then set fire to a home in Colonia Ampliacion Bicentenario. 1 injury.

Around 18 November 2024 (between 17 - 19 November), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied in Colonia Los Huizaches on 19 November. The man was kidnapped on 17 November. 1 fatality.
On 18 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, an armed clash was reported between armed groups at the exit to Culiancito. There were no injuries.
On 18 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at the facade of a home in Colonia Guadalupe Victoria. One man was injured and two cars were damaged. 1 injury.

On 18 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals on a motorcycle chased and shot at a man on his motorcycle which led to a chase in fraccionamiento Villa Satelite (drive-by). The victim lost control, crashed and dies as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshots and his hands tied near the residential complex La Primavera. The same day in Culiacan, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and with their hands tied in Colonia Las Costera. 3 fatalities.

On 19 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire at state police officers in Colonia Aguaruto which led to a chase. The armed individuals threw tire punctures onto the highway to avoid officers from catching them. There were no injuries.
Around 20 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Las Quintas. 1 fatality.
Around 20 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found burned in fraccionamiento Hacienda del Valle. 1 fatality.
On 20 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men on a motorcycle opened fire at a man in Colonia Lomas del Sol. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

source: Borderland Beat; El Sol de Sinaloa; Riodoce
notes: On 20 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, several armed men got off vehicles, entered a house on Mina del Penon Blanco street, in Colonia Renato Vega Alvarado, and shot and killed a woman. The perpetrators later used gasoline to set the house on fire. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least two armed men abducted a woman that was working as a cashier at La Herradura avocado store in De Abastos market. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 21 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to the victim, a man on a vehicle shot at a man who was driving a van on Diego Valadez boulevard, known as Malecon Nuevo, in Colonia Chapultepec (drive-by). The victim was not injured. Also in Culiacan Rosales, according to the victim's wife, individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in Colonia Lomas del Sol (drive-by). 1 injured.

On 21 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals who arrived in several vehicle shot at people in the garage of a house on Santa Catarina street, in Fraccionamiento Providencia, killing two and injuring another. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 21 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, two individuals shot and killed a woman who was ordering at a tacos stand between Mexico avenue and Heroico Colegio Militar street, bordering Colonias Sinaloa and Margarita. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana; Zona Franca
notes: On 22 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least two individuals shot at people inside Finca La Esperanza restaurant, on Montebello and Cerro de Los Pilares streets, in Colonia Montebello, killing three people (two men and a woman). One of the men was the off-duty Deputy Director of the Municipal Police of Culiacan. 3 fatalities.

On 22 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Cofre del Perote street, in Fraccionamiento Villa Bonita (drive-by). The victim was with other people, who remained uninjured. 1 fatality.
Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia San Miguel. 1 fatality.
On 23 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men arrived on a motorcycle, opened fire at a man and then fled the scene in Colonia San Nicolas. 1 fatality.

Around 23 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, blindfolded and with his hands tied on the Culiacan-El Dorado highway. The victim was kidnapped in Quila and was identified as an influencer with links to Los Chapitos gang. The same day, a man was killed and his body was found floating in a river with gunshot wounds and his feet tied. 2 fatalities.

On 23 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire from a moving car (drive-by) at two people driving a car in Colonia Buenos Aires. Both people were injured as a result. 2 injuries.

On 24 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men broke into a celebration and shot a group of people in Colonia Las Joyas. At least four people were injured, including one 13 year old girl. 4 injuries.

On 24 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, at least two armed individuals opened fire from their motorcycle (drive-by) and shot two men in Colonia Pedregal del Sol. One man was killed and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 24 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed groups in Colonia La Amistad and three men were killed and found aboard a pick up truck. 3 fatalities.
Around 24 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and shot to death in Colonia Los Huizaches. 1 fatality.
On 24 November 2024, in Navolato, Sinaloa, several armed men aboard a vehicle opened fire and shot a man in El Progreso (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 25 November 2024 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found decapitated and wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia San Miguel. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Milenio; Noroeste; SDP Noticias
notes: On 25 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, hooded armed individuals intercepted and abducted two off-duty state police officers on Aeropuerto road, near Colonia Bachigualatochi. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

Around 25 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa a person was killed and the human remains were found inside a cooler next to Tomateros de Culiacan stadium. The same day, another person was killed and the human remains were found inside a cooler in fraccionamiento Altezza. The same day, five people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic near La Primavera. 7 fatalities.

On 25 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals opened fire at six houses and set them on fire in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo, Stanza Torrabla, Villa Satelite, fraccionamiento San Benito and Colonia La Estancia 2. There were no injuries.
Around 25 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa a man was attacked and his body was found handcuffed and with blows to his body in Colonia Jesus Valdez. 1 injury.
On 25 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash in Alturas del Sur. There were no injuries.

On 25 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men opened fire from a moving vehicle and shot a fast food delivery man while he was working in Colonia Satelite (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, several armed men arrived at San Alfonso ranch in Colonia Benito Juarez, Santa Ana del Conde, and at least two of them shot at people inside, killing two (the business' owner and an employee), and injuring another employee. This attack is suspectedly linked to a land dispute. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 26 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals aboard three vehicles abducted a man in his house in Fraccionamiento Portalegre VIII. The victim was later released uninjured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 26 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found with gunshot wounds, signs of torture, and a cardboard with a threatening message stabbed in the back with a knife on the path that connects La Explanada square and Culiacan-Eldorado road. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in front of a clandestine casino on Jazmin street in Colonia 10 de Mayo (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 26 November 2024, in Cofradia de la Loma, Sinaloa, five hooded individuals abducted a man in Colonia Chulavista. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 27 November 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a vehicle approached a man on Brisa de Braga street, in Colonia Brisas del Campestre, and the copilot shot and killed a man (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to the victim, armed individuals shot and injured a man who was driving a wrecker on Jesus Kumate boulevard, around Colonia Hacienda Molino. This attack is suspectedly linked to the burning of a wrecker and the van that it transported in the intersection of Mexico 15 road and Jardin de las Orquideas boulevard (uncoded). 1 injured.

Around 27 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to videos posted on social media, armed men aboard two cars abducted a man on Agricultores boulevard. The victim was released minutes later.

On 27 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed individuals aboard motorcycles and other vehicles shot at a house on Valle del Roble and Valle Escondido streets, in Colonia Valle Alto Verde, killing a man who was inside (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Riodoce
notes: On 28 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed men in two vehicles shot at a group of people who were drinking and playing games in Colonia Ferrocarrilera. Four people were killed and another four were injured. In another event, armed men also shot at a house in Colonia Villa Bonita were also people who were playing with game machines were attacked. Three people were killed and another one was injured. 5 injuries, 7 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 28 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with the feet tied up with tape, blindfolded and with a message under a bridge in Libramiento Benito Juarez, La Costerita on Alvaro Obregon. The victim was a commander of the state police who had been kidnapped on 26 November after he finished his work. 1 fatality.
Around 28 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found burned by the Tamazula river, around Isla Musala. 1 fatality.

source: Borderland Beat; El Norte; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 28 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a private speciality clinic located on Enrique Sanchez Alonso Boulevard in Colonia Progreso was shot at by unidentified armed individuals. One man was injured. The place is known to be a place for 'punteros' locally known as individuals employed by criminal groups to monitor specific areas and report suspicious activity.

Around 29 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, members of Los Chapitos Gang raided and killed a member of the MF Group of Los Mayitos Gang. The victim was accused to be the perpetrators of an attack against a local video game business. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Milenio; Mural; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 29 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between the military and armed individuals in the south part of the city. One of the clashes happened on Heroico Colegio Militar road, in front of Fraccionamiento Alturas del Sur, which left a person dead and two people injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Riodoce
notes: On 29 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at the facilities of the motel Emperador and set fire to the reception. The motel is located around panteon Jardines de Humaya. One version is that there were no casualties, only material damage. Another version indicates, that there were an important unknown number of victims.

Around 29 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and his head covered with plastic in Colonia Tierra Blanca. 1 fatality.
On 29 November 2024, in Navolato, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between military officers and armed individuals on the road between El Vergel and Las Aguamitas. Casualties unknown.

Around 28 October 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered inside a cooler. The victim was a cousin of the leader of Los Chapitos gang and a managers of La numerada Gang in Guamuchil. A video made by Los Mayitos gang who captured him, interrogated him and killed was published and shared on social media on 2 December 2024. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals abducted a man in Colonia Alturas del Sur and hit and injured him. The victim was released around 30 November 2024 in Colonia Infonavit Barrancos. 1 injured.

Around 30 November 2024 (month of), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied and in state of decomposition on Brisa de Gandra street, in Colonia Brisas del Campestre. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed men wearing tactical equipment got on a public bus and forced the driver to drive them out of the area. The perpetrators stopped and abandoned the vehicle in Colonia Alturas Sur, where they looted another vehicle, taking the bus driver with them. The perpetrators released the victim on Costerita y Obregon road.

Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, three men were killed and their bodies were found next to a cardboard with a threatening message on the road that connects La Costerita and Maxipista roads. 3 fatalities.

Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket that was tied with ropes on Libramiento Benito Juarez La Costerita road. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; El Sol de Sinaloa; Reforma; Riodoce
notes: Around 30 November 2024 (as reported), on Culiacan-Eldorado road (coded to Culiacan Rosales), Sinaloa, six men were killed and their bodies were found naked, with gunshot wounds, signs of torture, the hands tied, and wrapped in blankets inside a van near the bridge that leads to La 12 road and Campo Victoria. 6 fatalities.

Around 1 December 2024 (as reported), in Caleras de Amexhe, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, individuals in a van shot at people who were attending a baseball match, killing a man and injuring five people (drive-by). 1 fatality, 5 injured.

On 1 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, at least two armed shot and injured a man and his son in Colonia Leon II. Also, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Zinc and Arroyo Mariachi streets, in Colonia San Jose Obrero. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 1 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to a witness, two armed individuals on a motorcycle abducted a man who was walking with a relative in Colonia Villa del Prado. The victim's relative was left uninjured. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 2 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, four armed men shot and injured a man in Colonia Canada del Real. The victim died later at the hospital. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed men on a motorcycle shot in a drive-by at two men driving a motorcycle in colonia Paseos de las Torres. The victims were left injured. There were no casualties.
On 2 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and killed three people and injured one person in Colonia Esperanza. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 2 December 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside boxes in front of the Unidad de Servicios Estatales (USE). It is suspected that the victims were dismembered, however, this was not confirmed. Also possible pictures of the victims might have been found. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

On 3 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed members of Los Mayitos gang shot at a drug dealing place in colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The armed individuals set fire to the place using explosives. A young girl was left injured with burns. One man was killed. This event is related to the fight between Los Chapitos and Los Mayitos Gang. 1 fatality.
On 3 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals in a vehicle threw tire-piercing bombs at the state police and National Guard. This damaged an official vehicle.
On 3 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals set fire to a truck in colonia Ignacio Allende. A minor was found with burned injuries. 1 inured.

Around 3 December 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found with a message on the Benito Juarez La Costerita Bypass around Piggy Back area. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in colonia CNOP. In another event, according to witnesses, armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Bachigualato. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, one man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Prados del Sur. The victim was wearing camouflage pants and tactical boots. The same day, two people were killed and their bodies were found inside plastic boxes in Tres Rios. 3 fatalities.
Around 4 December 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found tied and with gunshot wounds inside a trunk in Colonia Nueva Galicia. 1 fatality.
On 4 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle (drive-by) and shot an online application driver in Colonia Bachigualato. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed individuals opened fire at ministerial federal police officers and who repelled the aggression after killing a man in Colonia Villas Mariana. One armed individual was injured. 1 injury.
On 5 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed individuals on a motorcycle and in a truck opened fire and shot a man in a parking lot at Plaza Galerias Las Torres. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, several armed individuals entered a restaurant and opened fire at two men in Colonia Villas Mariana de Leon. One man died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 6 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed men opened fire at three state police patrol cars in Colonia Bachigualato which led to the cars crashing. One officer died and four officers were injured as a result. One of the injured officers was identified as a member of Los Chapitos and the attack is considered a direct attack against the officer. 1 fatality, 4 injuries.

On 8 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to relatives, armed individuals kidnapped two men in colonia Toledo Corro. The victims were released after two hours. Another version, is that there were three men including two brothers and an uncle and the victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 10 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, four armed men intercepted two men in Desarrollo Urbano Tres Rios and kidnapped them. The whereabouts of both men remain unknown.

On 13 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals abducted two men in front of the offices of the Deputy State Attorney General. One or two women (the exact number varies among reports) who were with the victims remained uninjured. A relative of the victims had been killed and his body was found the previous day in Costa Rica, Sinaloa (coded separately). The victims' whereabouts are unknown.
On 12 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, military officers and armed individuals clashed in Colonia Libertad. An armed individuals was injured and arrested. 1 injured.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 12 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals clashed on Agricultores boulevard, in Colonia Laureles Pinos. During this action, military, National Guard, and municipal police officers arrived at the scene and engaged in the clash. Three people died: an armed man and two women. One of the women was the owner of a tacos restaurant. Five civilians were injured, including an underage boy. An unspecified number of individuals was arrested. 3 fatalities, 5 injured.

On 11 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot and killed man in fraccionamiento Montebello in the south of the capital. The victim was identified as a former military officer and private security guard. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals kidnapped a merchant. Took him to his house and killed him. This event is likely related to the increase in violent events that has been recorded since September amid the ongoing war between the factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle on Mision San Miguel Arcangel street, in Fraccionamiento Nueva Galicia. The victim was a deliveryman, although it is unknown whether he was working at the moment of the attack. 1 fatality.
On 6 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a woman in colonia Joyas de la Loma. 1 fatality.
Around 12 December 2024 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found covered by a blanket on Maquio Clouthier avenue, in Sector Renato Vega Amador. 1 fatality.
On 9 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, three men broke into a home in Colonia Balcones de las Joyas and shot a man to death. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, an armed man shot and killed a man on Vasco de Quiroga boulevard, in Colonia Benito Juarez. The perpetrator fled on a motorcycle driven by a second individual. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, seven armed men in two vehicles arrived at a home on Litio street, in Colonia Piletas IV, and opened fire at it. Two men died as a result. Seven men were arrested upon the arrival of police. 2 fatalities.

On 11 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire from two vehicles at two men riding motorcycles in Colonia Amistad (drive-by). Both men died and a civilian was injured. 2 fatalities. 1 injury.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 13 December 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals aboard at least two vehicles shot and killed a man in the intersection of Revolucion and Plan de Ayala avenues, in Colonia Emiliano Zapata (drive-by). An employee of a bar was also killed after being hit by stray bullets. 2 fatalities.
On 9 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, men opened fire from a motorcycle (drive-by) and shot a man repeatedly, injured him, and fled the scene in Colonia San Martin de Porres.

On 7 December 2024, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, an armed man entered a house and shot and killed two boys and injured two women in Colonia Lomas del Mirador. The killing is linked to the sell and consumption of drugs, Later in Colonia Pedralta, authorities arrested six people, including three men and three women, some of them involved in the killing of the boys. Drugs and weapons were seized. 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2024, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, a group of armed men shot and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle in the intersection of Patria avenue and Mision de San Juan Bautista street, in Fraccionamiento Nueva Galicia, Sector Miguel de la Madrid. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2024, near Marroquin, Guanajuato, armed individuals aboard three vehicles arrived at a junkyard on the Queretaro-Celaya highway and opened fire at a group of people, killing four people. 4 fatalities.
On 3 November 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, armed men shot and killed an environmental activists in Colonia El Alamo. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, two men shot and killed a man in his house in the intersection of Tepeyac and Aquiles Serdan streets, in colonia Villa de las Flores. One of the perpetrators was arrested. 1 fatality.

On 20 October 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, two men shot at a man and two children in colonia Campanario. The victims remained uninjured and escaped the scene. One of the perpetrators was arrested. There were no casualties.
